length ball on sixth stump at 124 kph, goes to drive and slaps this through extra cover beating the sweeper easily to the rope.
length ball on seventh stump, chops this into the ground dribbling in front of point for one.
goes for yorker but sends down a knee high full toss on the body, could have easily disappeared over the leg side rope for six, but Tilak flubs this to long-on along the turf for one.

slower length ball at 121 kph on the wide guideline outside off, toe slaps this high toward long-off. Warner charges 20 yards to his right and throws his body at the ball but it just clears him and the rope for six. That ball came nowhere close to coming off the middle, but David ate his spinach for breakfast, and lunch.
good length ball outside off, slaps this to point for none.

Axar Patel with alligator arms at the worst possible time! You have to dive for that!!!!! Slower ball lands full and wide, slices this high toward the cover sweeper but Axar pulls up short after running forward 20 yards and lets the ball land in front of him for one. Delhi falling apart at the seams here.
full on fifth stump, David cranks this high and mighty over long-off way beyond the rope into the second deck.

slower ball lands full on seventh stump at 115 kph, David with another forearm strength toe-slap that is skied over long-on. Rovman Powell leaps up in vain on the long-on rope but it slips past his fingertips over the rope.
full and very wide, too wide to reach. Wide called.

goes for yorker on the legs at 134 kph, winds up as an ankle high full toss that David tries to flick over the leg side, leading edge floats up to extra cover on the ring. Simple catch by the fielder stepping forward Prithvi Shaw.
slower ball on a good length on fifth stump slapped to cover sweeper for one.
full on the wide guideline at 140 kph, sizzling drive through extra cover. No chance for the sweeper. Ponting is covering his face with his hands in the Delhi dugout.
full on sixth stump at 145 kph, driven to the cover sweeper for one.
low full toss on fourth stump, punched straight down the ground for one.

full on the wide guideline outside off, goes to ramp this over third man and instead it flies over fine leg. Chase is on to try to slap this back into play. Third umpire is having a long look and decides it is just three.
back of a length on middle, leans back trying to uppercut this over third man, huge nick behind. Pant and Nortje appeal. Umpire takes an eternity before giving it out.
knee high full toss on fourth stump at 143 kph, Sams could've ended the match in one blow but miscues this to midwicket in the ring.
beamer slips out of Khaleel's hand trying for a slower ball yorker at 133 kph. It sails over Ramandeep's head. No ball called. Free hit to come with four runs to win.

knee high full toss on off, goes to whack this over the leg side but it comes off a top edge and swirls over third man backspinning into the rope. Mumbai Indians win by five wickets! RCB go on to the playoffs!
Length on the stumps, Ruturaj works it in the gap between square leg and midwicket
Good length outside off, driven to forward point with a fully open bat face
Pitches it up and takes it away with the angle at sixth stump. Ruturaj goes for the drive off the wobbling ball and gets beaten
Length on middle, defended to mid-off
Uppish flick but falls well in front of square leg. It was a fullish ball and swung in to leg. The flick was cautious but the swing made it uppish

Ruturaj goes for the flashing drive and gets caught behind! It was a full ball outside off, the ball was wobbling again. It was going away with the angle. The batter stood still and let his hands through the ball, it hit the bottom edge and Samson took an easy catch

Leading edge off a check-flick falls safely in front of mid-off! The length ball stuck in the wicket, Conway closed the bat-face too early and the ball ballooned over the right of the bowler. Mid-off came in but it was too far for him
Good length on fourth stump, dabbed to third man
Length outside off, Ali goes for the backfoot square drive and is beaten. That looked to have gotten extra bounce
Good length on off, defended with a slightly open bat face to the right of the bowler
Slightly shorter but on a good length around sixth stump. Ali wafts at it with an attempted cover drive. Beaten again
Length on the pads, nurdled to short-midwicket's right
Back of length just outside off, tapped to cover off the backfoot
Length on middle and off, gets behind it and defends it to the right of the bowler
Top-edge off the pull goes for six over the keeper's head! It was a proper short ball that came at shoulder height on fourth stump. Conway rotated on the hard pull, it sailed up and went far enough
Punches a length ball just outside off to mid-on with a shuffle across
Conway's trademark flick makes an appearance. He turns a length ball into a full one and lofts it over square leg for four. The post-shot flurry was apparent but not in all its grace
Clips a fullish ball on the stumps wide of deep-square leg, Yuzi stops it after a decent run. The bounce off the throw was awkward. Boult took it while going down with one hand
Pulls a length ball on the waist with full control. It went inside out over midwicket and into the fence
Makes room and creams the length ball on leg through cover. He got into a still position, drove it off the backfoot but with optimal power
Full on leg, it angles in and beats the flick. Goes to short third man on the ricochet
Makes room, Prasidh follows him with a back of length ball and he pulls it effortlessly behind square for an 80-metre six

Stands and slaps it to the right of the bowler, mid-off had no chance. The ball scooted to the fence. It was a length ball outside off. Prasidh stuck out his hand and retracted it in reflex. The timing was on point
Changes it up with a slower ball on a good length. Ali makes room and tries to play it straight. Inside edges it on to pad in front
Full on middle and off, clipped to wide mid-on
Comes down the track and slashes at the full ball on off. It slices off the bottom of the bat and clears cover. Long-off was on a long chase but could not stop it with a dive
Moeen makes room and Ashwin darts a yorker on leg. It's darted to the offside, just in front of square
Makes room and swings it over wide mid-on, goes inside out and midwicket and long-on can't stop it. It was a lofted flick.
Opens up the off side by making room, again, and going for a lofted cover drive this time. It was following him but he had made enough room to go through with the shot
Full on the pads, clipped to deep-midwicket
Picks up a full ball on the leg over deep backward square for six
Full on middle and leg, Moeen flicks it with ease. Goes aerial and lands it wide of square-leg in the deep-midwicket region for four
Flicks along the carpet this time, finds the gap to send the full ball just outside off far away from long-on. Buttler there, cannot chase it down
Moeen gets to a 19-ball 50 with an upper cut! It was a short ball over the stumps, he stayed leg side of the ball and went through with the cut. It went off the top edge over third man for four
Five boundaries in the over, and it's brought up with a backfoot square drive. It was on a length outside off. Moeen swung through it and the timing is as good as ever
Creams the cover drive to make it twenty six off the over!
Full on the legs, clipped to short fine leg
Good length just outside off, tapped with an open faced bat behind out. The first two balls have been 84 and 72 kph
FUll and slow but down leg. Conway goes for the fine sweep, manages to find short fine leg. McCoy went behind to his left and stops it.
Full outside off and Moeen launches the flighted ball over cover for another four! It bounced once and hit the car
Clips a good length ball on the pads to backward square-leg
Good length on off, negotiated cautiously with a flick to short-midwicket
Length outside off but that's outside the tramline. Looked like it slipped away from Ashwin's hand
Low full toss on the pads, whacks it to cow corner
Good length on off, reverses it along the ground to short third man

Misses the sweep, given LBW! Conway reviews It was full and Conway was on one knee, the offbreak came in and hit the front pad. He was in front of the stumps and the leg swept to the side in the follow-through. No bottom edge found on Ultra-Edge. It's clipping leg stump and Conway has to go. It hit the outer half of the pad and looked to be going further down leg than it seemed on first view. Just over a quarter of the ball was clipping the stumps but that's all that was needed
Good length on fourth stump, opens the bat face and guides it to deep backward point
Full on off, drives it off the inside half of the bat to the left of the bowler
Chops a length ball outside off to cover. Ashwin thumps his cap in the air and has a focused word with himself
Falls just wide of Ashwin at short fine leg! It was overpitched on leg stump, he flicked it to the right of the fielder. It looked to have fallen a bit short on first sight
Full ball pitches on off and goes across the batter with the angle. Beaten on the cover drive
Sees the batter make room and goes with a back of length ball following him. It's tapped on the move in a transitionary position

Low full toss is sliced to the left of mid-off, taken around the knee by Parag! It was a slow ball and Jagadeesan made room to open up the off side. The ball went off the bottom of the bat. Parag underarmed it nonchalantly after taking it. RR are back in this now!

Another batter is beaten on the cover drive! This time, it was Rayudu, whose eyes lit up by the overpitched ball outside off. It was angling away and beat the outside edge. There was very little foot movement there
Guides a length ball outside off to a few metres right of third man who stops it
Full down leg, beats the flick. Samson leaps to his left and stops it with one hand
Full on the stumps, clipped to long-on
Good length outside off, drives it to the left of cover. Hetmyer stops it with a slide
Yorker length ball on off, drives it to long-off
Length outside off, square driven to deep point
Full and flighted outside off, driven to long-off
Full outside off, driven to cover
Slow on a good length just outside off, spins in and is clipped to long-on

Edged and slip takes a low catch. It's sent upstairs through an umpire review The fingers are underneath the ball, so it is out! It was a full ball outside off, there was some turn. The bat-face was going towards cover as Rayudu pushed at it. It took the outside edge and the slip, who was placed on that ball, was in action!

Another legbreak outside off, MS is unsure of playing or leaving. As he was caught in two minds, the ball spun away and took the bottom edge around seventh stump. Playing with soft hands saves him as it went wide of slip
Full outside off, pushed to the left of the bowler

Chance for a caught behind missed! It was a length ball outside off that induced the cut. The bottom edge was found and Samson tried to bring his legs together and take it. But the ball missed the glove and fell on the ground to his left
Full outside off, lunges and pushes it to the left of cover for one
Pulls a length ball to deep backward square
Back of a length outside off, dabbed to the left of third man
Short ball over off stump tucks MS, shuffles and taps it in front on the backfoot flick on the move
Clips a back of length ball to deep-midwicket
Back of a length outside off, Moeen gets on top of the bounce and taps it with an angled bat towards point
MS sees through Boult's last ball, on a length outside off, with a gentle tap off the backfoot to cover
Cutter on a length at middle goes down leg with the angle. Moeen thinks of clipping it. Later lets it go
Back of length over off, tapped towards cover with an angled bat again

Edged and Samson flies to his right but the ball does not stick in the webbing! It came off a back of length and was going across the right hander. MS stood his ground and tried to steer it away from his body, it took the outside edge and Samson ended up parrying it towards third man
Full but well down leg. Left alone
Punches a length ball on the stumps to long-on
Low full toss with palpable dip just outside off has MS wait, adjust, and push it to the right of cover for one
Good length just outside off, it was an on-pace ball but looked like it stuck in the pitch. Moeen was early on the push and he directed it past the bowler
MS hops and clips a back of length ball around the pits to midwicket
Full on middle and leg, gently nudged to the right of midwicket
Yorker on off, opens the bat face and guides it to third man
Yorker length ball again on middle and leg, drilled to the left of the bowler who stops it well on the move
Good length on the stumps, flicked to deep-midwicket
Reaches out and drives a full, flighted ball outside off to long-off
Flat, length ball at the top of off. Moeen took the front leg out the way and went for the square drive. Went to short third man off the edge
Good length on middle, the legbreak rips to off and MS pushes it to cover
Boundary after 45 balls! MS rocks back for the length ball at 75 kph and pulls it in the air. One bounce, four to deep square leg
Full on off, flighted legbreak at 84 kph. Pushed to cover
Slightly shorter on a similar line, pushed with soft hands to the right of point. Cover ran in but there was enough time for the run
Full on off, clips it to the bowler's left
Good length ball pitches on leg and spins in sharply. Flighted again, went for the flick and it was uppish. But it went on the bounce to midwicket
Full outside off, opens the bat-face and directs the square drive to the right of third man
Back of length outside off, chopped into the ground. To point on the bounce
Bouncer over fourth stump at head-height has MS let it go. Signalled one for the over
Low full toss on fourth stump, stands still and drives it to cover
Short arm jab is checked by MS to pull the back of length outside off to the acreage at midwicket
Slower one into the pitch outside off, dabbed to third man off the backfoot
Makes room after a while, drives a length ball to cover

Top edge off the pull goes in the gap at midwicket, Neesham raced towards it and dove but could not reach it It was a short ball over fourth stump and Moeen played it with his eyes off as the head was swaying away. The top-edge made the ball balloon but there was a very big gap. Neesham's run was appreciably quick but not enough
Helps a low full toss on the legs behind square in the gap for four. It was a back of the hand slower ball. He shaped to make room which may have led McCoy to follow him
Length outside off, Moeen made room and couldn't reach with a lunge
Slower ball on a length just outside off beats the swinging bat
Back of length outside off, beaten on the cut
In the slot, and Dhoni whacks it over deep-midwicket for six. Taken excellently by a gentleman in the crowd.
Goes for the short ball with the third man in. It was outside off and MS tried to ramp it but it was too quick
Back of length outside off, drags the pull along the ground. Cow corner fielder runs to his right and keeps it to two
Slower one foxes MS. It was full and on off. He was squared up and tried to gently nudge it to leg. Went off the leading edge to cover
Back of length outside off angles away, cut to cover
Back of length outside off, close to the tramline but Moeen shuffled across and slashed in the air to deep point on the move

Sweeps a full ball on the pads on one knee, beats short fine and finds the boundary. It was flighted and bounced at knee-roll height after the lunge. Moeen gets into the 90s for the first time in the IPL.

Neesham runs in at deep-midwicket again and cannot reach it! It came after a good length ball on the stumps, the googly was swept in the air on the up. It landed in front, hit palms coming down and it shoot up but just behind him. Kept to one
Full outside off, driven along the carpet with a cross bat. Stopped by Neesham at deep cover with a run to his right and an athletic slide
Short arm jabs a length ball outside off to long-off
Inside edges a length ball outside off, he came down the ground and tried to whack it. Went to short fine leg. Moeen ends with a shake of the head
MS shapes to come down the pitch. Chahal sent it wide and slow, MS let it go as it was wide

Taken at long-on! Flighted outside off, the good length ball was heaved at with a cross bat. It took the top-edge and went straight up. Taken easily by long-on. Chahal does rather well in the 19th over. MS has to leave after being unable to make up after chewing up balls in attempt to rebuild the innings.
Whacked straight to long-off! Moeen has to leave without a century! It was full, outside off. The back of the hand slower ball took the bottom of the bat and went flat and slow to the fielder
Length ball outside off, beaten on the cut
Slower one on off, flicked to long-on. He had to adjust to the lack of pace late.
Length ball outside off, slapped to cover. Hit well, so the run is not on
Helps a slower ball into the pitch at waist-height to deep-backward square where Parag attacks it and keeps it to one
Back of length outside off, pulled to deep-midwicket. Two fielders converge, Neesham stops it
length ball on seventh stump at 138 kph, width there and smacks this on the up through extra cover to the rope.
similar length, similar line, similar shot. A touch fuller on seventh stump and moves away a touch too at 137 kph, this time Jaiswal punches this along the turf through extra cover to the rope again.
good length ball on fifth stump, miscues this punch into midwicket for one.
back of a length on the hips, goes back to flick this to square leg.
good length ball on middle, defended.
good length ball again on middle at 137 kph, goes back to defend and a thick edge goes to deep third man for two.
fullish length angled across the left-hander hugging the wide guideline outside off, scorches a drive through extra cover to the rope again. Hat-trick of fours through that zone for Jaiswal.
back of a length on the hips, goes back to pull and beaten for pace, goes off the thigh guard wide of Dhoni for an extra.
length ball on sixth stump at 136 kph, Buttler goes for a booming drive and misses.

edge to Moeen at slip! Similar ball in the seventh stump channel that moves away a touch at 134 kph, pushes with hard hands at this and no footwork, thick edge flies to Moeen's left at chest height and he reaches across his body to snatch this.
bouncer on sixth stump at 133 kph, left alone.
back of a length on sixth stump at 132 kph, punches this wide of Santner at cover sweeper for an easy two.
fullish length on sixth stump at 137 kph, driven straight to extra cover.
fullish length on sixth stump swinging away sharply beats a drive.
length ball on seventh stump swinging away at 137 kph, Jaiswal slashes at this and a thick edge flies over slip and beats deep third man to the rope.
first boundary on the leg side for Jaiswal in this knock! Short on fourth stump, leans back to lace this wide of midwicket and teases the man in the ring all the way to the rope.
speared in full on the pads, Jaiswal is late with a flick and it sputters off his pads into the covers for none.
goes for yorker, winds up slinging down a shin high full toss on middle that is flicked straight to midwicket in the ring.
length ball on seventh stump at 134 kph, no footwork, lame poke at this but Samson gets away with this thick edge that flies between second slip and short third man to the rope.
back of a length on fourth stump, flicked wide of mid-on for one.
length ball on fourth stump at 144 kph, punched to mid-off for one.
back of a length on fifth stump at 141 kph, punches this square to the point sweeper for one.
Jaiswal working to even out his wagon wheel now. Another short ball on fourth stump, another pull over midwicket, the occasion timed much more crisply, one bounce over the rope.
bouncer on middle at 137 kph, left alone swaying back.
fullish length angled across sixth stump, punched with elegance and timing through cover to the rope.
back of a length on fourth stump, punched firmly but straight to mid-off.
full on off, goes to drive for mid-off and a thick inside edge goes through square leg for one.
back of a length on fourth stump at 135 kph, defended to cover.
goes for yorker on the legs, winds up sending down a shin high full toss at 128 kph tailing past the legs, reaches out to flick this high over backward square leg to the rope.
short on the stumps, pulled tamely through midwicket for a long single as they decide against two.
good length ball on off, punched to extra cover for none.
back of a length on fifth stump, punched to the cover sweeper for one.
yorker on middle, defended to midwicket.
back of a length on the hips, flicks this fine past Dhoni to the fine leg rope.
short ball at 141 kph on sixth stump, goes to cut and beaten by pace and bounce.
good length slower ball on off, defended back to the bowler.
Jaiswal is going back to peppering the cover boundary. Back of a length slanted across fifth stump, punched wide of the sweeper to the rope.
good length ball on fifth stump, defended.
good length ball on fourth stump, punched to long-off for one.
back of a length on the legs, flicked to deep midwicket for one.
fullish length on the legs, flicked through midwicket for one.
back of a length on middle, defended gently into the ground.
138 kph delivery slings it sidearm like Malinga with a release point in line with the umpire's head and lands on a good length on off, defended.
wild slingshot well down leg side, Dhoni with not the greatest effort trying to stop this and goes for five wides.
good length ball on fifth stump, defended into the off side.
short ball at 136 kph tails down leg side for another wide.
full on fifth stump, squirts a drive behind point for one.
full on sixth stump at 138 kph, punched to cover.
full on seventh stump at 133 kph, slams a drive straight to Santner at extra cover.
back of a length on the body, flicked to deep fine leg for one.
good length ball on off, defended to cover.
good length ball on middle, defended tamely back to Santner.

superbly athletic catch from Santner! He flights this a touch more on a fullish length on off, the ball stops a touch as Samson tries to smash this through mid-off and instead he whacks it back toward Santner above head head. But he's in a great reactionary ready position to leap up high and pluck this reaching with both hands above his head to intercept it.
good length ball outside off, punched into the off side.
full on the legs, flicked through midwicket for a well-run two.
full on sixth stump, driven along the turf to long-off for one.
full on off, mistimes a sweep into the leg side.
good length ball on middle, tries to tip and run into midwicket but doesn't time it well enough to get it into a gap.
good length ball on the legs, firm flick this time through midwicket for one.
good length ball on middle, defended to cover.
full on the legs, driven to long-off for one.
full on middle, smothered on the front foot.
back of a length on off, defended awkwardly into the off side.
yorker on off, chipped out to long-on for one.
back of a length on off, punched into cover for a sharp single.
bouncer on off at 133 kph, cramped for room trying to uppercut this over Dhoni and is beaten.
attempted yorker lands full on off at 130 kph, times this back into the non-striker's stumps.
full on fifth stump, scuffs a drive to extra cover.
good length ball on off, sweeps this to deep backward square for one.

flights this again on a fullish length to tease Padikkal into a sweep but it's not really full enough for the shot and the ball stops a touch as he swings over this. The top of leg and middle stump is rattled.
fullish length on off, punched gently to long-on for one.
back of a length on fifth stump, punched to the cover sweeper for one.
full on fifth stump, driven along the turf to long-on for one.
back of a length on the legs, flicked to long-on for one.
drag down slanted across fourth stump, goes back to cut behind point for one.
fullish length on off, goes to punch straight and a leading edge flies wide of cover in the ring for one.
good length slanted across fourth stump, leans back to cut to the sweeper for one.
darts this in quicker on the legs, flicked straight to short fine leg.
very full on middle, miscues a drive off the pads and dribbles back to Santner.
fullish length on fifth stump, punched in the air to long-off for one.
Ashwin charges the first ball after the break and clobbers a fullish length ball high and deep over wide long-on, clears the rope by 25 yards and makes it into the second row of the stands.
short on the body, pulls this flat along the turf through square leg for one.
back of a length on off, goes back to punch through cover for one to bring up a 39-ball half-century.
back of a length on middle, beats Ashwin in flight coming down the track and checks this into midwicket for none.
stays in his crease this time to guide a good length ball from off stump fine of Dhoni for one to short third man.
fullish length on middle, sweeps this flat to deep backward square for one.
charges a full ball on leg stump, drives this high and mighty over long-on, landing over the roof of the Royals dugout.
quicker ball lands outside leg, misses a pull and thuds off the pads before going by Dhoni for a leg bye.
fullish length ball on off, chipped away down the ground for one.
drag-down outside leg, pulled flat through square leg, diving stop on the rope keeps this to two.

another half-tracker outside leg, another mistimed heave trying to go for six and he picks out Pathirana at deep backward square leg, who runs 10 yards to his left, almost overruns the ball before recovering to reach back to his right for a theatrical catch 10 yards inside the rope.
full on the stumps, defended.
back of a length on middle, goes back to flick through midwicket for one.
fullish length on the stumps, defended.
short on fifth stump, backs away to cut to cover in the ring.
back of a length on middle, goes back to punch to long-off for one.
back of a length on the legs, flicked through square leg for one.
back of a length skidding toward fourth stump, goes back to cut and chops this tamely into the ground dribbling toward point for one.
full on fourth stump, sizzling drive whistles through mid-off and beats long-off to the rope.

floated full outside leg stump, goes for a massive slog sweep but skies this off a top edge to long-on. Hetmyer looked scratchy for his brief stay barring the boundary off the previous ball. This one hangs in the air forever as Conway comes in 20 yards off the rope before settling on his knees to cushion the take at rib height.
full on fifth stump, driven firmly but straight back to Solanki.
full on fifth stump, driven to long-on for one.
flighted full on seventh stump, goes to sweep and misses.

Ashwin repeats the slog sweep this time, but gets in line much better to this ball floated on the wide guideline having shuffled way outside off stump to line it up much better and slaughters it flat over the wide midwicket rope.
wide slinged down the leg side at 127 kph.
fullish length on the stumps, chipped wide of long-on for two.
slower length ball lands short on fourth stump and sits up for Parag to whip over midwicket. Boundary rider is closer to cow corner and can't cut this off running to his right.
wide yorker at 142 kph lands just inside the guideline and Parag can't get bat on this.
fullish length on sixth stump, punched to mid-off for one.
short ball picked easily by Ashwin on sixth stump and he brings out the uppercut to lift this easily over short third man. Poor ball but a smart shot.

yorker zings Ashwin well outside leg stump and caroms to point for a leg bye. Dhoni goes for DRS immediately. This one doesn't have a prayer of being overturned. The ball pitched outside leg, hit Ashwin outside leg, was missing leg... Other than that, it had plenty going for it! Review lost.
length ball on sixth stump, Ashwin shuffles across to get in line for this 133 kph ball and punches to mid-off for one.
fullish length on sixth stump, skews a drive aiming for midwicket and it goes high toward the cover sweeper but it lands well in front of him for one.
misfires the yorker getting it full on off at 136 kph, Ashwin winds up with the three wood and drives this powerfully high and deep over wide long-on for a 93-meter blow.
full on fifth stump, in the slot for Ashwin to drive wide of the cover sweeper for two.
full and wide on seventh stump, slices a drive to deep third man for one.
short ball on seventh stump, hacks a pull into the ground back toward Choudhary, who leaps up trying to collect it off a bounce but fumbles it to allow a crucial single.
slings down an attempted yorker that winds up as a full toss on the legs at shin height. The ball goes into cover for a leg bye after a missed flick. Replays show it hit him outside leg stump.

pure class from Ash! Backs away from leg stump as Pathirana slings this on a good length on sixth stump, Ashwin adjusts to poke this in the air behind point and beats the sweeper. Ashwin thumps his chest afterward like a boss.

full on sixth stump, Ashwin tries to guide this away through third man again but an inside edge goes to fine leg for one. He jogs to the non-striker's end and pumps his fist in the air with a leap as scores are now level.
yorker squirts past off stump at 143 kph past Parag's wild heave.
wide yorker, too wild and it lands outside the guideline outside off. Victory achieved for Rajasthan who clinch second place!
fuller on the pads, and Saha clips it fine, to the right of long leg and picks up the boundary. Off the mark in style
fuller around middle this time, Saha pushes it towards mid-on
length ball around off, opens the face of the bat to guide it towards point
fuller around off and Saha goes over mid-on this time. And it sails all the way for a six. The two fielders outside the circle are third man and fine leg, so Saha didn't have to worry much
length ball outside and moving away. Saha was rooted to the crease and tries to reach there with his hands. Gets beaten
driven on the up! It was on the fuller side but not a half-volley. Saha came on the front foot and drove it through extra cover for the third boundary of the over
fuller around off, pushes it towards long-off for one
length ball around off, comes forward and defends it towards covers
fuller outside off, Saha gets down on one knee and sweeps it over midwicket. He has raced away to 18 off just eight balls
flatter on the pads. Tucked away in front of square leg for a quick single
fuller on the stumps, punched back towards the bowler who makes the stop
an appeal for lbw but given not out. Was a length ball that skidded on to beat the inside edge. Was it going down? It looked close to me
a length ball outside off, Saha goes for the cut but misses. The keeper collects it on the bounce
length ball around off, Saha drops it behind square of the wicket on the off side. Gill is quick to spot the single and sprints to the other end

screamer from Maxwell! A length ball outside off. Gill pokes at it and gets an outside edge that goes to the right of Maxwell. He dives full length to his right and grabs it with one hand. The slip was brought in just before this ball
fuller around off, comes forward and punches it towards short extra cover
length ball angling across. Beats Wade as he looks to defend it. In fact, almost squared him up
length outside off, goes for the cut but there isn't enough room for that. Ends up chopping it into the ground. Dribbles towards slip
length ball around off and spinning in, goes back and punches it towards extra cover
length ball around off, goes back and forces it towards mid-on
length ball on the pads, nudged behind square leg for one
length ball on the stumps, flicked towards square leg
flatter on the stumps, worked in front of square leg this time. Gets the single
length outside off, goes for the cut but the ball comes slower off the surface. Chopped towards backward point
pulled away for four! A length ball, perhaps slightly short but Wade was ready to pull it anyway. Didn't time it to the perfection but it raced away through the vacant midwicket region
length ball around off, punched towards cover
down the track and this time there's nothing wrong with the timing. Smashes it over deep midwicket for his first six
length ball around off, goes for the cut but it's too close. Chopped towards covers
sloppy! A misfield by Hasaranga at cover-point. Fuller length around off, Wade drives it to Hasaranga's left but he is late to bend and lets it go through for four
short of length on the stumps, tucked away towards midwicket
length ball around off, pushed towards covers

given lbw but Wade wants to review this. A length ball angling towards the stumps. Wade moves across, gets low and tries to sweep it fine. There's no bat involved and the ball-tracker shows it would have gone on to hit middle and leg. So the on-field decision stands
fuller length around off, comes forward and pushes it on the off side
beats the outside edge. A length ball around off, Pandya plays for the turn and looks to push it down the ground but the ball goes straight and beats him
length outside off, cuts it towards cover-point
length again, just outside off. Pandya once again finds cover-point with the cut
length ball around off, pushed on the off side
length around off, punched back but the bowler fumbles and allows a single
short of length outside off, goes back and cuts it towards wide long-off
fuller around off, drives it through covers. Harshal at sweeper cover puts in the slide to his left to keep it to two
length ball around off and spinning away. Saha goes back and whips it towards deep midwicket
fuller around off and Pandya tees off! Launches it over long-on for a six
starts with a short ball around off, Saha rocks back and pulls it through midwicket for four
fuller on the stumps, comes forward and works it towards square leg
short of length around off, goes back and cuts it towards sweeper cover
fuller down the leg side. Saha goes for the paddle sweep but cannot make the connection. Given a wide
runs at the bowler but isn't to the pitch of the ball. But he manages to work it past short fine leg for one
length around off, stays back and cuts it towards backward point
length ball around off, punched towards deep point for one
length ball outside off, pushes it through extra cover and comes back for the second
length outside off, cuts it to the right of sweeper cover and collects two more

Saha is run out. A length ball around off, Pandya pushes it past a diving extra cover. Pandya set off immediately but Saha was late to respond, looking at the fielder and perhaps waiting for the ball to beat him. du Plessis at mid-off was quick to the ball and nailed the direct hit at the striker's end. Saha was way, way short
a yorker outside off. Jams his bat but cannot make the connection
fuller outside off, punched through covers where the fielder gets a hand on it. That slows it down and allows mid-off to chase and stop it just inside with a slide
fuller around off, punched solidly towards mid-off
short of length around off, looks to force it through the off side but the ball comes slow off the wicket. Hardik ends up mistiming it towards mid-on
length ball on the pads, flicked towards deep square leg
length ball around off, punched towards sweeper cover
Dropped! Fuller around off, Hardik goes for the big hit, tries to clear long-on but he hasn't middled it. Suyash Prabhudessai is in with a chance but he ends up parrying it over the rope
fuller around off, goes for a slog sweep but fails to connect and loses his grip too and the bat flies towards square leg
good length ball on fourth stump, punched to long-off for one.
roundarm slingshot googly lands on fourth stump and spins in, defended.
good length ball on fourth stump, defended to point.
googly on off stump on a good length spins in, defended.
good length ball on off, prods forward to defend and edges this wide of the keeper to the third man rope.
good length ball on off, punched to long-off for one.
back of a length on fifth stump at 118 kph, punched to long-off for one.
fullish length on fifth stump, goes to drive and an inside edge goes to fine leg for one.
goes for yorker but fires in a knee high full toss on off, punched along the turf to long-on for one.
back of a length on off at 125 kph, defended to backward point.
wide yorker on fifth stump, jammed out to the cover sweeper for one.
short on sixth stump, goes to cut and slices this just wide of the point sweeper's diving effort to the rope.
short on the stumps, pulls this flat through midwicket for one.
another roundarm slingshot lands short on sixth stump, cut to the sweeper for one.
googly lands fractionally short on fifth stump, goes back to punch this into the off side but picks out extra cover on the ring.
short on the legs, goes back to flick through midwicket for two.
good length ball on the legs, flicked through midwicket again this time just for one.
full on middle at 84 kph, defended back to Hasaranga.
good length ball on fifth stump, punched to the cover sweeper for one.

deft from Hardik waiting for a good length ball on off stump with soft hands gliding this fine of the keeper and it trickles toward the third man rope before Kaul gives chase from the ring to slap it back into play for three.
darted in quicker on off, jammed out to extra cover.
slings this roundarm and full on seventh stump, plenty of width for Miller to club this high and deep over long-off.

drag down by Maxwell now trying to overcompensate after going too full the previous ball, this just sits up on middle and Miller hammers it off the back foot beyond the midwicket rope onto the covered tarp seats at field level.
good length ball slides down leg past a flick, wide called.
good length ball on the legs, flicked off the back foot to long-on for one.
good length ball slanted across fourth stump, prods forward and is beaten.
good length ball on the legs, goes back to flick to the leg side for one.
good length ball on fifth stump, slapped to long-off for one.
quicker ball slanted on a good length across the wide guidelines outside off. Didn't look kosher watching live and Miller shakes his head after the umpire keeps his arms at his sides.
overpitched full on middle, Miller creams a drive over long-on 10 rows back into the second tier stands.
good length ball on fourth stump, punched to long-off for one.
full on fifth stump, driven to mid-off.
short and wide at 126 kph, slaps a cross bat shot to cover on the ring.
goes for yorker and fires in a shin high full toss on fourth stump at 133 kph that is whipped to long-on for one.
short on the stumps at 130 kph, pulled flat through. midwicket for one.
bouncer on fifth stump at 131 kph beats Hardik attempting to uppercut this over third man.
full on fourth stump at 135 kph, whips this along the turf through midwicket for one.
good length ball on off, goes back to flick through midwicket for one.

sharp return catch at head height! Floats this up full on middle, Miller unleashes a blistering drive but Hasaranga is in a solid position to have his hands ready in front of his face and intercepts it to prevent a trip to the dentist and/or some rhinoplasty.
good length ball on the legs, flicked through midwicket for one.
good length ball on middle, punched to long-on for one.
floated full on middle, sweeps this half-heartedly and it floats well short of deep backward square for one.
googly on sixth stump on a good length at 84 kph spins in, punched to wide long-off for one.
short ball on fourth stump at 130 kph, Hardik shuffled across and is cramped for room as a result trying to pull but a top edge goes over the keeper to the third man rope.
good length ball on the legs, late on a flick and it dribbles off the pads through square leg for an extra.
length ball on fifth stump, very thin bottom edge but clearly audible on a misfired pull, mild appeal for caught behind is given. Tewatia walks off with an uncommon failure.
short ball on fifth stump at 130 kph, short arm pull with his arms tucked into his ribs and drags this through midwicket for one.
short and wide at 132 kph, slices a cut that picks out backward point on the ring.
slower ball lands back of a length on middle at 120 kph, flicked gently through midwicket for one.
yorker speared in on off at 134 kph, jammed out to long-on for one.
slower length ball on seventh stump at 117 kph, Rashid keeps his hands back long enough to swat this just beyond the rope at long-off.
wide yorker on seventh stump at 137 kph is scuffed through mid-on for one.
bouncer on middle, top edged pull to a 131 kph delivery swirls over the keeper and goes to the fine leg rope for a 42-ball half-century.
yorker on middle at 137 kph, jammed out well by Hardik and it trickles toward short fine leg for one.

full length and fully smashed into the second tier! Kaul tried to slip in a knuckleball slower delivery at 117 kph near the wide guideline but again Rashid adjusts very well and carts this off the facade of the mezzanine over long-off.
the second-tier is being peppered all around the ground now! Length ball sits up and is swatted into the second row of the second deck for a 98 meter strike.
short ball on middle at 128 kph, flubs a pull off a top edge that floats gently toward the edge of the ring at vacant midwicket and they come back for an easy two.

missed runout! Botched horribly in fact. Yorker on fifth stump, jammed out to extra cover. They take on a suicide run because there's only four balls left in the inning. The fielder fires a panicky and unnecessarily strong throw to Hazlewood over the bowler's stumps. It's too hot to handle and he winds up breaking the stumps without the ball in hand.
length ball on the body, smashes this on the up deep over midwicket landing just short of the second tier onto the covered tarp stands at field level.
slower ball bouncer on fourth stump at 125 kph, goes to uppercut this over short third man, thick edge flutters just short of the man on the ring and they take one.

yorker fired in on fourth stump at 136 kph, jammed out to long-on for what should be two. Rashid is charging hard and definitely would have made the second but... Hardik bizarrely turns him back and Rashid returns after being halfway down the wicket. They settle for the longest single ever off a final ball of a T20 innings.
length ball around off, punches it to the left of mid-off and sets off. Pandya aims at the bowler's end but misses. Think Kohli would have been in
fuller on the pads, goes for the flick but misses. Brushes the pads on its way to the keeper, who dives across to pouch it. A mild appeal for caught-behind. No response from the umpire
fuller around off, pushes it towards cover
length ball around off and middle. Dropped towards cover
length ball outside off, du Plessis stays back and punches it through covers for four
length ball angling in towards the stumps, defended back
starts with a length ball around off. Kohli pushes at it, gets an outside edge past the slip fielder. A single to third man
fuller around off, driven but straight towards mid-off
fuller around off, flicked to the right of mid-on
length ball around off, steered towards point
short of length outside off, dabbed behind point for one

short of length around off, du Plessis looks to push at it off the back foot but the ball bounces a bit extra and moves away as well to surprise the batter and beat him. Wade collects it on the volley
short of length outside off, drops on the off side and looks for a quick single but du Plessis sends him back
nonchalantly done. Shami bowls fuller around off, and ends up bowling right in the slot. Kohli goes aerial, over the bowler's head for one-bounce four
Shami strays down the leg side this time and the ball moves further away. Five wides for RCB
beauty! A length ball wide outside off and moving away. Kohli cases it and gets beaten
slightly fuller and Kohli once again takes the aerial route. Opens the face of the bat on impact and hits it over covers to pick up another four
length ball on the stumps, nudges it towards mid-on and sets off
streaky! A length ball around off and seaming back. du Plessis is cramped and gets an inside edge that just misses the stumps and races away to the fine-leg boundary
length ball around off, pushes it towards cover-point
another streaky boundary. A length ball around off, Kohli goes for the cut but it's too close. Gets an inside edge past the stumps. Four more to fine leg

dropped by Rashid Khan! Kohli moves towards the leg side and picks it up towards deep square leg. Rashid is a few yards in, and had to leap for it. He gets a hand on it, behind his body but it doesn't stick. Looks like Rashid has hurt himself as he fell down. He is holding his thigh/hip joint
short of length outside off, dabbed towards backward point
length ball down the leg side. Kohli fails to connect the flick
length ball on the stumps, pushed towards midwicket. They run the first one hard but that's all they will get
fuller on the stumps, du Plessis clears his front leg and hits it to through midwicket
fuller on the stumps, whipped towards deep midwicket and they come back for the second
fuller around off and middle, comes forward and flicks it towards midwicket. Only a single this time
length ball around off, a googly. du Plessis stays back and works it towards midwicket
glorious! Fuller on the stumps, Kohli goes straight, over the head. Didn't try to over-hit it but held his shape and presented the full face of the bat, extending the arms. One-bounce four
worked towards midwicket for one
fuller around off, looks to push at it but gets a thick outside edge towards point
length ball angling across. Steered towards point
length ball on the stumps, defended back
length ball angling across, slogged towards midwicket. Didn't middle it but got enough on it to fetch four
length ball on the stumps, Kohli looks to work it on the leg side but checks his shot in the end. It looked like he was a touch early into his shot. The short midwicket cuts it off
a slower one, fuller on the pads. Kohli nudges it to the bowler's right and sets off
107.6kph. Another slower one, full and wide outside off. du Plessis reaches out and hits it towards mid-off. Another quick single
fuller on the stumps, pushed towards long-on
fuller around off, lunges forward and pushes it towards extra cover
length ball on the stumps, comes forward to defend. Gets an inside edge that goes behind square leg
length ball on the stumps, angling in at 95.7kph. du Plessis works it towards forward square leg
length ball on the stumps, flicked towards deep square leg
length ball around off, goes back and forces it past extra cover for a couple
smashed! down the track, gives himself some room and smashes it through covers. Was in the air but in the gap
length ball around off, punches towards mid-off for a quick single
length ball on the pads, helps it behind square leg for one
fuller around off, driven to the right of mid-off. Pandya dives across to make the stop and then nails the direct hit at the bowler's end but Kohli was in
a slower one. Fuller and wide outside off. du Plessis looks to go over extra cover but the ball hits the outer half of the bat and goes over point for four
length outside off, cuts it towards backward point
fuller length around off, driven towards long-off

fuller around off, whips it inside out towards wide long-off and they sprint back for the second. There has been a collision at the bowler's end, between Kohli and Sai Kishore. Sai Kishore was pedalling back to collect the throw and Kohli was charging to get his bat in. Kohli is flat on the ground but looks okay
length outside off, pushes it towards point
length ball around off, punched towards sweeper cover
length ball around middle and off, grips and spins way to beat the outside edge as Kohli looks to defend
length ball on the stumps, punched towards long-on

gets to his fifty in style. Off 33 balls. Fuller on the leg stump, Kohli clears his front leg and launches it over deep midwicket. Sid Monga tells me that this is Kohli's first-ever six off Rashid in T20s
worked towards long-on for a single
length ball around off, goes back and pushes it towards sweeper cover
worked towards deep midwicket for one.
fuller on the stumps, goes over the bowler's head but ends up mistiming it for one.
good length outside off, punched to the off side by Faf for one.
good length ball on middle, defended.
fullish length on off, prodded wide of the bowler to long-off for one.
full on off, driven firmly to long-off for one.
fullish length on off, tip and run into the off side for one. Hardik fumbles it charging in trying to deny the run.
back of a length on fifth stump, slapped wide of long-off for two.
fullish length on fifth stump at 145 kph, driven to long-off for one.
short and wide on seventh stump at 142 kph, carves a cut wide of the sweeper Rashid who tumbles to his right to keep this to two.
slower ball back of a length on middle at 115 kph, paddled with a short arm jab behind square for one.
slower ball again lands on a fullish length on sixth stump, driven firmly to the cover sweeper for one.
length ball sits up on fourth stump at 144 kph, pulled flat through midwicket to the rope.
good length ball on middle at 124 kph, defended back to Ferguson.
good length ball on fourth stump, punched off the back foot aiming for mid-off but Sai shuffles left to cut off a single off his own bowling.
fuller on middle, defended again to Sai.
back of a length on fifth stump, defended again to extra cover.
low full toss on fifth stump driven to wide long-off for one.
fullish length on the legs, flicked to deep midwicket for one.
back of a length on middle, punched to long-on for one.
fullish length on fifth stump, driven through the off side for one.
length ball on fifth stump at 141 kph, smashed straight to extra cover.
slower ball lands back of a length on middle, flicked through midwicket for one.
slower ball at 106 kph lands on a fullish length wide outside off, slices a drive that backspins high over backward point to the rope.
good length ball on off at 139 kph, punched to long-off for one.
slower ball lands short and wide at 106 kph, slaps this to the cover sweeper for one.
very full on middle, backs away to punch through extra cover, diving effort by Hardik to his right gets a hand to it to slow it down.
prods forward to a good length ball, thick edge goes wide of short third man for one.

flighted full on middle, Faf goes to slog sweep this and a stock legbreak results in a top edge that swirls over cover. Hardik runs back from the ring in controlled fashion and takes a crisp over the shoulder catch.

the ball hits the stumps but the bails don't come off! Googly landing on off spins past Maxwell's slog sweep first ball. Rashid sees one of the zing bails on leg stump light up and runs off with his right arm and index finger raised in celebration before realizing that the bails have not completely dislodged as the ball goes to the fine leg rope for four byes.
back of a length on fifth stump, goes back to flick into midwicket for one.
full outside off, driven to the cover sweeper for one.
good length ball at 133 kph on middle, goes back to flick into midwicket for one.
full on the stumps, shovels this a mile high and it barely clears the rope on the straight boundary at long-on.
length ball on the hips at 137 kph, shuffles across and flicks this over deep backward square to the rope.
back of a length at 141 kph follows Maxwell backing away from leg missing a wild heave.
Maxwell turning the extraordinary into the ordinary! Fullish length ball on middle, Maxwell hops around in his crease to switch the grip and reverse this over the third man rope.
short on middle at 134 kph, pulls this flat through midwicket for one.
full on the stumps, backs away for a big heave and scuffs an inside edge behind square for one.
flighted too full on fourth stump, Kohli with a supremely elegant lofted drive that clears long-off by 15 yards.
comes forward to a good length ball on off, defended to midwicket.

googly accounts for Kohli! He came charging trying to smash another six to end the game in a hurry but doesn't get anywhere close to the pitch of this ball dragged back on off stump that spins through the gap between bat and pad and past leg stump. Wade is waiting for the ball shuffling left before taking the bails off.
good length ball on middle, flicked into midwicket gently for one.
generously flighted delivery on leg stump at 70 kph, might be the slowest delivery Rashid has bowled in his IPL career, and Maxwell waits on this to chip it gently into the leg side for one.
back of a length on the stumps, flicked through the leg side.
full outside off, goes to reverse and misses.
slower bouncer balloons with extra helium way way way over Maxwell. Wide called.
another slower ball lands short and wide, slashes this high over cover and goes over the rope on one bounce.
slower yorker on leg stump at 109 kph, jammed out into midwicket for one.
length ball outside off, slapped through cover for one.
slower ball on a length, pulls this through midwicket for one.
length ball on fifth stump, slams this on the up over mid-off to the rope.
back of a length on fourth stump, cramped for room trying to cut and beaten for pace.
similar ball back of a length cramping Maxwell for room but this time leans back to play more of an uppercut and carts this over short third man.
short on the stumps, goes to pull and a top edge clears the keeper bouncing to the rope. RCB win it with eight balls to spare by eight wickets.
Starts off with a full ball on the pads, that's pushed gently to midwicket.
Back of a length now, on the hips. QdK hops and tucks it away to fine leg to get to the other end.
Fuller and swinging in a bit. Rahul shuffles across and plays it with soft hands to the on side and gets going.
Fuller outside off, de Kock gets it off the inner half towards midwicket. Russell gets to the ball and hits the stumps at the bowler's end and they take another off the overthrow.
Just enough to get it over the keeper! Back of a length on the body, QdK pulls and gets a top edge over the wicketkeeper for the first boundary of the game.
Length ball outside off, punched towards covers.
Back of a length around off and middle, tucked away to the on side.
Fuller and angling in, Rahul works it to fine leg for one.

Poor line. Easy pickings. Very full, swinging in on the pads. De Kock just flicks it through backward square leg. Fine leg was in the ring and deep square leg was in place. No chance of cutting that off.
Much better. Full and swinging in, just outside off. QdK just squeezes it back towards the bowler.
Crisp sound of the ball hitting bat. But driven straight to the man at mid-off.
Bowls it on a length wide outside off, cut away towards point where a slight misfield allows a single.
Wanted to bash that but didn't get a hold of it. He walks across to bish the full ball down the ground but only toe-ends it to mid-on.

Third man.... shells it! Not the first impression Tomar wanted to make in the IPL. He was a tad unsure and didn't judge that well at all. de Kock looks to hoick the length ball across the line and gets a top edge. Should have been a regulation chance but Tomar was late to pick it and get to it.
Fuller around middle, pushed to mid-on.
Length ball around off, defended on the crease.
Pure timing, but just one. On a length outside off, Rahul steers it past backward point for one.

He's hit that alright! Dismissed from his presence. Back of a length ball around middle and leg, this time he stands tall and smashes across the line. All the way over deep midwicket. Umesh must be thinking QdK shouldn't have been there but such is life.
Loopy slow one around middle, Rahul turns it with the spin through square leg and picks up a brace.
On a length around middle, turned to midwicket.
Goes back to the length ball, allows it to turn before flicking it through square leg for one.
Fuller around off, turns after landing. Gets it off the outer half to point.
Pulls his length back a bit, allowing de Kock to push it towards cover-point and hare to the other end.
Length ball outside off, Rahul goes back and slaps it straight to covers. Feels he has missed out on a chance.
How did that miss the stumps? Length ball around middle and leg, de Kock moved across to scoop it early. Missed it completely. Bounced comfortably over the stumps. Seemed closer on the first go.
Now he gets the attempted pull high on the bat towards square leg and takes a run. QdK wanting to make a move.
Now that's intent from Rahul. Walks across and flicks it high and long over long leg. It was a length ball around middle and leg.
Length ball outside off, punched to covers.

Southee lets it through. Slides around the ball and concedes a four. Rahul made room early to exploit the larger gap between covers and mid-off and almost didn't succeed, with Umesh bowling it on a length away from him. Southee made a hash after running to his left from mid-off.
Punched to the left of backward point who keeps it down to one with a dive.
Quicker one on a length, slanting in. Rahul goes back and punched it to midwicket.
Ufff! Now that DID miss the stumps by a whisker. Tossed up around off and middle, bounced more that Rahul expected. Beat him completely even as he made room to go over the off side.
Quicker on the pads, turned around the corner for one.
As authoritative as it gets. de Kock makes room and gets underneath the full ball on middle to hit it over cover for four.

What happened there? Mid-on got to his right but instead of throwing it to the bowler, lost his balance and threw it towards mid-off. No extra run than the one that QdK stole after his straight push was parried towards mid-on by Varun.
Around off and middle, turned to the on side for none.
Quicker on middle, on a length. de Kock works it through midwicket for one.
Flatter around off, speared at over 97 clicks. Punched to covers.
A tad shorter outside off, cut away firmly. Venky stops it with a slide to his right at point.
Fuller on middle and leg, Rahul pushes it towards long-on for one.
On a length on the pads, turned away through backward square leg for a single.
Full outside off, goes away after landing. Rahul drives it through cover-point for one.
Tossed up outside off, goes away. Rahul misses his drive.
Super shot! Tossed up full on off, it was the carrom ball. Rahul drills it past the bowler and gets four. Brings up the 50 partnership.
Tossed up full outside off, turned away towards midwicket for one.
Chakravarthy bowls a bouncer that surprises de Kock and amuses Billings! QdK asks the ump is it one for the over. He looked to pull but missed it completely. Was fired in at over 108 kph.
Fuller around middle and leg, worked through midwicket for one.
Outside off, a tad shorter. Rahul hits it to backward point.
A touch shorter, Rahul goes back and works it through midwicket for a couple.
Back of a length, slanting away. QdK punches it through backward point for one.
Excellent effort by Rana at backward point. Dives full length to his right to save a certain boundary. Rahul made room to a length ball and punched it towards point. Will get just one.
On a length outside off, mistimes the punch to mid-off.
Length ball outside off, de Kock chips it over the bowler's head for two. He was early into the shot and adjusted it well in the end.
This is out of his sight! Picks the slower ball early and thumps it over square leg for a 79-metre hit.
Short and wide outside off, punched through covers for one. Rinku does well from sweeper to keep it to one.
Length ball outside off, punched to sweeper for one.
Heave ho! Just manages to cross the boundary cushion! It is the length ball, Rahul expects it. Stands back and hits it over deep midwicket. Crosses 500 runs for the season.
This is higher and longer! Another length ball on middle, gets out the flick and connects it for a 91-metre six over deep square leg.
Length ball on middle, worked through midwicket for one.
Length ball on off, at a slower pace. De Kock adjusts and ends up playing back towards the bowler.
Fuller and angling in, worked away through square leg for one.
good length on sixth stump, cut firmly to the point sweeper.
back of a length on the hips, goes back to flick behind square for one.
flights this generously on fifth stump but lands it too short, sits up for de Kock to go back and slap this disdainfully through extra cover, sweeper has no chance.
darted in fuller and quicker on fourth stump, scuffs a drive into midwicket for one.
low full toss on the stumps, driven along the turf to long-on for one.
full on the stumps, flicked through the leg side for one.
good length ball on the legs, flicked into the leg side.
full on sixth stump, sweeps this to deep midwicket for one.
slings down an Afridi style seam up delivery at medium pace, de Kock isn't fooled and flicks this to long-on for one to bring up a half-century off 36 balls.
flights a knee high full toss on seventh stump, flayed wide of the cover sweeper and Rinku cuts it off to keep it to two.
good length ball on middle, defended back to the bowler.
flighted full on sixth stump, skids on past a forward prod.
short on sixth stump, slapped behind point for one.
fractionally short on fourth stump, cut to the sweeper for one.
good length ball on middle, defended.
hello! de Kock breaks out the reverse sweep and sends it over the third man rope for six! Flighted full on middle, carts this over the off side and clears the rope.
darted in quicker on middle, defended.
another full ball zipped in on off stump, defended back to Narine.
back of a length on fourth stump, punched through cover for one.
short on the hips, pulled behind square, cut off at deep backward square with a superb one-handed effort reaching left by Narine.
wide yorker on fourth stump, punched to the sweeper for one.
full on the stumps, driven to long-on for one.
back of a length on fifth stump, punched to the sweeper for one. Another IPL fifty for Rahul, the 30th of his career. This time off 41 balls.
yorker on fifth stump, jammed out to mid-off for a sharp single.
full on the stumps, slog sweeps this over deep backward square and clears the ropes.
back of a length on off, tip and run into the covers. Wild throw from Billings racing out from behind the stumps nearly hits de Kock in the head going for the non-striker's end.
short on the stumps, slapped to wide long-on for one.
short on middle, pulls this flat to deep backward square to Russell for one.
back of a length on fifth stump, Rahul beaten in flight charging down the track, goes through with a punch to long-off anyway for one.
edge! Dropped! de Kock goes back to punch a back of a length delivery on fourth stump, very fine edge deflects off Billings' gloves and trickles away for one.
good length ball on leg stump, de Kock premeditates a shuffle across and sweeps this flat over deep fine leg for six.
back of a length on sixth stump, chops a cross bat shot tamely back to Chakravarthy.
sayonara! de Kock says goodbye to another half-tracker sending it into orbit over deep square leg.
de Kock is peppering both boundaries square of the wicket now to keep things balanced. Another half-tracker but this time wide outside off, slapped through to the point rope.
full on middle, flicked to midwicket for one.
back of a length on the legs, flicked through midwicket for one.
length ball on off, Rahul shuffles across to scoop this over the keeper to the rope. Safe shot with fine leg up in the ring.
back of a length on off, punched through cover for one.
back of a length, punched to extra cover for one off a misfield.
length ball on fifth stump, heaved to deep midwicket for one.
short on fifth stump, goes to cut and miscues this into the ground back to Southee.

Southee bowls this back of a length almost off the pitch outside the wide guideline, but Rahul gets so far across his stumps that he is still somehow able to flick this with a short arm jab to deep square leg for one.
knee high full toss at 130 kph on off, flicked tamely to long-on for one.
arrivaderci! de Kock latches onto a length ball that sits up on middle stump and sends it over the deep midwicket rope to move into the 90s.
full on off, scuffs a drive wide of long-on for two.

yeh maan indeed QDK! Short on fifth stump, cuts it away behind point beating short third man on the ring to get his second IPL century! He was slightly cramped for room but leaned back just enough to get the shot away to bring up a 59-ball ton.
length ball on the body, goes for another massive heave and inside edges this off the legs before dribbling wide of Billings for one.
length ball on fifth stump, pulled along the ground for one to long-on.
length ball sits up on fourth stump, cross bat swat clears the ropes at long-on.
slower ball back of a length on the hips, flicked through midwicket for one.
short ball on seventh stump, just reaches out and muscles this straight back down the ground over the long-off rope into the sightscreen.
Southee tries a slower ball on a good length at 124 kph on sixth stump, de Kock can do no wrong at this stage, wallops this on the up over long-on just wide of the KKR dugout.
hat-trick of sixes! Too full now in the slot on fourth stump, de Kock pulls the lever with a drive to see 6-6-6 light up on the machine as it lands over long-on.
wide yorker lands almost off the pitch outside off, left alone. Southee will have to rebowl.
wide yorker is within the guidelines outside off this time, de Kock sweeps this at 132 kph flat along the turf to long-on for one.
full on fourth stump, driven firmly to long-off for two.
full and wide, slices this and a thick edge flies over backward point backspinning away to the rope.

dropped at deep backward square leg! Length ball heaved with a pull toward Rana circling around on the rope, he reaches across his body after covering 20 yards and spills it. His body was going to take him over the rope anyway so effectively he turned a six into a four as the ball dribbles into the rope.
full on off, goes for another big leg side heave and a thick edge swirls over short third man to the rope.
goes for yorker and it's a low full toss on middle, clubbed over wide long-on to the rope.
short on the body, goes to pull, thuds off the gloves to short fine leg for one.
Full and outside off, driven to mid-off to start off.
Length just outside off, punched back from the crease.

Two chances at getting a wicket, or let's say one and a half, and both missed! First, Venky hit a length ball aerially towards covers. It landed just short of the fielder there. In the interim, Tomar was almost at Venky's end searching for a run. Stoinis had all the time in the world to hit the stumps down at the bowler's end but he missed it.

Quinton de Kock is everywhere at the DY Patil Stadium tonight! He pulls off a screamer with the mitts on now. Oh my word! How does he get so much energy after playing the kind of knock he just did. Venky looked to tonk the length ball down the ground. But the ball nipped back in, took the inside edge and was flying to de Kock's right. But he dived full length to pluck that out of thin air to send decibel levels in Navi Mumbai soaring.
Off the mark in some style. Full on middle, Rana gets inside the line and flicks it through square leg for four.
Banged in short, Rana ducks.
Full and wide outside off, he leaves it alone.
Outside off on a full length, a hint of movement away. Pushed to backward point.
First four for Tomar in IPL!- Hangs back to a ball just fuller than a good length outside off. Steers it past short third man and gets going.
Length outside off, pushed to the off side.
Fuller outside off, looks to tap and run but he has hit it well to short third man.
Another full ball outside off, directed to short third man.
Length ball outside off, Rana hangs back and punches it to covers.
Full ball slanting in, Rana makes room to hit big but gets it off the inside edge to fine leg for one.
Back of a length, angling away. Tomar slashes but misses. 12th dot in the innings.

Forgettable debut for Tomar. Soft dismissal for the opener and KKR lose two inside three overs. After cranking it up for long, Mohsin bowls a slower one and Tomar is early into his heave. Ends up getting it in the air off the toe end. Easy catch for mid-on running to his right.
Welcomes him with a short ball but down leg. He lets it go.
Back of a length ball going away, Shreyas goes back and punches it to covers.
Well fielded, Rana! Fuller outside off, Shreyas punches it down the ground. But it hits the non-striker and there's no chance of a run.
Sees Rana make room and sprays it wide outside off.
Rana won't mind however the runs come. Looks to hit across the line against a short ball. It climbs more and takes the outside edge and flies well over the slip and the keeper.
That's more like it! Nitish gets a length ball outside off and makes enough room. Opens up the front leg and smashes it back over the bowler's head for four.
Length ball angling in, doesn't manage to put it away and hits it towards midwicket.
Third boundary of the over, two of them are because of the width given by Avesh. This time it is fuller. Rana hits it well over covers.
Overcorrects, pays the price! Rana is owning Avesh now. Full and on middle and leg, Rana goes over mid-on and comfortably clears Rahul running back.

Confidence can do you wonders. Rana knows that Avesh won't go short after that first ball. Makes room again and gets a full ball around off. Smashes it yet again through the gap at extra covers to take 21 off the fourth.
Now Shreyas seems to have received a short-ball memo last night. Back of a length outside off, he goes back after a shuffle and slaps it over covers for four.
Slower ball is like cheese cake for Shreyas! PIcks it up quite early and thumps it way over long-off for half a dozen. 88 metres long.
"The tap's over and the water's flushing out," says Swann on air. Another short ball at a slower pace. Shreyas gets inside the line and pulls it over short fine leg for four more.
This is full on off, Iyer hits it towards mid-off and hares to the other end. Beats Rahul's throw to the bowler to get in.
A bit of confusion. Rana steers a length ball towards short third and Iyer comes down in search of a run. Goes back again despite the misfield.
Full on off, Rana taps it to the off side for a quick run.
Welcomed with a four! Fired full outside off, Rana belts it over covers to bring up the fifty.
Just short! Vohra did well to not concede any run despite having to dive forward. Rana went for the drive again and got a thick outside edge towards short third.
Second four of the over. Quicker one on a fuller length around middle, swept away through midwicket.

Rana is dishing out to Gowtham what de Kock did to Chakravarthy. Shapes early to play the reverse sweep and Gowtham fires it outside off. Gets it off the toe end and bisects the gap between short third and backward point to bring up the fifty-run partnership.
Flatter outside off, cut straight to point.
Tossed up on middle and leg, Rana gets inside the line and sweeps it towards fine leg for one.
Begins with a tossed up googly, full on leg. Turned through square leg for one.
Floated full on middle, driven strongly down to long-on. Both the balls have been over 100 kph.
A tad shorter outside off, hit down to long-on off the back foot.
Missed out! Full toss outside off, Shreyas hits it straight to sweeper and jogs to the other end.
Very full on leg, swept to deep backward square leg for a single. Five single thus far.
And it will stay at that. Another opportunity to score missed by Shreyas. It was short and wide and he cut it straight to backward point.

Gowtham roars as the noise levels soar! He gets his little revenge against Rana who walks back for 42 off just 22. Looks to continue his assault but holes out to long-off, where Stoinis takes it comfortably.
Full on the pads, turned through midwicket to get off the mark.
Flatter ball on a length, punched back.
Shreyas Iyer loves spin just like he loves his vada pav! Gets a full ball outside off, smashes it way over long-off for six.
A tad shorter on the pads, turned through square leg. A misfield in the deep from Lewis allows them to get back for two.
Again, Gowtham bowls it on the surface, comes up a bit slowly. Worked away towards backward square leg for one to retain strike.
Fuller on off, hit aerially to long-off for one.
Fuller on off, hit back to the bowler.
Billings charges down and yet again hits it back to the bowler.

Plumbbb in front! Or no? I thought it was and so did Lucknow. And Bishnoi asks Rahul to take it upstairs. Billings came down again and missed the whip against the googly to be hit low on the front pad. No inside edge and the ball-tracker says it would have clipped the stumps. On-field decision and Billings, both stay.
Fired in shorter, clipped to deep square leg for one.
Fuller outside off, driven to sweeper for one. Bishnoi's keeping it tight.
Bowls it on a length outside off, steered to third man for one.
Shreyas shuffles in his crease again, and then slaps a length ball to sweeper on the off side for one.
Innovation and effective! Moved across the stumps early and got a full toss, scooped it way over fine leg. And what's more, Avesh has overstepped.
Droolworthy strike! Billings expected a full ball and stays deep inside. PIcks his gap between mid-off and covers perfectly and thumps it for four.
Banged in short, he lets it be. Wide signals the square leg ump.
Picks his spot early and that's a glorious boundary. Short ball around off, he swivels and pulls it in front of square on the leg side.
Very full on middle, gives himself some room and carves it through cover-point for one. 19 runs already from the over.
Low full toss on middle, hit through midwicket. Another 20-run over from Avesh.
floated full on seventh stump to encourage a drive, slams this just wide of the long-off fielder charging to his left and eludes him for a one-bounce four.
same ball floated full hugging the wide guideline outside off but a bit quicker at 103 kph, driven along the turf this time to long-off for one.
googly floated full on sixth stump, goes to slog sweep and misses.
charges and flicks this elegantly from middle stump off a full delivery flighted a touch more at 95 kph and it sails over the wide long-on rope.
googly lands on a good length spinning toward middle, goes back to flick behind square for one.
floated full on sixth stump, Shreyas smokes a drive in the air flat between Bishnoi and Billings that hurtles to the mid-on rope.
length slower ball on middle stump, Billings swings through this.
slower ball goes very badly short down leg at 103 kph.
yorker sliding down leg pings Billings on the back heel missing a flick before continuing on to de Kock for a leg bye.
good length ball is another slower one following Shreyas backing away from middle at 103 kph, checks this back to Holder.
bouncer on the body at 129 kph, Shreyas was ready for it and swivels to hook over deep fine leg and it goes all the way.
back of a length on sixth stump, prodded behind point for one.
short on the body, pulled behind square for one.
slower length ball slanted across seventh stump at 124 kph, Billings fans on a swat.
back of a length on fourth stump at 123 kph, pulled through to deep midwicket for one.

slower ball nearly produces a return catch! Good length ball on middle, Shreyas aborts a flick and the ball lobs up off a leading edge in front of Billings but Mohsin can't charge forward to his left quickly enough.
wide yorker counters Shreyas backing away from leg stump and now the captain takes himself out of reach to play at the ball. Well inside the guidelines.
slower ball back of a length on off, tap and run into the off side for one.
slower ball again angled across the right-hander on seventh stump at 123 kph, Billings flails at this with a swipe for the leg side in vain. Magnificent over in the context of this chase.
low full toss at shin height on fourth stump, flicked through wide midwicket for one.
yorker on middle at 130 kph, jammed out to wide long-on for one.
slower ball lands back of a length on off, goes back to flick through square leg gently for two before the boundary rider can charge in for a relay. Half-century up off 28 balls for Shreyas.

slower ball finally fetches Stoinis a wicket! Floats this full on fifth stump, Shreyas gets under this too much trying to clear deep midwicket. Deepak Hooda ranges 5 yards to his left and avoids a collision with the long-on fielder while tumbling left for an adventurous catch.
bouncer over fifth stump, sways back to leave.

close shave for Dre Russ! Another short ball banged into the body this time cramping Russell for room, splices a top edged pull that flutters short of Hooda charging in 25 yards from the rope before fielding on a bounce.

length ball smashed flat to Holder at long-on and it just fails to carry to him! The big unit had to contemplate diving forward but would've been risking a trip to the dentist. He didn't have time to come in off the rope more than five yards it was hit so flat and hard and it just short hops him bending forward.
short on the stumps, pulls this flat to deep midwicket for one.
short and wide, slaps this off the toe into the covers.
short on sixth stump at 137 kph, goes to cut and beaten for extra bounce and pace.
yorker speared into the feet of Dre Russ at 139 kph, he just gets bat on it to keep it out of leg stump.

wide yorker on the guideline, Russell was backing away from leg stump and has to readjust to get bat on this trying to drive through cover but toe jams this through to de Kock. Avesh justifies the switch replacing Mohsin with a spectacular two-run over.
full on sixth stump, goes for a big heave and drags this along the turf to deep midwicket for one.
good length ball angled across middle stump, Russell clears the front leg to heave and scuffs this through midwicket for one.
zips this too quick and too full on the legs well outside leg stump at 114 kph, Billings was ready for the much quicker ball and sweeps this over fine leg into the tarp-covered field level stands.

first time Bishnoi has given it some air in this over and foxes Billings on the charge! Follows up a 114 kph delivery with a 91 kph googly on a good length on sixth stump, Billings is beaten badly in flight and continues with the shot mowing across the line anyway but misses everything and a simple stumping results for de Kock.
good length ball outside off, carved through the off side to the sweeper for one.
skids a quicker ball in short again from around the wicket on middle at 105 kph, Russell with another miscue along the turf to deep midwicket for one.
full and wide, Russell skies a drive off one-leg high over cover that lands short of the sweeper charging in for one.
142 kph yorker on the legs, too straight tailing on the pads and flicked fine, beats deep fine leg to the rope.
slower ball lands short on middle, pulled to deep fine leg for one. Rinku wanted two and it was probably on with the sliding stop required to keep the ball in play but Russell wants the strike.

Mohsin reels in the KKR whale! Slower ball at 123 kph lands on a good length on fifth stump, Russell tries to slap this on the up over long-off but doesn't get the power behind this.
