Connects and connects well. Tossed up ball around middle again, full enough for Dube to connect. Sends it into the orbit over long-on for half a dozen.
Flatter and quicker outside off, slapped past the diving cover fielder for one.
Tossed up around off, gets it off the inner half through backward square leg for one.
Dube manages to fined the gap. Short in length, Dube goes back deep in the crease and pulls it through midwicket. Splits the gap in the deep to earn for more.
Fuller on the pads, driven to long-on for a single to retain strike. Productive over that, 13 coming off it.
Shortish around off, cramps Dube for room. Does well to nudge it through square leg for one.
Shortish again, Uthappa goes back to cut it through point for a couple. A bit less turn meant that he could make good contact.
Flatter and shorter outside off, punched straight to sweeper for one.
Pure timing but Prabhudessai at it again. This time he runs to his right from deep point and saves a couple. It was a full ball outside off, Dube timed it well to get past backward point.
Dube is in the mood. Clears the longest part of the ground with ease. Floated full around middle, goes with the turn and clears deep midwicket.
Flatter outside off, pushed to covers for a single to bring up the 50-run partnership off just 32 balls.
Floated around off, chips it to long-on for one.
Uthappa goes big and gets half a dozen! Half-tracker around middle and leg, quick to pounce on hit and pull it over deep midwicket.
Hello everyone, I am here too, says Uthappa with back-to-back sixes. Tossed up full ball around middle, slog swept over deep midwicket.
Quicker outside off, steered straight to short third.
Quicker on off, punched to wide mid-off.
Three sixes in the over and Uthappa has changed gears seamlessly. Gets another full ball in his zone that he deposits 15 rows back over deep midwicket. 19 off the over.
Bamboozled! Googly on a length around middle, Dube is unsure of which way it will go. Misses it completely and the bounce takes it over the stumps.

Glenn Maxwell you superman! Athletic effort from the Big Show. But he signals four at the end of it. Covers a lot of ground to his left from long-on, pushes the ball back in play as he dives over the ropes. But his last contact was the boundary cushions and is four as a result. Dube had hit the slog high in the air in the vacant deep midwicket region.
Half a chance gone down! Floated around leg, slog-swept it towards deep square leg. The fielder hares to his right, gets low with the dive but fails to catch it.
All going CSK's way now. Dube misses the smash and the googly misses the bat as well as the wicketkeeper for four byes.
Fired side arm down the leg side, Dube looks to paddle it but doesn't.
Fuller on the pads, pushed towards midwicket for one.
Quicker legspinner around off, punched to long-on for one. 12 runs off this over. Fourth successive over in excess of 12 for CSK.
An appeal for caught behind but it was the bat hitting the ground. Misses the hit through the off side of a ball that was outside.
Half-century for Uthappa, 27th in the IPL, second this season. Excellently paced knock this. Full on middle and leg, flicked it through midwicket for four.
Short ball angling in, Uthappa gets inside the line and just helps it over fine leg. He's turning it on.
Good comeback. A yorker well wide of the batter, reaches out and just toe ends it back to the bowler.
Back of a length on off, gets it high on the bat towards mid-off as he looks to pull it.
Fifty for Dube, now! Second this season to go with a 49. Very full outside off, just slices it over a leaping backward point and gets four. How well has the young Mumbai lad batted today! Superb.

Great effort in the deep by Prabhudessai! Uthappa walks down early against Hazlewood, who shortens his length a touch. Goes with the heave that lands short of the man running in from midwicket. Gets one.
Length ball on middle, mistimes his heave through midwicket and gets just one.

Walloped to bring up the 100-run partnership! Uthappa has changed gears in some style. Hard lengths won't work, Swann had said at the pitch report. Banged short, pulled handsomely over deep midwicket for another maximum.
Similar back of a length ball, Uthappa goes for the pull but misses.
Very full outside off, driven to sweeper for one.
Very full down leg, misses the flick.
Very full on middle, squeezed through midwicket. It is the longer side of the ground and the batters run back for two.
Howzzat? Off the pads. Misses the pull off the length ball but the ball travels straight to short fine.
Aims London, goes America! Looks to flick the length ball over the on side, but the leading edge takes it over third man for a maximum.
This time it is more authoritative and hit with disdain. Length ball in the slot again, Uthappa dances down and hits it straight as an arrow.
Three boundaries? Siraj thinks he has his man lbw. RCB go for the review. But replays confirm that Uthappa got bat to it as he walked across to scoop it past short fine leg.
Length ball on the pads, hit straight to the fielder at deep square leg. But Siraj has overstepped.
Does well. Low full toss outside off, hit straight to long-off for one.
Clean as a whistle (podu)! Very full on middle and leg, hit wayyy over long-on for half a dozen.
Gets the pull over the wicketkeeper's head and takes two. Makes it despite the direct hit at the batter's end.
That slipped off Akash Deep's hand. High full toss outside wide outside off. Dube connects and slams it over point for six more.
This is fired down leg, misses the flick. Wide given.
Short in length, pulled off the glove to short fine leg for a single.

That is well wide. Was it on the pitch? Uthappa tells the umpire it wasn't and should be a no ball. But replays show it just landed on the strip. Uthappa had moved across and that forced Akash to fire it wider.
Another one full and outside the tramline. Wide given again.
Another one well outside off, Uthappa leaves it alone.
It's a full toss outside off, hit through midwicket for one. 58/0 off four overs for Akash Deep tonight.
Glorious maximum. Sees the flighted googly, slinked down and hit it straight towards the sight-screen. IPL best score for Uthappa.
Goes for the switch hit now, doesn't connect. Gets it off the thigh for a leg-bye.
Hasaranga's record against southpaws only gets worse. Dube ensures that. Wrong'un on a length, Dube goes back and lifts it over long-on for a 92-metre six.
Fired in on a length, powered down the ground for a single.

Finally a wicket for RCB and Hasaranga! Breaks the 165-run stand. The non-celebration from the Royall Challengers says it all. Was a googly on the shorter side, Uthappa picks Kohli at deep midwicket to perfection to walk back with 88 against his name.

Just a one-ball stay for the skipper. Hasaranga has two-in-two but that's it from him tonight. Tossed up googly around middle, Jadeja goes for the slog. Gets it high in the air. Rawat at deep midwicket settles underneath it and takes it safely. Something to cheer for RCB.
Effortless, brilliant and maximum. Hazlewood goes for the yorker but misses it not by much. Dube gets under it and hits the biggest six - 102 metres - over long-on. Moves to 86.
Misses one. Full toss but misses the flick. Goes off the strap of the pad to the keeper.
Short in length, misses the pull completely.
Number one of that! Short in length and on the body. Dube connects the pull and it sails over deep square leg. On 92 now.
tossed up, Faf turns it gently into the leg side and looks for a single but Moeen is quick to get across
this time he's off the mark, tapped into the gap at midwicket
drifting into middle and leg from around the wicket, turned to short fine
shortish and spinning away from outside off, Rawat thinks of a slap but lets it go in the end
how did that miss the stumps? Rawat attempts an ambitious reverse sweep to a fyull delivery drifting in, just misses leg stump.
tossed up on the stumps, Rawat lunges forward and pats it gently
slants a length ball across, Faf drives on the up to cover point
heaved into the leg side. Comes off a thickish inside edge and they will take three. Faf stepped out to have a big swing but didn't control it as well as he would've liked.
full and swinging away, Rawat plays with an angled bat as the thick edge runs down to third man
flicked and into the gap at midwicket. This is a half-volley angling into the pads, two more as Jadeja comes up with a sliding stop
steps out but is cramped for room as Choudhary bangs one in, Rawat goes through with a short-arm jab and gets it into the gap at midwicket. They hare back for the third
skiddy length ball back into middle, defended gently.
slashes at this, well stopped at backward point
drifting into middle and leg, worked through midwicket as they jog the single
gorgrous cover drive but down to wide long-off
shortish and angling in, Faf backs away and pulls but mistimes it to square leg
swung away but can't clear long-on. Faf had a grimace as he made contact. First wicket in the IPL for Theekshana and it's a massive one. Faf can't make a big one against his former team.
can't pierce the gap at square leg, pulled straight to Moeen.
nice drift into middle and off from around the wicket, defended
terrific from Rawat! Picks the length early, uses the depth of the crease to go back and whip it between midwicket and mid-on
reverse-swept straight to short third
rocks back to pull but hits it straight to Jadeja at wide mid-on, they scamper a quick single that brings Kohli on strike
gets forward fully as he pushes it into the off side for a quick single
in-drifter around off-stump from wide of the crease, carefully kept out

he has picked out deep square! Dube takes a good catch running in grom the ropes. Mukesh bowls length, gets it to nip back into middle, Kohli whips it uppishly - the timing is good - but it's as if he forgot there was a man in the deep precisely for that.
runs it down to third man to get off the mark
this is a beauty! Gets the ball to jag away off a length to square Rawat
steps out to smash that down the ground but toe-ends this flat-batted hit, lands between mid-on and mid-off
hammered! Picks the length early and pulls him imperiously in front of square
uppish and on the bounce to Jadeja at mid-off, Maxwell had given up. A direct hit at the bowler's end would've had him
flatter on middle and leg, tucked to the man coming in from deep square. DJ Bravo fumbles to allow a second.
attempts an audacious reverse hit over point but gave away his intentions way too early, smashed a thick edge onto his pad
he's clobbered that over long-off! Not entirely in his half but he went after that one and biffed it magnificently
six more! This one's over deep midwicket. Theekshana drops short, Maxwell latches onto it in a jiffy. He's in a murdeous mood
just eludes Jadeja, who runs back from mid-off to make a valiant effort. The ball was always skewing away from him, two more. Maxwell wasn't in control

got him with a super delivery! Theekshana takes off on a celebratory run that would make Imran Tahir proud. Rawat has reviewed. This one cuts back in sharply to beat Rawat, who tries to whip that across the line. He's hit on the back pad and the ball didn't have a long way to travel. he got into a terrible tangle there and ball tracking comes back to show three reds.
slapped disdainfully! Drops short, Maxwell rocks back ns flays that through cover. Mukesh Choudhary with a dive from deep point but couldn't stop it despite a slide
punched past the bowler to long-on
ah, so very delightful. Width outside off, he rocks back and cuts late to beat backward point
pushed into the gap at point for an easy single
got him! Maxwell is beaten by the fizz on this arm ball. Swung through a tad early and missed. The length wasn't quite there to pull. This one rushed onto him as well. RCB in tatters.
jabbed back down the pitch
welcome boundary, but CSK won't mind. Shahbaz sweeps him uppishly but into the gap at square leg.
uses the depth of the crease to nicely work it through square leg
steps out and swings this one bounce to long-on
worked past a vacant midwicket region

oh dear, the fielder at deep midwicket has put it down. Mukesh Choudhary didn't pick that, by the time he moved to his right and put in a dive, the ball had swirled away. Suyash with his first boundary through a slog sweep
worked into the leg side for a single
bludgeoned! Pure power. Cleared his front leg and used the width to belt that through extra cover.
worked past square leg as he jogs the single
shortish on middle and leg, nurdled into the gap at midwicket, two more
breaks back in off a length to hit him on the body as he tries to work it to the leg side
sharp turn once again, kept out somehow
swept into the gap at deep backward square leg. Got down on one knee and swept him up and over with the angle
width and Suyash has hammered that through cover! Flat-batted it with a touch of arrogance
gentle bunt to point for a quick single
slower and fuller on off, eased wide of point for a quick single
cheeky and very effective! AB would've be proud of that. Goes down on one knee, keeps his eyes on the ball all along as he scoops it over Dhoni for four.
slips this length ball into middle and leg, turned to deep square
width on offer, flayed into the gap at deep point
whips this to deep midwicket
fired full on leg stump, tucked to square leg, excellent running to hare back for the second
flatter one on the stumps, tucked to Rayudu at square leg
reverse swept over short third! May have given his intentions of the reverse but kept his eyes on the ball all through as he exected it superbly
bye bye ball! Walloped over deep square leg. Down on one knee, across and outside the line as he uses the angle coming in to give it a tonk with the slog sweep. What a hit
pushed through quicker on off, slapped straight to cover
starts off with a slower ball that he bowls way outside the tram line
beaten as he has a big swipe at that
slips this too far wide outide off, Shahbaz who took a step across to meet the ball let it pass
low full toss and he has absolutely drilled this into the gap between wide long-off and deep extra cover.
dabs it to short third for a quick single

oh my word! Mukesh Choudhary has absolutely put down a dolly. This was right down his basket at deep midwicket. Suyash looked to pull but was cramped for room. He was also hitting towards the bigger boundary. Was in no control of the stroke. What a mess
chopped wide of point
drilled to long-on
breaks away from a length outside off, defended back

got him! Suyash steps out to hoick him over midwicket but ends up being defeated by the drift and sharp turn away. He swung through a tad early as well, so even if the ball didn't hit the stumps, he would've been stumped. Good knock, terrific intent and we've seen glimpses of something special
swept into the gap at fine leg. Down on one knee as he swept him with the angle. DK is up and running immediately.
worked into the gap at midwicket
mix-up but safe. Shahbaz pushed it to cover, wanted a run only to be sent back
swept to deep square leg
slower ball but way outside the line, wide called
just out of Theekshana's grasp at short third. Shahbaz went after that but ended up slicing it behind square ont he off side. Valiant effort
drilled into the gap at sweeper point
slower length ball outside off, punched to deep cover
slants a slower length ball across, Karthik bunts it gently to point. Now, now. He has overstepped. Freehit coming up. The no ball is for having more than two fielders behind square on the leg side.
dipping yorker, driven down to wide long-off as they scamper a second
punched into the gap at deep cover, two more
punched to long-off
length on middle, tucked to square leg

he hasn't timed this and <s> Mukesh takes a catch at point. </s> Oh my word. he has put that down. Everyone around him can't believe it. Karthikl looked to go over long-off but got nowhere to the pitch and ended up slicing it high in the air. Mukesh took a couple of steps back from point, kept his eyes on the swirler but was never steady underneath it. Tough, tough evening for the young man.

got him this time! Don't need anyone's assistance to pick wickets if you can bowl magicballs like that. It's the carromball that fizzes back in off a length to hurrty Shahbaz into a defensive stroke. Sneaked through the gap to smash into the stumps
pushed wide of point to get off the mark
clears deep backward sqaure leg! Some level of premeditation as Karthik walks across a long way and wallops him with the spin
looks to work it to the leg side but can only hit it back to the bowler
he has cleared the ropes! This was a flat-batted heave across the line. I don't think Wanindu believed he had timed it as well as he did.
this time, he picks out long-on. Backed away to swing, but no timing this time.
square turn, edges to short third, sent back by DK

What a catch! Rayudu, you beauty. One-handed stunner from nowehre. Akash jabs at the ball, gets it high on the bat as it lobs in the air. Rayudu mvoed to his right and threw himself at the ball as it stuck
drifts this into middle, defended
somehow manages to squirt this off an inside edge to the leg side
strike one! The night continues to get tougher for Mukesh Choudhary. Lands a short ball, sat up nciely as DK walked across and belted this pull to clear deep backward square leg
strike two! Another flick and another six! Sails over deep square leg. Goes length on the pads. You just can't bowl there to DK.
scooped for four! Full and angling away, DK gets across the stumps in no time and uses the bowler's pace magnificently. Is the chase on?
length ball outside off, sprays it way outside off. Wide. The young man looks frazzled
up in the air but clears the infield, two more to deep cover. DK toe-ended this lofted hit
full toss outside off, lofted over the infield to deep extra cover, gtwo more.
wide, wide, wide! Goes wide yorker, but ends up going way outsidw the wide line.
lofted over the infield, plonks near deep cover and they take just the one to keep DK on strike. Sensible from RCB, sensible from DK.
slips this yorker-length delivery down leg, DK misses a tickle and declares it wide even before the umpire could. Has to rebowl that. Replays suggest it brushesd the pad.
another slower ball, another wide down leg. DK had a swing at this but couldn't connect. He won't mind though. Two runs already even before a legitimate ball has been bowled
drilled to long-on, refuses the single

that's the end of that, surely. DK has an absolute mow at this length ball. connected it really well. but he was hitting towards the bigger boundary. And unfortunately also found Ravindra Jadeja at deep midwicket. He was no more than two or three inches from the ropes. He belts out a roar, as does DJ Bravo. What a knock. Under pressure, must say that is a terrific grab from Jadeja. Both feet were off the ground for a split second as the ball lodghed in his fingers. He controlled it superbly.
flays this full toss to deep point
squeezed to short third.
squeezed to the ege of the ring at cover
lofted down to long-off
leading edge but rolls wide of point
looks to scoop but Bravo ends up bowling full and fast, Siraj failed to angle the bat properly to play the stroke. Nearly lobbed back
hit hard to long-off
yorker, kept out
beaten as Jordan nails a superb yorker
walloped over extra cover. All handy runs in the overall context as it reduces the margin of defeat. This is a length ball, Siraj backs away and uses the width to belt that
just out of the reach of Rayudu running back from cover. Would've been a stunning grab had he taken it
slips out of his hand, ends up bowling too far wide
dabbed gently for a single

past second slip! Bhuvneshwar goes full on leg and the ball swings towards middle. Wade tries to play it leg side but takes a leading edge behind square. Could've been out for a first-baller, ends up with a boundary
and Bhuvneshwar errs this time with this full ball outside leg. It swings away from Wade, instead of coming in, and it's too much for the keeper to do too!
more extras, legbye this time. Good length, on leg stump. Wants to flick it off his waist, but misses. Hits his body and rolls away behind square on the leg side
more extras, but this one will go to Bhuvneshwar's tally. Fullish, but wide outside off and going further away. No shot offered
better line. Full, fourth-stump line. Just a bit of movement away. Gill shoulders his arms
full outside off. Bit of away movement, and Gill presses forward to finally meet at the ball. Gentle drive to cover for a quick single
the radar is off as this back of a length delivery lands way outside leg. More futile work from Pooran with his dive
full ball on off stump. Minimal footwork as he defends close to his pad
full just outside off. Wade offers no shot, and brings an end to a 17 run opening over
full on middle stump. Cracking front-foot defense, ball rolls away to the off side
shoveled! Full on middle and leg. Gill comes down the track and uses the bottom hand to lift it over mid on. Bit of a slice, so it doesn't have the legs to go for six
good length ball, on middle and leg. Fended comfortably, soft hands while standing tall
full, on leg stump or just outside. Misses the clip, hits his pad, rolls away

back of a length just outside off. Wade rides the bounce, taps it to the off side, and takes off for one. Jansen chases, collects smoothly and has a shy at the bowler's end, but doesn't hit the stumps. Hits Wade instead. Wade was comfortably in though
good length just outside off. Fended off the back foot to cover and another quick single
full just outside off. Bit of movement into him, and defended off the front foot

Oh that's stunning A flying catch at cover sends Gill back for 7. Bhuvi bowled it in a slot outside off. Gill met it for a drive under his eye, but Tripathi at cover dived to his left, stuck the arm out, and ends up taking a beauty
good length just outside off. Fended off the back foot towards point
fullish on off. Lateral movement away. Sudharshan pokes at it, and guides it to third man
full on middle, and a bit of swing towards off. Wade gets onto the front foot, meets it with the full face of the bat, and the ball goes past the bowler's left for a boundary
a confident back-foot punch that can't pierce the infield. Length ball on off, and struck well square. Point runs to his left and slides to stop
comes around the stumps. Full outside off. Bit of turn away. Defended off the front foot
good length on off stump. Punched off the back foot, and Washington blocks it off by moving to his right
full on middle and skidding into leg. Wade gets onto the back foot and defends
full on middle and off. Wade plays the reverse sweep and that's been struck well. Sharma at backward point may have gotten a hand to it with a dive, but it couldn't stop the boundary
fullish ball on off that takes some extra bounce. Wade gets onto the back foot and punches to cover
full on off stump. Tries to play the straight drive but flies off the bat's inside half to mid on
fullish, wide-ish. A bit late to get on the drive, mistimed towards cover point
top edged over the keeper/first slip for four! Jansen goes short, Sudharsan was quick to try and pull, but the extra bounce gets the edge.
length ball angling into his pads. Clipped to deep backward square leg for one
good length outside off. Wade shuffles across to the off side to try and play a paddle past the keeper but no connection
good length on off. That height gets some extra pace too. Nudged off his waist to the leg side for one
full on off stump. Wants to work it to the leg side but ends up playing it back to Jansen
full on off stump. Wade plays the on-drive between the stumps and the non-striker. But mid on is quick to cut across and stop the ball

good length, just outside off. Cut to point, and Wade takes off for one. Sudharsan says no, and Wade has to turn back. Abhishek has a shy to run Wade out, but misses, and that allows the duo to take that single after all
wristy from Sai! Length ball angling into his pads, and he uses the wrists to ensure the flick goes behind square. Races away...

Natarajan wins the battle of the Tamil Nadu players as the ball grips, slows on Sudharsan as he tries to play a drive off a length ball. Hits the top half of the bat, pops up in the air, and goes to Williamson at mid off in slow motion
goes fullish on middle stump. Hardik looks to defend off the front foot, but some extra bounce makes the ball hit the top half of the pad

full on off stump, Hardik wants to be positive, meets the delivery on the front foot, and plays a drive that goes past the non-striker to the long-off boundary. It was in the air for a short time as it went past Wade
full on middle, from around the stumps. Worked off his pads to square leg for one
over the stumps to HP. Good length on off, and punched to mid on
full, bit more air. Lands on off, turns into Hardik. Clipped to midwicket
flatter. Length ball just outside off. Turns into Hardik as he uncomfortably cuts to point
around the stumps. Good length, on off and middle. Pushed to mid on for a single
flatter. Length ball on off. Skidding into Hardik. Back-foot punch to long off and he'll keep the strike
that's some way to say you've arrived. Malik goes short, and the quick ball zips through. Hardik shapes to pull, but he's late onto that. Hits the grille of the helmet.

that's some way to say you're unperturbed! Full outside off. Pandya doesn't hang back waiting for a short ball, but gets onto the front foot as soon as Malik delivered that. Crunches a drive through cover's left
look at me now! Malik goes short, but this time there's no extra bounce. Pandya picks the length early, and drags a pull from off stump to deep midwicket
full outside off. Bit of swing into Pandya as he looks to play another cover drive. Comes off the inside half, and rolls away to mid on
slashes this wide-ish ball with hard hands. Flies over the cordon, and nearly carries to third man for a catch!

an entertaining over comes to a close with a wicket from around the stumps! Malik opts to change the angle for his first ball to Wade in the over, and goes full on off stump. The bowler's angle brings the ball into middle stump, and Wade misses the flick. Hits the front leg, umpire says out, and Wade doesn't bother reviewing that
good length outside off, and turning into Pandya. Punched back to Markram
bit more air and loop. Fullish on off. Punched with the turn to long on
around the stumps to Miller. Fullish on middle to his countryman. Miller goes back and punches to long on
clobbered! Sails over deep midwicket. That's his 100th IPL six. Full on off, Pandya clears the front leg, trusts the offbreak to come into his arc, and then sends it into the stands
full outside off. Markram tosses it up, and Pandya goes for an on drive. Nearly a caught and bowled as the ball flies past the bowler's left instead!
full ball on middle, and defended off the front foot. Sees the over out and we break for a time out
good length ball angling into Hardik from over the stumps. Worked off the back foot to midwicket for a quick single
around the stumps. Length ball angling into his hips, and flicked to fine leg for a couple
full on off stump. Shuffles onto the front foot to defend
aims for a yorker. The ball flies into his toes, but Miller manages to clip it square for a single
full ball, aimed at the stumps from over the stumps. Works it off his toes to deep square leg
around the stumps. Full on leg stump, and he clears the front leg before whipping it to deep square leg
length ball on off and turning in. Bit of a paddle to short fine leg
good length outside off, turning in. Punched to long on for a single
around the stumps. Good length on off. Bit of grip and turn away as Miller pokes at it. Ball dribbles away to point
good length on off. Quicker one. Pandya works it leg side, but a defensive shot
fullish, quite wide outside off. Pandya mistimes the cut. Ball rolls away to the deep
full on off stump. Gets onto the front foot and works it off his toes to midwicket
good length ball outside off and angling into him. Fended off the back foot
good length ball just outside off. Miller gives Natarajan a charge, but the length leaves him with very few options. Fended with soft hands before scurrying back into the crease
good idea, but a tad too short. Bowls the bouncer on a stump-to-stump line and Miller was looking to pull
length ball, on off. Rolls his fingers over this one. Worked off his waist to deep midwicket for one
good length ball on off stump. Cut from near his body square to the fielder on the boundary at deep point
good length ball on off stump. Extra bounce onto Miller, who has to defend rather uncomfortably off the back foot. all rolls away to the off side
good length on his pads, and worked away to midwicket for a single
good length just outside off, and he punches it to cover off the front foot. Length not there for him to come forward and play the drive, so has to resort to the punch
struck to mid on
uh oh, here come the five wides once again. Malik goes short, and with his pace, that is soaring over Hardik's head, and too high for Pooran too!

don't bother moving! Malik is slightly full, Pandya moves his front leg out of the line slightly, and then closes the bat's face as he meets this quick ball for a flick. Ball races past midwicket for four
guides this length ball away to deep point. Team hundred
searches for the yorker. Ends up as a low full toss. Struck to long on for one
good length ball angling across. Guided to third man for a single
thick edge to third man. Back of a length, and Miller tried to cut. But the extra bounce induced the edge. Nearly ran away for four, but Umran ran around the boundary to cut it off
full on middle and leg. Pandya walks across to the off side and exposes two stumps before driving to long on

MJ wins the SA vs SA battle as Miller pays the price for being cramped. Jansen dug it short as Miller came down the track to show some aggression. The pull is mistimed, and midwicket moves to his left to take the catch
back of a length, outside leg. Easy way to get off the mark. Pulled to fine leg
full ball, just outside leg stump. Wants to clip it off his boots, but can't connect
good length and he wants to pull in front of square. Mistimed, ball rolls away to the leg side. Jansen runs across to intercept
good over for Sunrisers, just six and a wicket. Good length on middle, bit of extra bounce. Guided to third man for a single
yorker attempted, on off stump. Hardik cleared the front leg for a slog, but ends up toe-ending the shot back to the bowler
extra pace hurts Umran as this attempted cut flies over the slip cordon to third man. Manohar backed away and tried to use the width

between the keeper and first slip! Don't get fooled by the economy, Umran has been unlucky. Back of a length outside off. And angling into Manohar. He is late to cut, gets a thick edge and goes between the gap in the cordon. Keeper didn't move, first slip moved to his left too late
rolls his fingers over this ball. Fullish outside off. Guided to third man
length ball on off and clipped to midwicket for one
good length ball on off stump. Cut to point for one
short ball, aimed at his chest. Fended from near his chest off the back foot, and the ball rolls away to point
short ball, leg stump line. Flies over Manohar
full outside off stump. Angling across as he chooses to drive. Finds cover
good length ball on middle and leg. Nudged off the back foot to point for one
good length ball on off stump. Pushed to cover off the back foot
good end to the over for Titans as Manohar backs away on this length ball from Jansen before swatting a cut over backward point for four. Nearly went all the way for six!
length ball just outside off stump. Punched to long on for a single
top edged for four over the keeper. Bhuvi goes shot, Abhinav chooses to pull, and that's flown over Pooran the gloveman.
full outside off stump. Driven to cover
good length ball, fourth-stump line. Nurdled off the back foot behind point for one
length ball angling into his waist. Clipped away to deep midwicket with soft hands, and that's exactly why they can come back for the second
nine off the over as Pandya cuts off the back foot to deep point. Length ball just outside off stump
full in the slot just outside off. Drilled over Natarajan's head, but falls just short of Tripathi at long on. Could've been six, could've been out, ends up as a single

attempts the wide yorker, Manohar falls for the trap and goes for a big hoick. Sliced up in the air and Markram at long off gets under it... but dropped! He got under it well in time, but the ball hit his fingers
yorker on middle and leg. Hardik digs it out, the ball stays on the pitch, and they scurry across for a single

misses the yorker, ends up as a low full toss coming into Abhinav's shin, but he manages to punish that for six over wide long on! He wound up early for the aggressive shot, and went with it irrespective of the length
full ball, outside off and angling further away. Abhinav loses his shape as he tries to play another slog. Through to Pooran
useful innings, this! Misses the yorker by an inch or two, lands just outside off, Manohar uses his fast hands to scythe at the ball, and it's found the gap between deep extra cover and long off!
hits his pad and rolls away for one
another drop at long off for Abhinav! Knuckleball, fullish outside off. Mistimes the aggressive shot, up in the air for long off - Tripathi - to take the catch, but he can't hold on either
back of a length, wider outside off stump. Misses out
attempts the yorker, ends up as a very low full toss. Clipped behind square to deep backward

another catch? No man's land this time! Good length ball just outside off. Manohar goes for the pull. Mistimed high up in the air towards square leg. Deep backward square runs in, fine leg runs in, Bhuvneshwar runs too, and the bowler fails to get there in time. Wry smile on Manohar's face

Tripathi runs around from long off to the sightscreen and dives to take a catch. Manohar's whirlwind innings ends. Another slower ball, fullish outside off. Manohar is through the shot too early, loses the grip off one hand, and the ball is sliced way up in the air. Applause from the dug out for Manohar
Bhuvneshwar goes length and wide outside off for Tewatia. Keeping it away from his arc, and he slaps a cut over the infield to the man in the deep
that single gets Hardik (on 48) back on strike. Tewatia backs away before the ball is bowled. Natarajan follows him with a yorker outside leg stump. Dug away to short third man
full ball outside off. Hardik pre-meditated a ramp and ends up playing the shot to midwicket
full toss, shin high. Tewatia gets down on one knee, and swats one behind square on the leg side!
full on fifth stump, goes to drive and drags an inside edge just past leg stump for one.
full on the legs, flicked behind square for two.
good length ball on fifth stump swinging away a touch, left alone.
back of a length on middle skids on, Williamson prods to defend, looks like an inside edge into the pads. Long chat and Hardik is not convinced by Wade to go for a review.
back of a length on middle, goes back to flick into midwicket for one.
back of a length on fifth stump, punched straight to backward point.
good length ball on fifth stump, left alone.
good length ball on middle, defended.
good length ball on fourth stump, defended.
good length ball swinging away from sixth stump at 138 kph, left alone.
back of a length on off, tap and run into the covers for one to get off strike.
back of a length on off, defended to midwicket.
back of a length on middle, flicked into midwicket for one.
bouncer on sixth stump sails wide of Sharma, signaled one short ball for the over.
back of a length on sixth stump, defended to backward point.
another short and wide ball defended to the off side.
back of a length on off, defended into the covers.
back of a length on fourth stump, plays this with soft hands to deep third man for one.
back of a length on fourth stump, defended to cover.
back of a length into the ribs, fights this off with one hand off the bat to nudge into midwicket for one.
short on sixth stump at 135 kph, cuts this straight to backward point.

back of a length on leg stump at 130 kph, backs away from the stumps to create room to punch this off the back foot with soft hands behind point. Direct hit at the non-striker's end but Williamson is in by two yards.
bouncer on middle at 135 kph, miscues a pull well short of deep square leg for one.
back of a length on fourth stump, punched to backward point, misfield allows a run.
miracle! It's a boundary! First of the chase! Short ball on fifth stump, sits up for Williamson to pull through wide mid-on to the rope.
Williamson shifting from first gear to fourth gear in the space of two balls! Short again on the body this time, hooked high over backward square sailing over the rope.
back of a length, flicks it square for an easy single this time.
back of a length delivery seams away and beats Sharma playing back.
fullish length tailing into leg stump, flicks this high over midwicket for two.
backs away from leg stump and Shami follows him short with a 138 kph ball, Sharma fights it off through point for one.
full and wide at 143 kph on seventh stump, too much width and shoveled high over point to the rope.
back of a length on seventh stump again swinging away, plenty of width again to punch this in the gap between cover and point to the rope again.

hat-trick of boundaries through the off side off Ferguson! Back of a length again on seventh stump, Sharma punches this off the back foot again this time between backward point and short third man to the rope.
now overcorrects on the hips, flicked straight to short fine leg.
how good! Short ball cramps him on fourth stump, but he's still able to keep his hands soft enough to guide this between the keeper and short third man to the rope.
back of a length again on fifth stump at 139 kph, tapped behind point for one.
good length ball on the hips, goes back to flick behind square for one.
back of a length on middle, goes back to flick to long-on for one.
floated full and wide on sixth stump, drives this elegantly high over cover and bounces away to the rope.
good length ball on fourth stump, goes back and across to flick through square leg for a sharp two.
half-tracker well outside leg, Sharma goes to hammer this but is through the shot a touch early and cue shots it off the toe into midwicket for a tame single.
googly lands very short on off and spins into the hips, Williamson can't flick it away and it comes off the pads.
short and wide, slices this high over backward point for two.
length ball angled across fifth stump, flays this high over cover and an athletic save is made by the sweeper running left to turn four into two.
length ball angled a touch wider on sixth stump at 136 kph, this time Sharma fans on a big drive on the up.
back of a length on middle, goes back to tap this into midwicket for one. Direct hit from David Miller at the stumps but the run was completed quite easily.
back of a length on middle, defended into midwicket.
short and wide, sliced behind point for another two.
full outside leg, misses a flick into midwicket.
full on fifth stump this time, goes to drive and slices this off a thick outside edge through third man to the rope.
back of a length on middle and leg, flicked through square leg for one.
full on fourth stump, prodded into the covers for one.

short ball on the body, rocks back to try to heave this over midwicket but the ball hustles onto him and cramps him for room. Winds up picking out Sudharsan at deep midwicket 10 yards inside the rope, who takes a knee high catch tumbling forward.
full on middle, stretches to paddle sweep this through fine leg for two.
back of a length on fifth stump, defended to the off side.

length ball on seventh stump, slapped through cover wide of the sweeper, who has a very awkward collection getting his knee stuck in the turf sliding, Jayant Yadav, but recovers to pick up and relay it in.
short on middle and leg, pulled flat to deep backward square leg for one.
bouncer clears off stump easily, Tripathi doesn't bother ducking, wide called on height.
fullish length on fifth stump at 135 kph, drives this superbly on the up through extra cover to the rope.
back of a length on middle and leg, flicked behind square for one.
back of a length on middle, defended into the off side.
slower ball at 127 kph lands back of a length on off, defended into the covers.
yorker on fourth stump, shuffles way outside off to paddle into the leg side but misses off the pads. Big lbw shout denied. Not much going for this. All three stumps could be seen.
good length ball on fourth stump, defended to point.

gem! Back of a length seams past a prod on fourth stump line at 144 kph, beats Williamson and swerves late, hitting Wade high in the chest as he misses the ball grabbing at it. Wade could've really been badly hurt there. He'll have a big bruise after play but after a few moments gets up and is able to continue.
full and flicked into the ring for one.
full and swinging into the legs, misses a flick and the ball comes back to Ferguson for no run.
fullish length on off, prods at this and a leading edge balloons short of extra cover.
googly lands short on middle, goes back to flick through the leg side for one.
full on middle, defended to midwicket.
back of a length on off, goes back to punch to long-on for one.
back of a length on fourth stump, goes back to late cut this past the keeper for one.
back of a length on fifth stump, goes back to flick through mid-on for one.
length ball on middle, goes for a big heave behind square and inside edges it into the pads.
bouncer on middle, goes to pull and a big top edge flies over the keeper, swirling with enough steam on it to land just over the rope.
another short ball on middle at 136 kph, this time it goes where he meant to hit it screaming high over backward square for another six.
back of a length on middle, goes back to flick into midwicket and weighted well enough to dribble just past the ring for two before the boundary rider can charge in.
short on middle, whips this through square leg for one.

back of a length on fourth stump, uppercuts this straight to deep third man... who doesn't move an inch off the rope. Shami is the guilty party. It was a clear catching opportunity if he decided to get his legs moving and Hardik is shouting at him furiously. It landed two yards in front of him without any effort. As a matter of fact, replays make it look even worse with Shami taking three steps back as the ball landed two yards in front of him rather than going forward.

and now Tripathi rubs salt into the wound from the delivery to end the last over. Flighted full on fifth stump and launches a drive high over wide long-off. Tripathi was needing treatment on his calf earlier and stumbles backward again after that shot. The physio is back out.
lands this on a good length on sixth stump, Pooran goes back and slaps this straight to extra cover.
short and wide on seventh stump, cuts straight to the point sweeper.
back of a length on leg, Williamson goes back to punch to long-on for one.
short on sixth stump, goes back to cut again and chops this into the ground past the keeper for one to short third man.
back of a length on off, goes back to punch to long-on.
good length ball on leg stump, flicked away for one.

flighted full on middle, heaves this to wide long-on for two. Relay from Miller was very good and nearly had Pooran had Wade been able to collect cleanly. A direct hit would've been out from 70 yards.
full again on middle, this time lofts a drive straight back over Rashid for two again to Miller at long-on.
good length ball on off, prodded behind point for one.
full on sixth stump, flicks through midwicket for one.
good length ball outside leg, goes to flick behind square and misses off the pads, goes for an extra behind square.
slower cutter short ball on middle cramps up Pooran at 135 kph, Pooran tries to sway to get out of the way and the ball pops up off the shoulder of the bat to third man for one.
slower ball lands full on middle and leg, defended.
ingenuity from Williamson to bring up a half-century! Shuffles well outside off to scoop this over fine leg, connects oh so sweetly and gets it 25 yards over the rope.
slower bouncer balloons over Williamson's attempted uppercut at 119 kph. Williamson couldn't reach. Wide called on height.
overpitched now on fourth stump, Williamson creams this through cover and the sweeper has no chance.
short and wide outside off, gets on his toes to cut and misses.
full on middle, driven to long-on for one.

offcutter slower ball full on seventh stump at 122 kph, Williamson tries to drag this with a slog targeting the leg side but instead skies this to long-on. Easy catch taken 20 yards in from the rope by Tewatia casually at chest height.
back of a length on fourth stump, defended to backward point.
back of a length on fifth stump, guides this behind point for two.
back of a length on fourth stump, guided behind point again for one.

back of a length on leg stump, tapped gently enough through the ring before the sweeper can attack to cut off the second. Hardik is not happy with the effort coming off the rope and shouts more. Wade gestures his displeasure as well with his arms and can be heard through the stump mic as well shouting, "I told him three times!"
back of a length on off, flicked to long-on for one.

dropped! bouncer on middle, top edged pull off the toe flutters back toward Ferguson. He changes direction in his follow-through and runs backward. He dives on the edge of the non-striker's crease but the ball slips through his hands. Definitely got his mitts to it but wasn't able to cling on.
strays with a length ball on the legs, easily flicked away to the fine leg rope.
another length ball down leg, this time Pooran can't flick it away and wide is called.
back of a length ball on the hips again at 131 kph, a very calypso flick with one leg in the air sails high over fine leg into the front row of the stands.
yorker on off stump, jams this out behind point for one.
full on fifth stump, shuffles well across to flick through the leg side for two.
full on off, flicked to long-on for one.
length ball on off at 139 kph, heaved to deep square leg for one.
back of a length into the body, Pooran flicks this over fine leg for one.
slower ball lands short on fifth stump, punched to the cover sweeper for one.
bouncer again, tries to pull and another top edge sails over the keeper for a one bounce four.
full on middle, flicked to deep fine leg for one.
goes for yorker at 139 kph but doesn't get it full enough on off, Markram smashes this back past Pooran to the long-on rope.

into the upper deck to finish the match! Short on the body, Pooran swivels to rock this over backward square leg into the front row of the second tier. Sunrisers canter to victory with five balls to spare in spite of a very slow start to the chase.
fullish, fourth stump line. Sticks the bat out to poke it to point for one

edged by Padikkal first ball! as Chameera bowls a full ball outside off. Padikkal pushed at it, took the outside edge, but the ball fell just short of Jason Holder at first slip. Fell short of him, and the awkward bounce got it through the fielder

disasterclass from Bishnoi as he throws for four overthrows. Full outside off, and Padikkal pushed it to cover. Buttler is out of his crease, so Bishnoi thinks about a shy at the stumps at the non-striker's. Misses the direct hit, Gowtham isn't backing up well enough, and that's four more for Padikkal

the umpire raises his finger swiftly! Padikkal LBW? He's reviewing Fullish ball on middle and off stump with Padikkal offering minimal footwork. Ball hits his front pad in front of middle stump, but UltraEdge says there's a spike when the ball passes the bat! Tiny edge en route to the pad, and Padikkal survives. Did he know about the spike? Because he didn't review right away. That would've surprised Padikkal too
length ball, early 140s kph. Extra bounce on middle stump and fended off the back foot
fullish, on off stump. Presses forward to defend and see the otherwise profitable over out
full just outside off stump. Buttler presses forward and pushes a front-foot shot back to Holder
fullish ball on a fifth-stump line. Buttler shoulders his arms
full outside off but Buttler moves to the off side this time to get closer to the ball. Caresses a drive, but stopped at cover
that's four dots. Rolls his fingers over this ball. Fullish just outside off. Pushed to the off side but the fielder runs in swiftly to stop the single
there's the release shot Holder goes full outside off, Buttler nonchalantly smacks it over his head, and it's sailed into the sightscreen

erring in line, and Buttler punishes him. Full on middle and leg, angling into his thighs, and Buttler flicks it gently past the short fine leg fielder! Four dots, and then a six and a four to round off the over
up and over! Stands tall and lofts it over Chameera's head. Full, in the slot on off stump, and Padikkal pounced on it in a flash.
length ball on off stump. Fended off the back foot
good length, on middle and leg. Clipped off his hips to deep backward square leg for a single
full on middle and leg stump. Buttler goes for the fine flick, and its got some pad en route to short fine leg for a single. Umpire confirms it was pad first, with the legbye signal given
back of a length, just outside leg stump. Ducks under it and takes the extra run. This was 144kph
good length ball on middle and off. Shuffles onto the off side and fends it off the back foot
a good comeback over from Chameera after that first-ball four. Length ball angling across and Padikkal guides it to third man for a walking single
full on middle, and flicked with strong wrists to deep midwicket. Padikkal played it before bothering in which direction the ball would turn
good length ball on off and middle. Googly turns across his body, and down the leg side
tossed up on off stump. Pushed to wide long off for a walking single
length ball, on off, and turning further away. Padikkal hammers this short and wide ball through the off side, and the cut has gone to the boundary
another googly. Fuller on off, but turning across. Padikkal capitalises on the width, and punishes Bishnoi with the cut once more

dropped! Classical legspinner's caught and bowled chance, but Padikkal has survived. Full on middle and leg, and Padikkal pressed forward to defend. Met with hard hands, ball went straight back to Bishnoi, but it didn't stick even though he got into a good position, with a straight-on body in prep to gobble the catch
full on off, and driven to long off to keep the strike
full outside off and angling across. Padikkal looks to drive off the front foot, but misses out. Past the bat to the keeper
fullish, on middle and leg. Padikkal closes the bat's face and works it to the leg side
attempted yorker, nearly successful. Dug away from middle stump
attempts the yorker again, very nearly lands it. Padikkal mistimes a drive through the off side to get to the other side
full toss around off stump. Surprises Buttler. He bunts it to the leg side - in front of square - for a single
back of a length, just outside leg stump. Ducks under it, and given a wide. Not for height, but for the line. Was a close one, but probably a good decision
good length ball angling across, and cut to the infielder

what a start to your spell! Buttler's stumps rattled, and Avesh has struck. Full around off stump, angling in to the stumps as Buttler tries to welcome him with a sloggy swipe to long on. Misses the connection, and Avesh hits bulls eye
full just outside off. A gentle drive past cover's left, and they pick up two as Rahul collects the ball from around the boundary line after making a chase
full on leg stump, and clipped in front of square. Samson misses out on the wayward line from Avesh, hitting it to midwicket

good length ball on off stump. Samson expected it to bounce more as he looks to play a punch off the back foot. Mistimed, and it ends up as an inside-edged shot onto his body before rolling away to the off side
fullish just outside off. Samson shuffles across to cover off stump before defending the ball away
just two off his first over. Short ball on leg stump, and left alone by Samson
full, and quite wide outside off. Padikkal slaps a mistimed shot courtesy the width to deep point

tosses it up. Full outside off, and Samson tonks it right over the umpire's head with ease! Bishnoi's legbreaks don't turn as much as the googly, and Samson took full advantage of that. Off the sweet spot
good length on off. Turning into middle. Worked off the back foot to deep midwicket
full outside leg. Padikkal tries to sweep but misses. The googly didn't turn in much either for a bowled-type dismissal around Padikkal's legs. Wide given
good length ball outside off. Angling across as he tries to cut. Quicker delivery and he misses out
slower through the air. Full on leg, and clipped off the back foot to midwicket
full on off. Samson expects the googly and therefore plays a heave to the leg side. Straight to midwicket
like a tracer bullet as Padikkal smacks this full ball on off stump down the ground. Too hot for KL Rahul at mid off too, who misfields, and that allows Royals to take the run
lazy elegance as some people like to call it. Length ball on a fourth-stump line. Samson stays on the back foot and plays a cut rather late, and gets it behind backward point for four
good length outside off. Cut again, past point, but man in the deep runs across to intercept
fullish ball on off stump. Tapped back to the bowler
length ball lands just outside leg and Padikkal tries to play a flick rather fine. Misses the shot, hits the thigh guard, rolls away to the keeper's right

full around leg stump. Padikkal misses the flick as the ball angles across and hits his front leg in front of middle stump. Appeal for lbw turned down, that probably either pitched outside leg or took some bat en route to the pad. Time out
108kph slower ball, full outside off stump. Driven with the angled bat to deep point
full on middle and leg. Pushed to midwicket, which is vacant. The outfielder runs in and stops the two

is he lbw on a full toss? Yes! Slides this full toss into the stumps, and Samson misses the flick from near his knee roll. Hits him, and the umpire has an easy decision to make. Samson does not review
starts his campaign with a boundary as Holder goes full on leg. Rassie plays it fine, closing the bat's face, and gets it past the keeper's left for four
full on off stump. Defended off the front foot
good length outside off stump. It's an offcutter. Cut to point. Successful over for Holder

around the stumps. Full on off. Padikkal goes for a reverse sweep, but he's top edged it only for first slip to eat him up! Padikkal tried to hit it over conventional short third man, but was through the shot too early. Gowtham starts with a bang
continues around the stumps to Hetmyer. Full on middle. Bit of offspin on offer. Carefully fended off the back foot
full on off. Clips it square past the umpire with soft hands off the front foot. Calls early for the second run as well
full on middle, and flicked once more. This time to deep midwicket

bowled 'im! And Rassie is out after a boundary. Gowtham continues around the stumps. Gets this full ball on middle to go straight through. Rassie misses the cut, the ball goes past the blade, and off stump is broken.
good length ball outside off, and dabbed to short third man
zips one at a back of a length just outside off. He has a poke at that, but is beaten by pace
good length ball just outside off, as this keeps just a tad low. Tapped towards over after adjusting for the low bounce
a touch fuller on off at 140kph. Ashwin blocks it to point, as the ball hints to angle away
drives this fuller ball outside off to point. That made a good sound off the bat, but didn't go far
on the shorter of a good length on off, and clipped expertly to deep midwicket. A reminder of what the Ashwin of old did with the bat. Good chase by long-on running to his right, pulling it back late
phew, this flies past the outside edge now! Ashwin's bat face is half-closed as he tries to clip this fuller ball outside off, as the ball shapes to angle in before moving away late
full ball no off, and driven to deep point
full again off, and driven to long-off now
another full delivery on middle and off. Flicked to long-on
good length ball on middle, as he steps across to clip to fine leg
on a good length on off, as he closes the bat face to tuck to midwicket
gets into it with a slog over long-on! Gowtham goes fuller on off, as Hetmyer is down on his knee early to heave that across the line. Makes up for a quiet over until then
low full toss on off, as the ball is tossed up. Pushed to long-off
past the outside edge. Slides this fullish and fast on off, and it turns away, as he has a poke
shorter in length and outside off. Cut away to deep point
pretty full ball on off, and driven to deep point
fuller and outside off. Again he has tries to have a dab, but is beaten on the outside edge
shorter in length outside off, and turning away. Cut to point
full on off, and flatter too. Tapped to cover

dropped by Krunal at long-on! That was an easy catch. Hetmyer tries to pull that ball, but it isn't short enough on middle, and neither does he get it off the middle of the bat. Krunal almost seemed unsure how to take it, and ended it somewhere between a reverse cup and his fingers facing the sky
single to deep midwicket, as Ashwin clips this fullish ball which is quicker too on leg
pushed back to the bowler, as the ball is on a good length
fuller on leg, and nudged towards midwicket. The bowler gives the chase
fullish in length and a little wide of off, as Ashwin has a jab but misses
shorish in length, and wide of off. Finds extra cover with his cut
off the outside edge, but wide of slip. Goes pushing at this fullish ball turning away. Good diving stop to his right at short third man
fullish and down the leg side. Left alone, and called wide
short of a length on off, and pulled to long-on from deep in the crease
leading edge there. Closes the bat face early to that good length ball on off, and somehow manages to get it towards long-off
a yorker on middle, and quick and flat. Jammed off the inside edge
gets a bottom edge, as he looks to sweep that full ball outside off. A single behind the wicket
sends that flying over the bowler's head! Boom! Opens the bat face a touch to that full ball on off, and launches into that with his front leg out of the way
six more, and Ashwin presses the accelerator! Short of a length on leg, and he waits for the ball to come to pull over deep midwicket from deep in the crease
full toss on off, and he lofts that on the bounce to long-off
short and wide of off, and cut away to the right of deep point
fuller and just outside off. Pushed back to the bowler
this is quicker and on a good length on middle and leg. He clips to short fine leg
back of a length outside off, and punched to point
has a swing at that pretty full outside off, but just manages to nudge it to the bowler's right. A single dribbling to long-on
short of a length just outside off. He taps that to point after getting on top of the bounce
fires a yorker on off, as Ashwin gets an inside edge while trying to slog to the on side. The ball goes to fine leg, as the keeper can't collect the throw cleanly to allow an overthrow
wide outside off. Too full and too wide. Left alone
swing and a miss! On a shortish length outside off, and he misses his pull
lofts that to long-off. Pretty full ball on off at 135kph, and Ashwin mistimes his slog
yorker on leg, as he makes room. Flicked to fine leg
fires that over wide long-on! Right there in his hitting zone on a full length on middle, as he gets his front leg out of the way to launch into that heave
has a swing again, but misses this. It was full and pretty wide of off, and angling away further as it was a slower ball
hoicked over short fine leg! Has a free swing of the arms to that good length ball on middle, which is angling away. Gets that off the inside edge, but four still
Has that landed in the sea? Drilled over the bowler's head. Takes a step across off, and gets that full length ball outside off. Fires that bang over the bowler's head
change of pace, and short and wide of off. He slaps that to the man at cover-point, and pinches a single
a near yorker on middle, and crunched to long-on from deep in the crease
full and wide of off, as he drags that to deep point
swatted over deep point! Short and wide of off, and he rides the bounce to slash that far and wide of the man at deep point
slapped over deep midwicket! What has got into him suddenly? Reaches his fifty off 33 balls. Right in the slot on a fullish length on middle, and he swings like freeing himself of pain
has another heave, and gets that on the bounce to deep midwicket. Fuller on middle and leg this time from Avesh
cracks a yorker on middle. Parag jams his bat down late for a single
a slow, dipping full toss on middle and leg. Swung away to fine leg
all that doesn't matter, as Hetmyer still gets six! A slower ball, and a full toss outside off. He is ready to dispatch that out of the world. Six over deep midwicket
makes room, and pulls this short of a length ball wide of off to long-on
another slower ball, another full toss and another six! Parag is down on his knee to send that blazing over fine leg. More pain for Holder

is that a clean catch by Gowtham at fine leg? Yup, looks like. But the umpire will check even as Parag is ready to walk back. A slower-ball bouncer from Holder on off, and he gets extra bounce. Gowtham has to go low, but takes it well in the end

peach of a ball! Comes around the stumps, bowls full, ball originates outside off but swings in with the angle. Rahul can't get any bat on it with the late swing, and Boult's angle has worked against Rahul! Through the gap between bat and pad as Rahul tried to mow it through the leg side
top take by Samson as he flies to his left to grab this one handed. Bowl went full on middle to the No. 3 Gowtham, but went down the leg side courtesy the swing.

two wickets in three balls! The new-ball master is at it. The Gowtham experiment has not worked, Boult too good for him with the new cherry. Boult comes over the stumps. Full on middle, and angling into leg stump. Gowtham can't get bat on ball.
full outside off as he searches for the swing. Ends up overpitching. Toe-ends a drive to mid off
full outside off stump. Pushes at the ball angling away from Holder. No swing
length ball on off, and just going across Holder subtly. He sticks the bat out to try and push at it, but the ball goes past the outside edge. So close!
fullish, wider from Boult, and Holder pounces on it. Good length outside off, and cut behind square, past the packed slip cordon
full ball around the stumps. Swings in and lands on middle. de Kock flicks off his pads
good length on his pads, and clipped to the leg side
full outside off, from over the stumps. Bit of outswing, taking it away from Holder. Left alone
full outside off. Bit of movement away as he presses forward to defend. Past the outside edge
good length, outside off stump. Tries to cut, misses out on the connection
ends up as a wide full toss since Holder reaches out to drive and the ball is swinging away. Mistimed to cover point
full from over the wicket. Lands around off stump. Full face of the bat in his front-foot block

full and wide outside off stump. Presses forward and caresses a drive through the covers. Got four written all over it, but Jos Buttler has other plans. Runs towards the boundary, throws in the dive, and slides the ball back in even though he crashes into the boundary line.
full outside off, and he gets into the front-foot drive to the off side
full on middle and leg, and swinging further into leg and perhaps down. Holder can't get the flick, and it hits the front pad. No lbw appeal either
around the stumps. Back of a length and angling into Holder's body. Looks to pull, but mistimed. Bottom-edged onto the deck
inside edge and luck goes Holder's way. Boult went length from around the stumps, and Holder tried to muscle a pull over the leg side. Edged, over the stumps, and races away to fine leg
around the stumps. Length ball trying to follow de Kock if he backs away to the leg side. He doesn't, tries to flick, hits the thigh and rolls down to long on
over the stumps. Full outside off, enticing Holder to drive. But the ball swings away, and he misses the connection

in the air and mid on - Ashwin - pockets that with ease. Prasidh bowls short of a length, Holder looks to be in position to pull, but the bat's face is looking up, and has sliced the shot in the air. A fist pump from Prasidh as Super Giants go 14 for 3
crunched over cover for four! Prasidh goes full outside off, Hooda chooses to drive with hard hands. Off the bat's middle, and flies over the infielder
back of a length, fifth-stump line. Hooda rides the bounce, gets on top of it, before cutting to point

full outside off stump. Leans into a drive, well struck, but Buttler flies to his right along the ground from mid off to complete a one-handed stop. Saves three runs, and keeps the pressure up on Super Giants
back of a length, on off. Rides the bounce and fends it to the off side. Soft hands
full on middle and leg. Swinging into Hooda. Looks to flick it off his toes, but it's a quick ball that zoots through. Hits his front leg, but impact on leg is probably outside leg stump too.
smart shot as Hooda uses Boult's pace and the field placement to ramp this short ball over the infield
full on leg, and flicked well behind square off his boots. Rassie at deep square leg runs towards fine leg and puts in a slide to save two runs
around the stumps. Length ball outside off but angling into off stump. Bottom-edges the cut
full on a stump to stump line. Defended to the off side off the front foot
full on middle stump. Defended off the front foot to mid on
around the stumps. Full on middle stump. Pushed to long off for one
full on off stump. Flicked off his pads to fine leg for a single
full on off stump. Guided off the front foot to the off side
slider. Length ball on off and angling in. Punched to long on
good length, on off and middle. Defended towards the off side. Single? No, infielder swoops in from point to stop
almost a yorker on off stump. Ends up as a low full toss and he toe-ends the drive back
full on off stump. Pushed to mid off, and he takes off for one. Running to the danger end, and Prasidh aims a throw. Not a direct hit!
good length, on leg stump. Swivels and pulls over deep backward square!

is it a wicket for Kuldeep?! Length ball on leg, zips through. de Kock tries to pull in front of square, but it goes through to the keeper. En route to the keeper, it touched something, since there was some noise. Massive appeal for caught behind but not given. They don't review either. The sound was ball grazing the waist
full on middle and leg. Clipped to deep backward square leg
full outside off. Hooda wants to drive. But he loses his shape, and the ball goes past to Samson. Good first over, despite the six
good length ball on off. Clipped to deep square leg
fuller ball on middle, and flicked to deep square leg
full again, and outside off. He clips to deep square leg. de Kock wanted a second, but was sent back
gets a leading edge as he looks to clip this full ball on leg, which is turning away a touch
skips down, and swings to deep midwicket! Gets to the pitch of the full ball on middle, and plays across the line after getting to the pitch
short of a length on middle and turning away. Pushed to long-on
good length ball with a hint of turn in. Punched to long-off
slams that full ball outside off over the bowler's head after backing away
fuller and straighter. Pushed back to the bowler
short of a length and wide of off. Slashed to deep point
back of a length on middle, and he gets an inside edge as he looks to stab at that. Single to short fine leg
fuller on off, and driven to long-on

crashed into the stumps! Sen has his first IPL wicket. The middle and leg stumps are shaken. On a good length on middle, as Hooda swings across the line and misses. Hooda was standing on leg stump there, with his front leg out of the way. Clean bowled
back of a length outside off, and tapped to third man
swipes this fullish ball - not all that short - on middle, and drags that wide of long-on
fullish on off, and he quickly dabs that to cover for a single
runs this shortish ball outside off down to third man with an open face of the bat
outside edge, and that races for four! Samson dives to his left, but doesn't get a hand. A low full toss just outside off, as de Kock drives but doesn't get the placement
full ball on off, and tucked to cover for a hurried run
reverse sweeps this full ball on off to short third man. Dot ball early in the over
drags this full ball outside off to extra cover, who doesn't collect cleanly and allows a single
point dives to his left and gets a hand to cut that off! Chahal the man there. Short and wide of off, as Badoni went slashing
on a good length on middle, and from wide of the crease. Clipped to deep midwicket
low full toss on middle and leg, and clipped to deep square leg
fullish ball outside off, and clipped wide of long-on for a couple
sweeps hard and flat in the vast gap at deep square leg! Full ball on middle, and also tossed up. He gets down early to drill that
full and tossed up on middle. Turned away to fine leg after playing late
shimmies down, and the ball is a low full toss on middle. Jammed to long-on
shuffles across off, and Chahal bowls on a good length wide of off. de Kock gets a leading edge while trying to clip. A single to deep point nevertheless

straight to long-off! Skips down the pitch early - and he had to get bat on ball once he had danced down - as Chahal went full and outside off. Badoni looks to loft, but finds the fielder bang where he was placed on the boundary
full ball on his pads, and flicked towards midwicket. Ashwin gives the chase
looks to clip this fullish ball on middle, but gets a leading edge to short third man
comes down the pitch and defends this fullish ball on off
fuller on middle, and leans into a drive to long-off
full on middle, and clipped to deep midwicket
pushes this full ball on leg aerially to long-off. Ashwin ends with 0 for 20

has Hetmyer pulled it back at the deep point fence? Still, it was a great effort. He ran and dived to his right, and the ball passes below him before he pulls it back. Short and wide of off, and slashed hard
short of a length on middle, and pulled to deep square leg
looks to pull this back of a length ball outside off, but is beaten by the pace. Not as much bounce there too
has a heave outside off, and gets an outside edge to this pretty full and wide of off
full ball on his pads, and flicked to deep square leg for a quick two
low full toss on middle, and pushed to mid-off. A near yorker there
yorker length on middle. Jams his bat down to push back to the bowler
whips that to deep midwicket! Full ball on his pads, and he capitalises on the length to use his bottom hand. Right in the gap there
gets that off the toe end of the bat to point, as he looks to pull that good length ball outside off
drills that swing across the line to long-on, with the ball being full and outside off
shuffles across, and laps that full toss outside off! He was across early, and spotted square leg inside the circle while depositing it over his head
full toss and wide-ish off. He has a swing, but is beaten
short and wide off, and dragged to long-off away from his body
down the pitch, and the ball is on a good length on middle while turning into him. They pinch two, and then a third as the throw is not collected cleanly at the bowler's end and on the back-up

grabbed at long-on! de Kock had to go after Chahal, but he falls. Is it all over for Super Giants? Short of a length and wide of off, as he pulled across the line only to find Parag on the fence. Chahal helps himself to a quiet celebration
good length ball outside off, and cut away to deep point

bowled him around his legs! Pandya was across his stumps really early, and missed his attempted sweep there. Tossed up - and looked like the wrong 'un too - on a fullish length on middle and off. Pandya ended up down on his knees way outside off, and the ball crashed into the stumps as he missed
goes flashing at that wayyy outside off, and gets an outside edge. Tossed up, full and wide of off, as he went chasing that. Got an outside edge, and went for four to third man
slower ball on a back of a length on middle. Tapped to point after letting the ball come to him
much fuller and just outside off. Driven to deep point for a quick two
yorker on off, and he jams that down to point
pretty full on middle, and he drills that to long-on after making room
pulled to deep midwicket! Short of a length on middle and off, and he swivels while riding the bounce and pulling with his front leg in the air
fuller length on off, and he hoicks across the line to fine leg. It was a slower ball too
six over deep midwicket! Short ball from Chahal, and quicker on middle and leg. Stoinis pulls from deep in the crease, and hammers that away
pretty full and wide of off. Slashed to extra cover, as he doesn't find the gap
sharp turn away from the batter. Short and outside off, and turning away further. Slashed to deep point away from hid body
and again, but this is wide. Short and wide of off, and spins away well. He cuts, but misses
chipped back to the bowler on the bounce! Fuller on middle, and tucked back
more turn for Chahal. Called wide... and Chahal has a chat with the umpire. Full and tossed up outside off, and turning away as he misses his sweep. Harsh call

animated appeal for leg before, but turned down. And Samson reviews. A yorker length ball on middle and leg, after being tossed up. He had his front leg out of the way, and missed the ball while trying to jam. There is no inside edge there as well. And replays show that would hit the base of middle stump
has he been practicing swinging his bat? Nails that slog over deep midwicket after going down on his knee to that tossed up ball on middle and off. Chahal is hurt, and shakes his head
wide to begin. Too full and wide of off, and left alone

clips behind the wicket for four! Walks across off very early, and ended up exposing all three stumps. Fullish ball on middle, and he clips away from his body. Beats short fine leg to his right by a fair margin

low full toss on middle, and swung away to deep midwicket. The throw arrived at the bowler's end, as Prasidh even whipped the bails off while Avesh seemed well in. But the umpires goes upstairs, and it is not out
fired over the bowler's head! Another low full toss on middle, and Stoinis has his front leg out of the way to help swing himself. Bang for six down the ground
goes for the yorker, and it's a full toss on off. Pushed to long-on, and they don't run for him to keep strike

bangs it in short on off at 140kph, and Samson and Prasidh go up for a potential caught behind as Stoinis misses his pull. Not given, and Samson reviews. Nothing there, as confirmed by UltraEdge, with the ball passing over his bat and then his right shoulder. Review lost
he holds the pose, and six down the ground! A low full toss - yet again - perhaps while missing his yorker, and Stoinis tears into it with high elbows and the full face of the bat
full toss on middle, and he lofts that over cover. Only a single there, of course
sends that to the man at extra cover. Full and wide of off, and he drills that straight to the man
looks to scoop, but is hit on his front pad. Pretty full ball outside off, and Stoinis is hit outside off after shuffling across
swing and a miss! This should potentially deicide the match, unless of course there aren't wides or no-balls. Again pretty full and wide of off, and Stoinis has a heave but is beaten
no-look hoick, and takes the outside edge over short third man! Full delivery outside off, and he swung for the on side but had no control there.

Stoinis launches that over midwicket, but alas! Rajasthan Royals win by three runs. Right in the slot on off, and he heaved across the line to send that flat and furiously over the fence. It doesn't matter though
Tame start from Umesh, top start for Shaw! Length ball outside off, just a bit of movement away. Nothing much to trouble Shaw, who stands tall and punches it through wide mid-off for four.
Angled in on the pads, clipped through backward square leg for a brace. Shaw is up and running.
Back of a length around off, punched to mid-on from the crease.
Punches the length ball straight to cover.
Umesh errs, Shaw capitalises. Harmless length ball on the pads, tickled away fine on the leg side for another four.
Better line. On a length on off, defended from the crease. Good start for Capitals and Shaw.
Sprayed full and well outside off at 127.5 clicks. Warner reaches out and gets it past the diving point fielder to open his account.
Full and a bit of swing inwards. Shaw waits back and flicks it with the angle to midwicket.
There goes Shaw! After a couple of watchful deliveries, he charges down to the length ball and absolutely thrashes it through covers with disdain.
On a length on off, a bit of shape away. Pushes it towards mid-on despite losing his shape a touch and gets to the other end.
Beaten Warner for pace! Fuller and outside off, movement away. Warner looks to cut but misses due to the extra bounce.
Warner finds the real estate on the leg side. Short in length, quickly rocks on to the back foot to heave-pull it through midwicket. All along the ground.
Crisply punched to mid-off for none. It was just full of a good length on off.
Strays in line again. Tickled fine but finds short fine leg. Just one on this occasion.
Fuller on the pads, tapped towards square leg for one. Rahane's shy misses the stumps at the striker's end. Would have been curtains for Shaw, who doesn't dive.

Umesh had telegraphed the short ball by having deep point and deep square leg. But Shaw manages to get the pull away, despite not being in the best of positions. Beats deep square leg to his right. Wow!
Another bumper! Off the helmet. Rattles Shaw, who looks to be in some discomfort. Misses the pull and it goes off his helmet over short third man.

Hammered away! A gentle ball on a length around middle and leg, Prithvi flicks it over the fielder at midwicket and gets four. Doesn't seem all that at ease, as he adjusts his helmet yet again, touching the part where he got hit on the last ball.
Some way to welcome his Test captain by Warner. Short ball and going away on the angle, he hopes and thumps it over covers for four.
That's crunchy as chips from Warner! Length ball going away, enough room for him to free his arms. Gets it through covers for another four.

Edged but just short! Not sure if it was intentional, but he's just escaped, has Warner. Looks to guide the fuller ball to third man but gets a thick edge that lands short of a diving Billings to his left.
Length ball outside off, steered to deep backward point for one.
Shortish in length around the fourth stump line, Shaw stays back and blocks.
Angling down leg on a length, misses the flick.
