another wide yorker from Jordan, marginally misses his mark, carved to short third man. Excellent over from Jordan
Jordan misses the yorker. On-pace full-toss on middle stump, Rabada drags it away between deep midwicket and long-on
Rabada steps away outside leg, wide full-toss from Pretorius. Passes the tramline. Wide called
Pretorius nails a wide yorker, which is dug out to long-on off the inner half
full and dips outside off, 110ks, good bowling from Pretorius. Odean swings for the hills and gets an inside-edge onto the pad
slower ball from Pretorius, takes it away from Odean's swinging arc. He swishes and misses outside off
Pretorius goes full and wide once again, with a packed off-side field, but this is too wide. Pretorius has to re-bowl it. Another swing and a miss from Odean
on-pace yorker outside off, toe-ended down to long-off
full-toss sprayed wide of off, off-side wide
slower offcutter, dips outside off and nibbles away from Rabada, who is beaten
Smith is caught by DJ Bravo at long-on. Jordan marginally misses the yorker, but it's still pretty full on middle and leg. Smith can't get underneath the length and hauls it away to the outfielder
low full-toss on middle, patted away to the right of Jordan, to long-on
Jordan marginally misses the yorker once again, but it is still full enough to squeeze underneath Rabada's bat
perfectly acceptable yorker from Jordan, stabbed to covers, a fumble allows Rabada to come back for the second
Jordan now hits a heavy length outside off, plinked to mid-off
sliced away to sweeper cover for a single. Another good over from Jordan
wide yorker outside off, dips underneath Chahar's bat
Pretorius misses his length. Fractionally overpitched and outside off, Chahar stays leg-side of the ball and scythes it away past the right of sweeper cover for four
slower ball, floats away outside off, 109.4ks, Chahar slogs way too early and does not make contact

Pretorius shifts his length. Shorter and wide of off stump. Carved away in the air. Gaikwad aims to settle under it at sweeper cover. He catches the ball with both hands, but the momentum takes him beyond the boundary. He can't parry the ball back into play in time
length ball swinging in from outside off, defended on the front foot
length ball, starts from well outside off and swings in to end on the stumps. Flicked towards deep midwicket
length outside off, this one leaves the batter. Uthappa goes for the cut, gets an outside edge over the slip fielder. Third man cuts it off
length ball around off and coming in to the batter, tucked away towards short midwicket
length ball around off, moves away. Pushed towards mid-on for a quick single
falls short of Dhawan at first slip. Fuller outside off and moving away. Pushes at it tentatively, gets an outside edge but it doesn't carry
short of length outside off, looks to work it towards third man but gets beaten
length ball on the stumps, goes for the aerial flick but gets an inside edge onto the pads
length ball on the stumps, just flicks it through midwicket and it just speeds off the outfield, beating the man coming in from deep square leg
length ball on the stumps, tucked away towards short midwicket. Only a single this time
length outside off, goes for the uppish cut. And it lands just short of the cover fielder who dived forward but couldn't get his hands under it
a touch fuller in the channel, Gaikwad's feet are nowhere close to the ball as he pushes at it and gets an outside edge. An easy catch for Dhawan at first slip who celebrates it with a thigh-five.
fuller around off and swinging in, Uthappa flicks it through square leg and finds the boundary

Uthappa falls as well! A length ball around off, Uthappa walked towards it and across, and looked to flick it on the leg side. All he got was a top edge that went straight up. Agarwal from mid-off ran to his right and caught it comfortably
fuller around off, pushed towards extra cover
length ball in the channel, left alone
fuller around off, Rayudu comes forward to defend but is beaten as the ball moves away from him
length ball but drifting down the leg side. Rayudu was looking to get some bat on it but cannot
fuller length outside off, driven firmly towards extra cover who fumbles and allows a single
length ball in the channel, left alone
short of length outside off, punched behind point for four, easily done
fuller outside off, comes forward and drives but mid-off slides to his right to make the stop
short of length outside off, Rayudu was looking to cut it away but is surprised by the extra bounce. In the end, he dabs it towards cover
short of length outside off, Rayudu arches back to let it go
short of length outside off, cuts it through point but there is a man in the deep now
fuller around off and swinging in, flicked towards short deep midwicket
fuller outside off and shaping away. Digs it out towards cover-point for a quick single
a length ball in the channel, left alone

Chopped on. 128.5kph, a length ball wide outside off, Moeen looks to drive it through covers but ends up playing on the up and away from the body. His feet didn't move at all. Gets an inside edge onto the stumps
a length ball around off, stays in his crease and defends
length outside off, punched towards short extra cover where the fielder fumbles but it doesn't cost
length ball around off, defended on the off side
length ball around off, chopped behind point for one

chopped on! . Arshdeep the bowler this time, Jadeja the batter. It was a length ball outside off that nipped back. Jadeja looked to punch it but got an inside edge that deflected on to the thigh pad before ricocheting onto the stumps
off the mark with a boundary. A length ball outside off, stands tall and punches it in front of cover for four
length outside off, steered towards backward point
length ball on the stumps, defended back
fuller down the leg side. Rayudu tickles it to the fine-leg boundary
fuller around off, comes forward and defends
length ball around off, defended on the leg side
use of feet to steer it behind point for one
a bouncer from around the stumps. Dube was caught in an awkward position. Gets a top edge as he looks to pull it half-heartedly but it sails over the keeper
length ball in the channel, pushes at it and gets beaten
fuller on the stumps, Rayudu digs it back towards the bowler
short of length outside off, Rayudu looks to steer it towards third man but gets beaten

a superb catch by Jitesh. Banged in short, Rayudu was looking to ramp it but the ball keeps coming in and hits him on the gloves. It lobs to the right of the keeper who throws himself in the air and takes it airborne
short of length around off. Hops and dabs it towards short midwicket
length ball around off, punched towards extra cover
length ball around off, stands tall and punches it through covers. Sweeper cuts it off
fuller on the stumps, flicked past short midwicket but will get only a single
length ball around off, goes back and punches it to the left of the bowler. He slides across to stop it
length ball around off, opens the face of the bat to guide it through point
in the blockhole. Digs it out towards long-on
down the track and pushes it back towards the bowler
fuller outside off, looks to drive through extra cover but gets beaten
length ball on the stumps, drags a pull towards deep square leg
short of length outside off, left alone
short of length outside off, pulled down towards deep-backward square leg
short of length on the stumps, Dube stays still before pulling it over deep square leg. All the way for a six
fuller and wider outside off, looks to get his bat on it but fails
fuller on the stumps, flicks it aerially, over forward square leg, and finds another boundary
wrong'un from R Chahar, breaks back into Dhoni, forced down to long-on off the back foot
legbreak to the left-handed Dube, but the length is still fairly short, punched away to deep midwicket
another googly to Dhoni, but the shorter length allows him to punch a single to long-on off the back foot
wrong'un to Dube, breaks away from the left-hander, but the length is shorter again. Dube reaches out for the ball with his hands and flays it away through the covers
sharp-turning legbreak from Chahar, on a length and turns back in, Dube camps back and ekes out an inside-edge onto the pad
on a length and turns away outside off, Dhoni jabs it straight to short cover
slower ball, full and outside off, Dube drags it across the line to deep square leg
back of a length and sliding across Dhoni, from over the wicket, punched off the back foot to cover
hip-high short ball outside off, Dhoni pulls it firmly to the left of Arora at long leg
SRK dives across to his right from deep midwicket to stop this hit from Dube. Hip-high short ball, pulled away by Dube
on-pace short ball angling across Dhoni, flaps a pull to deep square
blazed away to the cover boundary. All hands from Dube. He stays leg-side of this overpitched delivery outside off and sends it to the off-side fence
pushed through, turning into middle, Dhoni prods at it and inside-edges onto the pad
down the track and whipped away to deep midwicket
legbreak, on a length and turning into the pads, clipped away to deep midwicket
Livingstone takes this legbreak away from Dhoni, he reaches out and stabs it to cover
fractionally short and turns away outside off, Dhoni still can't get it past cover
punched down to long-on. Just three off the over as the asking rate balloons to 15.57
short and slanting into middle at 141.1ks, Dhoni hangs back and glances it through square leg. The no-ball buzzer goes off. Rabada has overstepped by a big margin
full and zipping across off, Dube swishes and misses in the channel
slower ball on the pads, tucked away through square leg. Dube comes back for the second. The no-ball siren goes off once again
slower ball on a back of a length, in line with the stumps, Dube does not pick the variation. He swings way too early and wears it on the thigh pad
slot ball from Rabada. On-pace delivery outside off. Overpitched and width on offer. Dube sizes it up and crunnnnnnnnnnches it over Rabada's head
another slot ball from Rabada, Dube pings the sightscreen. Slower one outside off, Dube delays the loft and there's that lovely flow of the arms even though the feet don't move much
much better from Rabada. Wide yorker, stabbed out to deep point. Dube races to a 26-ball half-century
full and angling into middle, Dhoni opts to camp back and prods it back to Rabada
legbreak to Dube, pushed through flat, Dube swings for the hills and drags an inside edge past short fine leg for four
dragged down on off stump, Dube stays back and swats it down to long-on
shorter legbreak outside off, Dhoni goes on the back foot and cuts it away to sweeper cover
back of a length and turning into the hips, Dube whips it through backward square leg for a double

Livingstone strikes with the ball, Kumble applauds from the dugout. Skewed to short third man. Livingstone bowls into the pitch and takes it away from Dube. The left-hander top-edges a pull to Arshdeep

Livingstone has pulled off a terrific one-handed catch. He throws himself to his left from his followthrough and snags Bravo. Fuller legbreak from Livingstone, Bravo checks his push and chips a return catch. That it is a catch is down to Livingstone's brilliance. After firing with the bat, he does the job with the ball: 2-0-11-2
shortish and turns away outside off, punched to sweeper cover
Pretorius unleashes a massive slog-sweep. Too full and turns away outside off, he drops down to one knee and tees off
short and turns away outside off, Pretorius stabs it out to cover
wrong'un, skidding into middle and leg, whipped away between deep midwicket and deep square
slog-swept straight to Arshdeep at deep midwicket. Pretorius backs away, then jumps back in line with the stumps. He swings but hits it straight to the outfielder

Jordan bags a duck on his CSK debut. Googly from Chahar? Nope, it's the legbreak turns away from Jordan and smacks him on the back pad above the knee-roll. Jordan consults with Dhoni and asks for a review of the on-field out decision. Ball-tracking suggests it would have bounced over off stump
slog-sweep over deep midwicket for six. Pushed through flat and quick on middle, Dhoni says 'enough is enough' and brings out the big hit
shorter and turns away outside off, slices an outside edge to short third man
faster legbreak from Livingstone. Dhoni throws his bat at ball and carves an outside edge fine of short third man
full and turning into middle, played back
off-side wide
dragged down outside off, Dhoni hauls a pull straight to Shahrukh at wide long-on
Jordan throws his bat at ball and almost chops it back onto his own stumps

Jitesh thinks he has Dhoni. Wide called, but Jitesh immediately signals for a review. He convinces Agarwal. Short and sliding down the leg side, Dhoni aims a pull. Ultra Edge detects a spike. Jitesh gets it right. The on-field not-out call has been reversed. Dhoni falls for 23 off 28 balls
tossed up outside off, Choudhary forces it down to long-on
googly, skidding into Jordan, whipped away through square leg
another wrong'un from Chahar, brushes the pad and rolls away past leg stump
Chahar draws a leading edge that drops in front of cover
Fittingly, it is Livingstone who takes it at long-on and closes out the game for Kings. Dragged down on middle, CJ rocks back and hauls a pull to Livingstone
length ball on the pads, tucked away towards square leg
length ball on the pads once again, Gill helps it behind square leg

a big appeal for caught-behind. Given not out but Capitals want to review it. Was a length ball outside off, Wade jumped across and looked to lap it over the keeper's head. There is some noise as the ball passes the batter and the UltraEdge confirms it's of the bat. Wade walks back for 1
Fizz goes fuller on the stumps, a bit of shape back into the batter. Vijay Shankar goes for the flick but cannot beat short fine leg
pitched up on the stumps once again and Vijay Shankar doesn't miss out this time. Flicks it through midwicket. Off the mark with a four
length ball on the stumps, was looking to turn it on the leg side. Gets a leading edge towards extra cover but it lands safe
fuller in the channel, moving away. Left alone

fuller on the stumps, moving away once again. The batter looks to push at it, gets a thick outside edge but it goes down towards second slip, who dives to his right, makes the stop and has a shy at the stumps. A direct hit would have been close
length outside off, goes for the cut but mis-hits it towards the bowler
length ball around off, stands still and pulls it through midwicket for four. You know what's worse? Thakur has overstepped as well
too full on the stumps, digs it out down the ground for one
length ball on the pads, flicked towards square leg where the fielder puts in a diving stop. The partial stop is good enough to prevent the single
length outside off, cuts it towards backward point. Straight to the fielder
length ball, wide outside off, slapped through covers
length ball on the pads, tucked away towards long leg
nearly chopped on. Short of length outside off, goes for the cut but there's not enough room. Goes parallel to the stumps, just missing them
length outside off, looks to get on the top of the bounce but fails to get the timing right. Chopped towards mid-off

edged but it falls short of Pant. Was a length ball outside off, Shankar was looking to open the face of the bat but gets a thick outside edge. The slip fielder gathers the deflection and aims at the stumps. Misses but think Gill was home
short of length and Gill tucks it towards square leg. The call is for two but they will get only one
length but way down the leg side
crunched. Length outside off, plenty of room this time and Gill cuts it past the point fielder
length again, Gill goes for another cut but this time there is little room. Chopped towards point for a quick single
fuller around off, comes forward and defends it towards covers for a quick single
fuller outside off, looks to crash it through covers but doesn't get the timing right. Bounces towards the fielder
length outside off, dabs it in front of point for one
length ball around off and nips back in off the seam. Shankar tentatively hangs the bat out and gets an inside edge past the stumps
length ball angling towards the pads, helped towards midwicket
into the crowd. Fuller outside off, Gill goes down on one knee and sweeps it over backward square leg, all the way for a six, 77 metres
shortens his length, just outside off. Gill taps it towards long-off
length ball on the stumps, Shankar backs away and hits it just over the bowler, who jumped but couldn't get his fingers on it. Long-on cuts it off
mistimes the cuts towards covers
quicker outside off. Shankar is staying leg side of the ball. He tries to steer it fine but is beaten by the pace
fuller length outside off, pushed to the right of mid-off
slower one, on the pads. Shankar was early into the flick. Misses and gets hit on the pads. A leg-bye as the ball dribbles towards gully
length ball around off, dabbed towards cover-point for a quick single
length ball angling across, goes for the pull but is cramped and the ball bounces towards point off the splice
length outside off, cuts it alright but there's a fielder in the deep
length ball on the pads, 132kph. Goes for the flick but misses again and is rapped on the pads. An appeal for lbw, mainly from the bowler, but denied. They get another leg-bye
and he strikes straightaway. Tossed up on a length around off, Shankar goes for the slog sweep but is early into it. All he gets is an inside edge that deflects onto the stumps
length ball around off, was looking to work it on the leg side but gets an outside edge that bounces towards point
he had no clue about that. But still gets four. Was a googly from Kuldeep, around off. Hardik came forward to defend, got an outside edge but it went between the keeper and the slip
length ball around off, defended
tossed up around off, comes forward to defend but the ball hits the inner half and rolls towards square leg
short of length, Gill half-bends and half-pulls, half-sweeps it towards deep square leg
fuller around off, lunges forward and defends
length ball around off, punched towards extra cover
fuller around off, pushed back towards the bowler
fuller outside off, comes forward and pushes it towards extra cover. Four dots
length outside off, cuts it to the left of short third man for a quick single
fuller outside off, Gill hits it along the ground towards long-off
tossed up on the stumps, hits it towards long-on for one
length ball on the stumps, punched towards short midwicket
length ball around off, punched towards long-off. Pant provides the background music for that
length ball around off, pushed to the right of the bowler, dives across to make the stop
length ball around off, goes back and flicks it towards square leg and they sprint back for the second
length ball down the leg side. Pulled but straight towards deep-backward square leg
length ball on the stumps, flicked towards forward square leg. Straight towards the fielder but he fumbles and allows a single
length ball on the stumps, goes back and pulls it over midwicket. Didn't time it to the perfection but enough on it take it to the boundary line
length outside off, little footwork as he throws his hands at it. Gets beaten
length ball, just outside off. Hardik goes for the cut but it's too close to him. Beaten again
length ball on the stumps, moves across and whips it behind square leg and they come back for the second
length ball on the stumps, once again goes for the pull but the ball hurries onto him. And this time it drops towards wide mid-on
fuller on the stumps, pushed on the leg side for one. Axar fields himself
length, well outside off. Reaches out and toe-ends the cuts towards sweeper cover
length ball on the pads, flicked towards square leg
length outside off, half-pulls it towards long-on
fuller outside off, and he slashes it through covers. Finds the gap and beats the sweeper cover on his right
length ball on the stumps, punched towards wide long-on
fuller on the stumps, Hardik whips it towards deep square leg. Shaw sprints to his right, puts in the dive and just stops it inside
fuller length outside off, Hardik stands tall and hits it on the up, beats the diving extra cover for four
length outside off, this time finds sweeper cover with the cut
length outside off, slaps it to the left of mid-off, a tumbling half-stop there allows the second run
fuller and wider outside off and Gill crashes it through covers. Second boundary of the over
short of length outside off, pulls it towards the right of midwicket
starts with a half-tracker down the leg side. Gill goes back and pulls it fine, short fine leg had no chance
length ball around off, was looking to cut but realises it's too straight. Hits it back towards the bowler
a googly on the stumps, goes back and turns it towards square leg for a couple
quicker around off, goes back and flicks it in front of square leg, gets to his fifty off 32 balls
fuller around off, comes forward and defends
fuller around off, flicked towards deep midwicket for a couple. Gill had to put in a dive at the non-striker's end
length outside off, cuts it to the left of the diving extra cover fielder. The sweeper had no chance to cut it off
and he gets inventive now. A length ball around off, moves across and laps it fine for another boundary
fuller and wider outside off, drags it towards long-on
length ball around off, some extra bounce there surprised Hardik who adjusted and turned it behind square leg
length outside off, goes for the cut but finds extra cover this time
fuller around off, Hardik goes down the ground but doesn't get the required elevation. Still it's hit hard and pops out of Powell's hands at long-on but he keeps his calm and catches the rebound
fuller on the stumps, Gill clears his front leg and hits it over the bowler's head. 81 metres
length ball on the stumps, goes back and turns it behind square leg
fuller on the stumps, defended on the off side
length outside off, cuts it in front of the sweeper cover. Mandeep puts in a sprint, followed by a desperate dive but cannot stop it
beaten! Length outside off, looks to punch but gets beaten by the turn
length ball on the stumps, punched back
an appeal for lbw but given not out. Full around off, Gill goes for the fine reverse paddle but is beaten and is hit on the back leg. Did it hit him in the line?
fuller around off, hits it towards long-on
fuller on the stumps, hits it towards long-on for one more
deep into the stands. A length ball around off, Gill slogs across the line, gets it from the middle of the bat and it sails for an 83-metre six
fuller outside off, hits it through covers and comes back for the second
fuller, in the slot. Gill smashes it over the bowler's head. Straight as an arrow. Moves to 82 with that four
length ball outside off, slapped towards deep cover and they come back for the second
length ball around off, dabbed towards backward point
length ball angling across, goes for the pull but mistimes it towards long-on. Falls well short of the fielder
length ball outside off, cuts it towards deep cover for two more
length outside off, dabbed towards short fine leg
fuller and wider outside off. Gill leaves that alone and there's a late call of wide. A bit harsh on the bowler, I think
length ball around off, tucked away towards deep midwicket

length ball around off, goes for that half-pull again. It made good sound off then bat but it was a slower one, which means he didn't get enough power behind it and it turns out to be a dolly for Axar at deep midwicket
fuller on the stumps, clipped towards deep square leg
short of length outside off, Miller helps it fine, just beating the third man on his right. It flew off the bat and almost carried all the way
length ball outside off, dabs it towards third man
short of length outside off, pulls it in front of square and beats the sweeper for four
length ball outside off, goes for the another pull but ends up swinging above the ball
fuller outside off, drills it towards long-off
fuller outside off, opens the face of the bat to work it towards short third man
almost a yorker, just outside off. Digs it out towards long-off
fuller but way outside off, needs to be bowled again. Tewatia moved across but left it alone in the end
moves towards the off side once again, Thakur sticks to the wide yorker. Tewatia gets it from the toe end of the bat and it bounces towards the keeper
dropped at deep extra cover. Lalit Yadav the fielder. Fuller and wider outside off, Tewatia throws his bat it but doesn't middle it. Lalit moves to his left, gets under it but fails to hold on to
finishes the over with a six. Fuller outside off once again, Tewatia goes across but this time he slogs it over deep square leg
a slower one, fuller around off, Miller looks to go over long-off but mis-hits it. Only a single
length ball outside off, looks to go over extra cover but ends up slicing it. The extra-cover fielder runs sideways and takes it over his shoulder
length outside off, clears his front leg and hits it down the ground. Didn't time it well. A single to mid-off
fuller on the stumps, digs it out towards midwicket
fuller and angling across. A slower one 121kph. He goes for the slog sweep but it's a cutter at 121kph. He ends up slicing it up in the air and Axar settles under it at cover
a length ball angling across. Rashid swings across but misses. They go for the bye and make it safely as Pant misses an underarm throw to run Miller out
on a length outside off stump, and Shaw gets up on his toes, square-driving through point for four! Deep in the crease, slapping it away square off the back foot
drags his length back a touch, and Shaw dabs a single into the off side. 135kph
nips back appreciably off the seam from a good length. Seifert is late on it, and struck in the groin. Skews away into the gully
back of a length, Seifert jumps into the pull. Mistimed, so deep backward square will get around to cut it off
angling in on a length, 138kph, on-drives to mid-on. Shami tight to the stumps on release
springy bounce from a good length. Seifert cloths the pull, and it falls short of mid-off as they scamper through for a single

chipped to short midwicket, Hardik strikes with his first ball! Seifert admonishes himself as he trudges off. On a good length, Seifert looked to nudge it into the leg side but it stopped on him, and hit the splice of the bat. It looped up into the leg side, and Abhinav took a straightforward catch to his left, in tight. Early strike for Gujarat, Hardik's first IPL wicket since 2019!
back of a length, inside-edged into the pad and it skews away into the off side. 141kph

back of a length, skied into the leg side... but lands in no-man's-land. 141kph. Steepling bounce, and Mandeep plinked the pull towards square leg. Wade and Abhinav both ran towards it, but it fell safely
edged but short of slip. 138kph. On a good length, Shaw has a flash and the outside edge falls short of the man at wide slip. Fumbled, and they get through for one
angling in from a fullish length, worked to short midwicket
back of a length, fenced to point with an open face. 141kph, great start from Hardik
angling in on a length, 139kph, clipped out to deep backward square
a touch fuller, fifth-stump line at 141kph. Steered out into the covers
dragged away through midwicket. 140kph, slightly too full and angling in towards the off stump. Mandeep plays across the line, swinging him away through the leg side
back of a length, 138kph, steered to backward point on the bounce with an open face
slapped away over cover! 141kph, but a half-volley outside off stump. Mandeep gets down on one knee, carving him away over the infield with his weight back
on a length outside off, dabbed down to deep third with an open face and soft hands
skids through on a length, Mandeep can't beat short midwicket. Short-arm jab across the line, but straight at the man in tight

back of a length, wide outside off at 133kph, and Mandeep upper-cuts over short third. Good awareness. Knew the man on the 45-degree angle was up inside the ring, so stayed leg-side of the ball and chopped it up over the infield

banged in short, 138kph, and Mandeep is struck on the side of the grille while trying to pull it away. The physio rushes on as this hit Mandeep in the helmet. Looks like it might have skimmed the glove on the way through, and he looks like he'll be OK. He's passed a very quick concussion check and will continue. Sharp, skiddy bouncer from Hardik
back of a length, Shaw takes it on and drags the pull away through midwicket. Not out of the middle and slightly uppishly, but into the gap between short midwicket and mid-on
back of a length, wide outside off at 139kph. Dabbed away behind square on the off side

pulled through wide mid-on to finish the over with a boundary. Back of a length from Hardik, skidding on, and Mandeep doesn't get this out of the middle. But the field is up, and he drags it into the gap between mid-on and midwicket

banged into the pitch, and Shaw plinks his pull out to deep backward square leg! 138kph, a hint of nip in off the seam, and Shaw can only top-edge it out into the deep, the bat turning in his hands. Vijay Shankar settles underneath it and takes a steepling catch, and Delhi have lost both of their openers
squares him up with a length ball at 141kph, angling in. Skews away out to deep third, with a hint of outside edge as he steers it away
good length, angling in towards the off stump. Defended into the off side
looks to give himself room outside leg stump, but Ferguson follows him. Pushed back down the pitch
short ball, banged in. Mandeep stays leg side of it, looking to steer an upper-cut over the keeper, but can't lay bat on it. Too short for the umpire's liking

feathered through to Wade, Lockie has two in his first over! Hard length into the pitch, Mandeep backs away and looks to cut it away but only manages to get a thin edge on it. He was looking to target the shorter off-side boundary, but Ferguson cramped him for room with a back-of-a-length ball
angling in, nipping in off the seam at 141kph, and Lalit inside-edges into the leg side via the pad
full, angling in towards the leg stump. Pant flicks off the pads, out to deep backward square. There's a mix-up as Lalit sends Pant back, but he scrambles back to make his ground at the bowler's end
slapped back over his head. 142kph, in the slot. Lalit frees his arms, driving on the up through straight mid-off
back of a length, 141kph. Lalit is on the back foot, inside-edging into the pad
back of a length, plinks a pull to mid-on on the bounce
on a length, wide outside off stump, and Lalit swings across the line, carving him over midwicket! Lovely flourish in the shot, crisply timed out of the middle
short ball, 136kph. Lalit is rushed on the pull, skewing it up awkwardly as he flaps at it, but it lands safely, comfortably short of square leg
thick outside edge, down to Rashid who flings himself to his right to cut it off at deep third. 148kph
banged in short, Lalit flaps at it. Shapes to lap it over fine leg but is rushed, and can't lay bat on ball. 140kph
full, angling in towards the pads. Late on the shot, and it skews away off the pads into the leg side
hard length, Pant drags him through midwicket. Pulled off the front foot. 142kph, skidding through towards the hip, and Pant's short-arm jab flies away through the gap

thick outside edge, Wade drops a tough chance! 146kph, hard length, wider outside off stump. Pant looked to pump him back over his head, cross-batted, and it flew through to Wade. He flung himself high to his left, but could only tip it over the bar!
slapped out into the covers to retain the strike
googly, angled across him. Sits deep in the crease, dabbing it away past slip with an open face. Hint of outside edge
swept hard, out to Lockie at deep backward square. Slight misfield, but they don't come back
googly, spinning back into him. Lalit hangs back, punching out to deep point
full googly, poked away to backward point as he lunges forwards
quick legbreak on a length, whipped away through straight midwicket
legbreak, wide outside off stump. Slapped out to deep point on the back foot
angled across him, back of a length. Drags a pull out to deep midwicket
back of a length, outside off stump. Plays across the line, dragging it through square leg
angled across him, 133kph. Slapped to point on the cut
short and wide, angled across him. Pant jumps into the cut, and slaps it away through backward point for four. Slower ball, which Pant picked
back of a length, down the leg side at 135kph. Pant looks to pull it away fine, but can't beat short fine leg

skied up... ball falls safely. Lalit is living a charmed life. 141kph from Aaron, slightly full of a length. Chipped up via a leading edge as the bat face closes early. Loops up agonisingly for GT, but lands between mid-off, running around to his right, and long-on, scampering in off the rope
full and flat outside off, prodded to short cover. "Oooooh, yes Rashy!" yelps Wade

slog-swept over deep midwicket for six! Nailed, flat and hard over the leg side. Abhinav was in the game, jumping back over his head on the rope, but couldn't get there. Full outside off stump from Rashid, but Lalit went towards the short leg-side boundary
mistimed into the leg side, via the inside edge, and they decide against the single
googly on a length, Lalit has no room to get it away through the off side. Rashid fields off his own bowling
another googly, Lalit picks it this time. He gives himself room outside leg stump, and chops it away through point. A slight misfield allows them back for the second
very full, drifting into him. Comes forward, and steers to short third via the outside edge. 98kph

on a length, down the leg side. Pant looks to lap it around the corner to fine leg but doesn't make clean contact. Wade throws at the non-striker's end and it's a direct hit as Pant scrambles through, but he's made his ground comfortably enough

nipping in off the seam, pulled out to deep backward square where Rashid fields. They come back for two and Wade, in front of the stumps, flicks it between his legs and into the stumps, Dhoni-esque. This could be tight... but Lalit's bat is down just in time
good length, angling in towards the right hip. Plinks the pull away over short midwicket, and they scamper back for two. 50 partnership, off 34 balls.
rushed on the pull. One hand comes off the bat and it dribbles away into the leg side
swung away down to long leg
nipping in, back of a length. Nudged into the leg side

cutter, cramps Pant for room... but he gets the cut away for four! Point and short third were up inside the ring, with a short off-side boundary, and Pant played it late, dabbing it away with a wristy slap
wayward. On a length, sprayed down the leg side. Pant can't connect, looking to pull it around the corner

poor bowling, and Pant tucks in. Fine leg is up inside the ring, but Shankar bowls a half-volley outside leg stump. Pant rolls the wrists, chipping it up over the ring. Falls just short of the advertising toblerone. Too easy
looks to hit this into the ocean, but swings himself off his feet. Cutter, angled across him as Pant charged down the pitch, but it spun past the bat

chance for a run-out at the bowler's end. Shankar has stepped on the stumps as he loops to whip the bails off, but only one of them is initially dislodged. He takes the other one off as Lalit dives at full stretch to make his ground and this will be given out. Pant nudged a length ball off his hip straight to Abhinav Manohar, the man at square leg. Mix-up between the two batters, and Lalit had to scramble back. Pant is confused as to what's happened and is in discussion with the umpires, but Lalit has to trudge off

another run-out chance as Shankar fields off his own bowling! Pant nudged a back-of-a-length ball towards midwicket, and called Powell through. Fantastic work from Shankar, running to his left and pinging it at the stumps. Direct hit, but Powell's bat was just about grounded. Bruce Oxenford says 'not out'.

wide outside off stump, slapped away through point on the cut. Gentle pace from Shankar, and wide enough for Powell to free his arms, sitting deep in the crease. Beats backward point and picks up four to get off the mark
back of a length, Pant looks to swing through the leg side but bottom-edges it towards mid-on. Rashid fields off his own bowling
googly, full and wide outside off. Swept firmly out to deep square leg
googly, mistimed into the leg side for a single through midwicket
full googly, drilled away on the pull, sitting very deep in the crease. Absolutely nailed, fast and flat out of the middle, but Lockie fields well on the bounce at deep midwicket

full outside off stump, nudged down to long-on for a single. Rashid and Pant collide at the non-striker's end as Rashid looks to field off his own bowling. Slight grimace from Rashid after wearing a spike to his foot, but he'll be OK
googly, sharply-spun. Wide outside off stump, and slapped out to the sweeper on the cut
wide outside off stump, slaps a cut away through point towards the short side. Googly, gentle pace, and he sits deep in his crease to carve it away
legbreak, Pant shuffles across to cover his stumps and whips it out to deep midwicket

drilled dead-straight down the ground for six! Powell is more confident against legspin these days and nails Tewatia back over his head for an 87-metre six. Tossed up above the eyeline, Powell clears the front leg and clears long-on comfortably
wide on the crease, tosses up a legbreak, wide outside off stump. Powell looks to drag him over the legside but can't lay bat on ball
fullish, much straighter. Punched out to cover and they scamper through for a single, taking on Hardik's arm. Would have been out with a direct hit at the bowler's end!
full googly, angled across him. Milks a single out to deep midwicket to keep the strike

plinked to deep backward square leg! 145kph, banged into the pitch, and Pant is stuck in two minds. It nips away off the seam - or perhaps it's even a very quick offcutter. Pant tries to drag it across the line, but isn't sure whether he's looking to play it away for a single or commit to the shot fully. He mistimes the pull, which loops up agonisingly into the leg side... where Abhinav settles underneath it! What a game Lockie Ferguson is having, 3 for 12 in 2.1 overs. And great call from Hardik to bring him back!
inch-perfect 144kph yorker. Axar has no choice but to dig it out in defence
misfield by Hardik and Axar picks up four. Full of a length, punched away through the off side, but Hardik couldn't get down in time to cut it off at extra cover
another short ball, 141kph and angling in before nipping away, but Axar commits to it fully. He jumps into the pull, timing it away over midwicket

strangled down the leg side, Lockie has FOUR! Perhaps the worst ball he's bowled all night, a 130kph offcutter, angling a long way down the leg side. But Axar flaps at the pull and gets a thin edge through to Wade, who takes a sharp low catch to his right. Gujarat have their sixth wicket
wide on the crease on release, 143kph yorker outside off stump, plinked into the off side via the toe
googly, which he doesn't pick. Hit on the pads
googly, hangs back and whips it out to deep midwicket
legbreak, wide outside off. Dabbed down on the cut, to short third, and Powell sends Shardul back
googly, down the leg side. Shardul looks to clip off the pads, and Wade is unsighted! Five crucial extra runs for Delhi

another googly, which beats the bat as Shardul looks to whip it away. Wade jumps across this time and just about gets in the way. Shardul is baffled as to why it's not a wide... "it hit your thigh pad," Wade tells him
whipped out to deep backward square, and Shardul scampers back for two

full googly, smashes him on the front pad and up goes the finger!. Shardul has little choice but to review. Plants the front foot and plays across the line. No bat involved, hits him on the shin. Impact in-line, and hitting leg stump halfway up! Rashid strikes with the final ball of his spell, and Gujarat are closing in...
offcutter, angling in on a length. Clipped off the hip with soft hands
angled in from around the wicket, back of a length at 142kph. Inside-edged into the leg side, scampers through to get off strike
back of a length, angling in. Dabbed out through backward point. 142kph
beaten for pace. 143kph, angling in from a good length. Kuldeep's feet are rooted to the crease as he fiddles at it, and it's not far away from the top of his off stump
short ball, aimed at the left shoulder. Kuldeep takes it on, and plinks the pull out to Rashid Khan at deep backward square leg on the bounce
back of a length, wide outside off, steered away with a deft late cut. Clever from Powell, who knew short third was up inside the ring. Angled his bat to dab it past him, and picks up four
wide on the crease, on a length and angling in. Thick inside edge past his leg stump, down to long leg for a single

on a length, angling in and skidding through. Smashes Powell on the back thigh and the finger goes up! He has to review, and does so. He was looking to swing him away down the ground but was beaten. Looked like an offcutter, cramping him for room. Smashing into the stumps, and the on-field decision is upheld! Gujarat closing in on a second win.

nicks him off! Back of a length, angling in, and Khaleel backed away, looking to steer it away through point. He could only manage to tickle an outside edge through to Wade, and Shami has two in two balls
attempted yorker, slips out as a full toss. Dead-batted into the off side, and they sneak through for a single
slapped away through extra cover, sets off for the single but Fizz is late to react. Hardik throws at the striker's end... but his throw is wide!

dropped at fine leg! Banged in short, Mustafizur looked to steer an upper-cut away behind square on the off side. He was late on the shot and it flew down to fine leg via the inside edge of the bat. Jayant Yadav, the sub fielder, runs in and dives forwards. Gets two hands underneath it, but it slips out!
plinks a pull into the leg side
angled across him on a good length, steered to point
fullish on leg stump, backs away and hacks it down to long-on
banged in short, following Kuldeep as he backs away, looking to uppercut. 140kph bouncer and he can't lay bat on ball
on a length, follows Kuldeep again as he looks to give himself room outside leg stump. Can't get it away through the infield
short ball, cloths the pull shot through mid-on via the splice. Sharp again from Hardik, up at 141kph
googly, angled across him, hidden very wide outside off stump. Left alone, not given as a wide! Must have been very close
full on the pads, swept out to deep backward square leg
googly, Fizz rocks back and punches out to deep cover
charges down the pitch, and hammers him over wide long-on! Kuldeep gets his dancing shoes on, shimmying down, and swings him 74 metres into the stands
googly, Kuldeep hangs back and slaps it straight to Hardik at extra cover
googly, tossed up and spinning away. Top-edges the sweep out to deep backward square
back of a length, angling in and veering in further from over the wicket. It does not threaten off stump, so Buttler lets it go
shorter and Bumrah brings another one back into Buttler, this tucks him up, squeezed into the leg side
Bumrah searches for the inswinging yorker, but slides it down the leg side. Buttler tickles it away fine past the tumbling Kishan for four
shorter and seams away outside off against the incoming angle. Buttler throws his hands outside off and is beaten in the channel
Bumrah hits a heavy length once again, this is slanted back into Buttler, who does not make contact with a flick and wears it on his body
full-toss, starts outside off and swings away from Buttler as he plays and misses once again
good length and sliding back in at off stump, tip and run to cover
nip-backer from a short of a length, kicks up and catches Buttler in a tangle and hits him just below the ribs
hip-high short ball, straightens along an off-stump line. Buttler sizes it up and mows it over midwicket for six. Such a powerful back-foot pull
fuller than a good length and curls back into Buttler once again. Carefully tapped down to mid-on
even fuller on middle and leg, suspect it was the slower variation, played back to Sams
Buttler picks this full ball off his pads and flicks it away to deep midwicket
nice and full, swinging back into off and middle, blocked back to Bumrah
full and veering into the pads, deflected away only as far as Kishan
another nip-backer from Bumrah, 139ks, inside-edged onto the pad. Buttler chances a single. M Ashwin can't throw the stumps down. A direct hit could've had Jaiswal

Chipped into the lap of square leg. This wasn't a great ball from Bumrah - good length and on the hips - but it brings the right result for MI. Jaiswal is usually strong off his hips, but this he picks out David in the infield
Test-match line and length from Bumrah. Pitched up and angling across off stump, left alone
chipped in the air once again, this time Padikkal clears mid-on for a second-ball four. Bumrah stays on the pads, Padikkal punishes him this time
very full on middle and leg, clipped away straight to midwicket
Buttler splices a pull over mid-on for four. Thampi shortens his length outside off, Buttler clears the infield and collects four
clobbered over long-on for six. Off-stump half-volley from Thampi, poor ball and duly put away by Buttler. He clears his front leg and dumps it over the leg side
shanked over midwicket for another six. 140.3ks, just short of a good length and outside off. Buttler jumps back and swings it over the leg side once again
Having seen off Bumrah, Buttler is laying into Thampi. A bit too full on the stumps, he clears his front leg once again and belts it over Thampi's head

Clubbed over wide long-on boundary for another six. Thampi ventures a slower ball outside off. Floated too full, Buttler manufactures his own pace and sends it over the leg side. Make that 26 runs off Thampi's first over
tickled off the hips to short fine leg as M Ashwin starts with a slower legbreak
pretty full on middle, driven away to the left of long-on. They take on Pollard's arm and complete a double
whisked more or less straight to long-on off the front foot this time
starts off with the wrong'un to Buttler, finishes on the pads, worked away to square leg
seems like another wrong'un from Ashwin, down the track and flicked away through the gap at midwicket
another googly from M Ash, darted on a back of a length and veering away from the left-handed Padikkal. Played back to the bowler. Good first over from M Ash
good length and on middle from over the wicket, guided to cover
Mills puts it on an in-between length and gets it to leave Buttler. He has a weak prod and watches the ball pass the outside edge
shorter and rises further at Buttler who hops and fends it off to the off side
Buttler jumps across off for the ramp over short fine leg, but Mills drags his length back and beats him outside off
fuller and dips on the stumps, slower variation at 113ks, driven to mid-on

Padikkal holes out off the last ball of the powerplay. M Ashwin and Mills have pulled things back for MI. Dug in on a back of a length on middle, gets big on Padikkal who advanced at Mills. He ends up flapping a weak pull to Rohit who settles under the skier at cover
floated on a length on middle, glanced away through backward square leg
good length and nibbling into middle, defensively knocked away
slower, shorter and wider. Samson latches onto it and carves a cut through backward point for four
wide of the crease, back of a length and floated into middle, played back to Pollard
just short of a good length and outside off, solidly punched away to the left of cover
slower ball on a back of a length and outside off, punched away wide of sweeper cover
117.6ks slower ball, short and angling across off, Buttler chops it away through the cover-point region
on-pace back of a length delivery sliding across off, Samson opts to let it go
full again and angling across off stump, dinked away to deep third man

short and Sams takes it away from Buttler's swinging arc. Buttler reaches out for the ball outside off and scythes it away to the left of sweeper cover. Anmolpreet tears across to his left, aims to slide it back into play, but the ball rolls behind to the boundary
Buttler brings up a 32-ball half-century. Shortish and angling across him once again, dinked away fine of short third man for another four
finishes the over with another slower cutter, which is forced away to wide long-off
slides it down the leg side, Buttler sweeps and misses, wide called
fuller and sliding into the pads, clipped away through square leg
Samson backs away outside leg, Ashwin slips in his go-to ball the googly and keeps him to a single to midwicket
dangled up and veering into middle, another googly? Played back to Ashwin
wide of the crease, short and angling into middle, stabbed away to the midwicket region
darted down the leg side, Buttler catches up with this and shovels a sweep, but can't beat Bumrah at short fine leg. Ashwin gets away with that
Ashwin slides down the leg side once again, this time Buttler punishes him, sweeping him fine of Bumrah at short fine leg
very full and wide of off, angling away from Samson further. Sliced away to the left of sweeper cover
low full-toss, dipping into leg stump, this slower ball is tucked away behind square. Thampi hunts it down in the outfield with a slide
short and slanted across off, cut away straight to point off the back foot
Whacked away to the right of deep midwicket. Chest-high short ball on middle, sits up for Buttler, pulled away over the leg side
punched away to the right of point with an open face
Samson joins the party! Slower ball into the pitch at 113.7ks, sits up to be hit. Samson obliges, swatting it over midwicket. He holds nothing back does Samson
M Ashwin needs to reset his radar. Another leg-side wide
pushed through on middle, non-turner from Ashwin, swept flat and hard through square leg
pumped over long-off for six. Samson gives himself room, takes this legbreak from outside off and launches it downtown. Such a clean strike
shorter and turns away outside off, forced down to long-off off the back foot
speared down the leg side for another wide
Buttler backs away outside leg even before Ashwin delivers. Here comes the legbreak. Here goes the legbreak over extra-cover. Buttler takes it from middle stump and hoists it over the off side
Reverse-swatted away to the right of short third man, where Tymal Mills fumbles and gives up four. He puts his hand up in apology right away
quicker googly on middle and leg, patted into the leg side
full and angling across off, driven more or less straight to extra-cover
dipping slower ball wide of off, Buttler reaches out and flays it down to wide long-off
yorker on middle and leg, Samson, having shuffled across off, gets back in line and squeezes it out
Samson launches it over extra-cover for six. Another slower ball from Sams, but he has overpitched it. Samson lines it up and swings it away
lifter, angling across off, one for the over, as the ball sails past Samson to Kishan
Sams nails a middle-stump yorker to close out the over. Squirted back to him
short and wide of off, scythed away to sweeper cover
short and into the pitch, punched down to long-on
slower ball from Pollard once again. Banged in short and outside off, Buttler delays the ramp and gets it fine of short third man for four
bursts from a back of a length outside off and beats Buttler on the cut
back of a length and outside off, Buttler opens the face and finds a single between point and short third man
clipped away through midwicket. Samson eyes a double, but has to settle with a single in the end
on a length and angling into off stump, played back to him
back of a length and largely holds its line outside off, run away towards point
back of a length and angling into a solid punch down to long-on
full-toss outside off, as Bumrah misses the yorker, sliced away to the left of backward point and right of deep third man for four
back of a length and slanting into the top of off, defended back to Bumrah off the front foot
shortish and outside off, tip and run to cover. Buttler plays out another over of Bumrah
flicked off the pads through backward square leg for a single
Pollard has Samson holing out. Another slower ball into the pitch, 112ks, messes with Samson's pull. Simple catch at deep midwicket for N Tilak Varma. Timely wicket for MI
pitched-up delivery outside off, driven away to the left of long-on
slower offcutter, flicked away through square leg for a hard-run double
fuller and drifting down the leg side with short fine leg inside the circle, glanced away fine of that infielder
full and straight, whipped away to deep midwicket
good length and sliding across off, wafted back to Sams
back of a length, starts outside off and angling away from Buttler, slashed away to sweeper cover
bouncer, heading down the leg side, wide called. Sams has to re-bowl it
slower cutter, floated in towards leg stump, chipped down to long-on
wide yorker, squirted out in front of the keeper
full and veering down the leg side
slower ball into the pitch, on a middle-stump line, dinked to midwicket
another wide yorker from Sams, squeezes underneath Buttler's bat
thigh-high short ball, drifting into leg stump. Hetmyer gets inside the line, picks it up and shovel-pulls it over backward square leg
swiped over midwicket for six. Just short of a good length and outside off, Hetmyer delays the pull, bends his back knee, and puts it away over the leg side
full-toss outside off, Hetmyer maintains a stable base and hauls it away to the right of long-on for another boundary
Pollard loses his line this time. Full and sprayed down the leg side, with fine leg inside the circle, turned away to the right of short fine leg
slower offcutter, but finishes past the tramline. Left alone. Off-side wide
back of a length and heading down the leg side, Hetmyer can't put bat on ball, but it brushes the pad and rolls away past the tumbling keeper into the fine-leg fence
pitched-up delivery on the stumps, driven down to long-on. Royals plunder 26 off Pollard's last over
spanked over midwicket for six. On-pace full ball outside off, Hetmyer doesn't middle it, but still clears the leg-side boundary

Mills wins an lbw appeal from umpire Menon. Hetmyer reviews the on-field out decision. Change-up delivery from Mills as he takes pace off. Dips at middle stump. Hetmyer, having jumped across off for the scoop, misses it altogether. No inside edge. The ball hits the back pad in line with middle. The impact was outside off, so the on-field decision has been overturned
on-pace short ball, the line is wide of off, 140ks. Hetmyer reaches out for the ball, uses the pace, and steers it away between backward point and short third man
mighty full on middle, 141.2ks, draws a leading edge that rolls down to long-off
dipping yorker from round the stumps, squeezes underneath Buttler's bat
hard-length delivery outside off, Butter moves to 99 with a weak little push down to long-off

inswinging yorker from Bumrah at 141ks, jammed into the leg side. Bumrah goes up for an lbw appeal. Not given out. Bumrah and Rohit ask for a review. Think Buttler inside-edged it onto the pad. Indeed. So, the on-field not-out decision is vindicated. Buttler hits the first century of IPL 2022. He raises his bat and a hug from Hetmyer is also part of the celebrations

slower full-toss angling across off stump. Hetmyer bends his back knee and hauls it straight to deep midwicket. Hetmyer throws his back in despair but he's played another blinder in the IPL: 35 off 14 balls at a strike rate of 250
another inswinging yorker from Bumrah, 142ks, Parag hastily jabs his bat down. Not given out lbw. Perhaps it was heading down the leg side
Buttler shuffles across off and misses the scoop. This one dips and nearly shaves the leg stump

Bumrah yorks Buttler. 145ks, swinging into the blockhole. Buttler hastily jabs his bat down, but this is too good for him. Clatters into the base of middle stump. Nevertheless, excellent innings from Buttler (although he slowed down later)
pitched up and outside off, sliced away to the right of sweeper cover. Ashwin wants the second and is caught short. Terrific last over from Bumrah. Sharp throw from Tilak Varma in the deep
off-stump yorker, squirted into the covers
Saini backs away outside leg and slices this middle-stump delivery in front of sweeper cover
Kishan settles under this skier. Clever slower variation from the back of the hand. Saini is already through with the leg-side slog by the time the ball reaches him. Kishan does the rest
slower bouncer, 107ks, flapped away to short fine leg
on-pace full ball outside off, Mills pitches it in Parag's slot. The batter holds his shape and thumps this half-volley past the bowler for four
full outside off. Bit of swing away as Kishan stretches out and fends to the off side.
fullish outside off stump. Movement away and Kishan pokes one towards backward point
slapped in front of square for four. Boult goes length, offers Kishan room, and he clatters a cut through the infield
full on off and Kishan's head falls over as he looks to whip it to the leg side. Hits the front leg, but only a polite enquiry for lbw since it's probably going high
full outside off. Bit of shape away. Pushed to the off side
full outside off stump. Stretches out to meet this ball that's already moving away. Mistimed towards point
full on middle, and Rohit is off the mark with a flick through the leg side to the sweeper fielder in the deep
swivels and deposits a pull off his gut area to sent it over fine leg! Not short enough to trouble Rohit, and he's put that away
goes full, but down the leg side. Rohit tried flicking behind square anyway, but missed out
length ball angling into his pads, and nudged off his pads through to the sweeper fielder on the leg side behind square
fullish on off stump. Angling into his pads again. Rohit tries to flick it square, but misses it. Hits him on the flap of the front pad

crunched, but straight to the fielder! Stylish catch from the stylish Riyan Parag, rocking the goggles. Krishna bowls a nothing delivery, short and wide, asking to be hit, but Rohit fails to get it over point. Parag goes low, takes the catch, and the Royals fielders are celebrating!
full on his toes, and Anmolpreet begins his innings beautifully. Flicks it right off his boot, and sends it to midwicket for four
back of a length outside off but angling into his body. Tucks him up, and he uncomfortably nurdles it to the leg side for a quick single
full on middle and off. Anmolpreet punches a front-foot drive between cover and mid off for a single

teasing! Full on middle, and Kishan looks to go over the leg side but the ball swings away and takes the leading edge. In the air, but it falls just beyond Parag chasing it from backward point. A sloppy throw earns them an overthrow
top ball. Length ball outside off but shaping away. Kishan sticks the bat out in a desire to play at it, but it goes past the edge
full outside off. Gentle push to the off side off the front foot
good length, on off. Stays on the back foot, and guides a flick off his waist to deep midwicket
back of a length on off and angling across Kishan. He dabs this with the angle to the off side
so quick to spot the length! Saini goes short on leg stump, Kishan is quick to pirouette on his toes, and then hooks it over fine leg so easily

slower ball. Wider outside off. Kishan is through the shot too early as he looks to smack it straight. Loses shape, one hand comes off the bat, but still gets enough power to hammer it over mid off. Front foot no ball too

goes full, outside off stump. Takes pace off again, and Kishan knows it's a risk-free ball and therefore absolutely clubs it with as much power as he can. Gets it over the cover-mid off region for four more
good length ball on middle and off. Dabbed down to third man
full outside off. Meets the ball on the front foot and drives to mid off's left

the extra ball has earned Saini a wicket Fullish outside off, but the ball doesn't come off the deck as quickly as it should've. Anmolpreet's attempted loft over cover is mistimed, and cover pockets that with ease
full just outside off. Skips down the wicket and pushes it to mid on
off the mark with an inside out push to wide long off. Full on middle and Tilak backed away before playing the shot
fullish on off. Angling in with the arm instead of turning across. Worked off his waist to square leg
length ball on off. Punched off the back foot, straight to Ashwin

good length, outside off. Back-foot tap towards cover and they call for a quick one. Fielder from cover aims at the bowler's end for a run out, and Jaiswal very nearly knocks Ashwin over with that throw
full on off. Gets onto the front foot and plays against the turn, guiding one to midwicket for one
guided for four to third man. Prasidh bowls length on middle and off. Kishan waits for it and plays the shot super late
rolls his fingers over this ball. Length on off, and slapped with a lot of force, but the timing is not quite right
good length on middle. Bit of extra bounce and Kishan tries to play a cute late dab to third man but this time he can't get bat on ball. Past the bat's outside edge to Samson
good length outside off, and he flays a cut to point. Misfield from Parag, and even though he recovers quickly, they can collect the single
good length ball on leg. Bit of extra bounce. Varma is cramped, and offers no real shot. Hits him near the top of the pad and rolls away to the off side

just short of Saini at mid off! Tantalising. Slower ball on middle and off. Varma meets it with hard hands and the ball has popped up in the air. Saini at mid off scurries in to take a catch, even puts a slide in, but the ball falls in front of him.
full on off. Kishan gives Ashwin a charge to look for a big shot straight but mistimes it. Ball rolls away to wide long on
flatter ball, less loop. Length delivery skidding into Varma. Worked to deep midwicket
full ball on leg stump. Dug away to midwicket, and they jog across for one
full on leg stump. Gets forward and flicks off his toes to deep midwicket
full on leg stump. Kishan's first sweep of the evening, hitting it to deep backward square leg

is that the flattest six ever?! Ashwin tries to cramp him with a length ball angling in, but he is quick to turn to his right, opening up the leg side and then drills a pull from near his waist to deep backward square leg for six. Very little elevation as it falls beyond the boundary line. That's a good way to end an otherwise quiet over
full on middle and finds turn right away. Turning into leg, and hits Kishan's pad
good length, on leg and turning further into his pads. Flicked to the sweeper fielder behind square on the leg side
googly. Fullish on off and turning away. Varma mistimes a cut in front of square and calls early for the second run
full on middle. Flicked off his pads with the turn to the right of short fine leg
Kishan walks around his crease before Chahal delivers it. Good length on middle, and worked off his pads to the leg side
full on middle and leg. Turning in. Varma goes for the sweep, and gets a top edge over Samson. Chahal's got both hands on his head
Saini starts with a low full toss outside off. Varma walks across to the off side and drills a drive through cover point for four!
full and wide. Varma goes for another attacking shot but this one is a bit too far for him to get the sweet-spot connection off the bat. Slapped to deep point
full and wide outside off stump. Throws his bat at this, and ends up slicing an uncontrolled shot to deep backward point
Saini continues taking the length ball away from Kishan. He walks across to the off side and slaps it to point

how good is that? Full, just outside off, Varma stands still, offers the full face of the bat, and lofts it over long off. Saini pays the price of being a bit predictable with his line. Tilak expected the ball somewhere in that region
back of a length on middle and leg. Slower ball bouncer, in fact. Tucked from near his face to square leg, and they are off for one. Time out
full on middle stump. Wants to work it leg side, but it takes a leading edge to the off side
full outside off. But Kishan comes down the track and therefore ends up yorking himself by mistake. Dug away to the off side

strike rate of nearly 200 with that six and he's not afraid to take on someone of Chahal's calibre. Full on middle. Turns into Tilak as he comes skipping down the track. And smacks it across the line over cow corner.
good length, on leg stump. Tilak loses balance as he thinks about backing away to make room. Defended

full outside leg. Chahal misses his line, and Tilak punishes him with a glorious sweep. Gets low, down on one knee, and knocks a punch with his sweep. Uses his wrists to play it finer than usual. #Whippy
full on middle and off. Defended off the front foot
Ashwin around the stumps. Good length outside off. Quicker ball, skidding through. Misses the cut
full just outside off. Kishan skips down and converts it into a full toss. Slapped down the ground to long on for one
flatter. Full on off and worked off his pads to midwicket. Dangerous two, but Tilak gets in there before his 2020 U-19 World Cup mate Yashasvi Jaiswal could make his throw count
full outside off stump. Pushed towards cover for a jogging single

the fine margins between "catch of the season" and going down as a dropped catch! Full on middle. Kishan goes for the slog sweep, but it doesn't have the distance. Jaiswal at cow corner runs to his left, and jumps to his left to take a catch, but it just doesn't stick! #InAndOut
flatter, length ball on middle. Flicked off his waist to deep midwicket
around the stumps. Full outside leg. Even Kishan is surprised by the line. Mistimes a one-handed sweep to the leg side for a couple. Could've potentially been five wides
full on leg. Kishan uses the angle Parag is offering by sweeping to Chahal at fine leg
good length on leg. Varma goes way back - exposing all stumps - before cutting to the deep
good length on middle. Bit of grip off the deck, slowing it down before reaching Kishan. Drags a pull in front of square, but mistimed

that's hit the cameraman on the head! Hope he is okay as Varma chooses to hit Parag's full ball on off with a beautiful front-foot loft. Good to see Boult first checking up on the cameraperson before bothering about where the ball is
pushed to the off side
fullish ball angling into him, and worked off his pads behind square on the leg side
full toss on leg stump, nearly waist high. Mistimed to midwicket for one
full toss outside leg and going further down
full outside off stump. Kishan drills a drive straight down, and the long-off fielder cannot stop it despite getting to the ball! Fiffy for the richest Indian at the auction
good length, on a fourth-stump line. Cut to deep point
Varma moves to 49 with that punch of a full toss to long off

what's happened there? Saini is holding his head. OK, he's fine, and Kishan is gone. Saini takes a catch, but he has taken a blow to his head/back of the neck while completing the catch. Boult was brought back for the wicket and he delivered. Length ball angling in, and Kishan went for the pull. But couldn't really get the connection with Boult cramping him. Saini at deep backward square leg takes a catch, but tumbles over while completing it, and ends up having an awkward fall where his body weight went onto his neck for a brief moment.
first of many! Legbreak on off stump, and he cuts this length ball to deep point for his maiden IPL fifty. Raises his bat all around, and Pollard congratulates him too
hits his pad and rolls away square.
good length outside off and turning further away. Varma wants to cut, but it's a wide
full on leg. Slower through the air this time. Varma bunts one off the back foot, but finds midwicket, where sub fielder Neesham is lurking

poor from Yuzi and Varma punishes him. Length ball on leg stump. Legbreak turns it even further down the leg side. Varma stays on the back foot and hammers this drag-down ball over deep backward square leg for four more. Strong wrists on display once again, going low to get that elevation with his connection
good length. On off stump. Cut to deep point for a single

full outside off. Turning away. Pollard looks to play a wild heave/slog over the leg side, but misses. Samson whips the bails off, and the square umpire has gone up for a TV referral. Pollard is safe, his back leg is grounded despite the long stride forward

this young man is making heads turn! Reverse sweep over regulation third man! Full on middle and off. Varma changes his stance and lifts it with ease and sends it near the supersopper that is parked outside the boundary

the senior gets the youngster but what an innings! Full on middle. Varma gets low for a sweep. Misses, deceived by the slower ball, and that knocks off stump back. Ashwin gives Varma a bit of a send off after being clattered for a reverse-sweep six off the last ball. The Mumbai bench is standing to greet Varma back
over the stumps. Full outside off and the carrom ball turns slightly away. David can't connect with the drive, and through to Samson
full and wide. David comfortably cuts to deep point for a single
good length on off. Stands tall and fended back to Ashwin
full on off. Driven back to Ashwin, and he ends his spell on a high. Four dots off his last five balls, plus the wicket of the dangerous Tilak

fullish ball around leg stump. Legbreak turns across David but he is caught on the back foot while the ball hits his pad. Appeal for lbw and given. David chats with Pollard and they take the review - fair enough, there's no use taking the reviews home. No bat involved, and the ball is pitching on leg stump. Ball-tracking shows the ball would "clip" middle stump, and therefore David has to walk back.

the Buttler does it! And Chahal shows his worth with two wickets in two balls. Full ball on middle, the googly turns into Sams so he has lesser room in having a free flow of the bat. Sliced in the air, Buttler - from cover - runs towards mid off, away from the pitch and facing the boundary as the ball goes over his shoulder. Then throws his body forward, offering some hang time, before taking the catch on the way down

is that a hat-trick missed? Oh yes, poor Chahal! Full ball on off. Googly turns into him. Looks to fend having not known where the ball is turning. Takes the outside edge and goes to the left of Karun Nair at first slip, but he has fluffed the catch!
full outside leg. Driven to long on for one
full on middle. Defended with the full face of the bat
good length wider outside off. Turning further away. Pollard pokes at it, and taps it to point. Chahal finishes on 2 for 26
good length on off stump. Tap and run towards point for one
full on middle, and he looks to flick it off his pads. Misses, hits the front leg. LBW appeal turned down. They don't review, the angle probably taking it down the leg side
back of a length on middle and leg. Going further down
length ball outside off stump. Cut behind square for one
back of a length on middle and leg. Sways away from the ball's line, gets low, and lets the ball go through to Samson
hammered over cover. Prasidh goes length outside off. M Ashwin has a flurry with the bat, and gets enough connection to clear the infield.
back of a length on off and middle. Left alone by Murugan Ashwin
full toss on his pads. Pollard looks to club it through midwicket but the bat's face turns and the ball goes behind square for four
full outside off stump. Angling away as Pollard looks to drive. Misses, and through to Samson

there's life in this game as Pollard deposits Boult for a six over wide long on! Full on off. Pollard walks a bit towards the off side and clatters it over Riyan Parag who is manning the boundary line
full outside off. Pollard gets low and drags a shot from outside off to long on
low full toss quite wide outside off. Ashwin walks to the off side and slaps the full toss, but straight to cover on the bounce
low full toss on middle. Flicked to deep midwicket. M Ashwin wants the single but Pollard turns it down!
full and wide. Scrambled seam. Not bowling in Pollard's arc, and he toe-ends an attempted slog back to the bowler
slower ball, full on middle, and angling further into Pollard. He shapes up to tee off, but is deceived by the lack of pace. Hits the pad and rolls away to the off side
full and wide. On the tram-lines. Is that a hat-trick of dots? No, umpire Pathak says that's wide.
another wide. Back of a length outside off. Collects the extra run
gets back on strike as Prasidh bowls around off stump. Drilled to long off, and even though the throw was good from Parag, Pollard committed early for the second
back of a length on off. Goes for the pull, misses, ball goes over his helmet, and Samson grabs. Umpire Pathak says that's a wide

full outside off. Pollard throws his bat at this, and slices it high in the air. Jaiswal at deep point is waiting to gobble it up, but maybe, just maybe, he had too much time! Drops a regulation catch, but atleast he didn't knock it over for six. He was close to the line
cruel as this full ball gets Pollard's outside edge and flies over short third man. Full ball just outside off

Pollard loses his bat and runs without one! Prasidh goes short and takes the pace off. Pollard is through the pull too early, but the ball hits his blade and rolls away to the leg side. They scurry across for an attempted single, but M Ashwin is run out! No ball called because of an extra short ball
slower ball, full on leg stump. Misses the flick, hits the pad and rolls away to short fine leg
28 off six as he starts off with an extra. Full and wide outside off, trying to keep it out of Pollard's reach, but he'll have to re bowl
full and wide outside off stump. Just inside the tramlines. Pollard drills a drive with the bat-face angle at 45 degrees, and that's beaten the two outfielders in front of square
looks to make room first up and ends up too far from the line of a good-length outswinger outside off. Slashes and misses
length ball straightening towards leg stump, hops back and clips to midwicket, where Southee makes a diving stop to his right
back of a length close to off stump, opens his bat face and stabs to deep point
length ball straightening late towards middle stump, hangs back and clips to deep square leg
back of a length outside off, a bit of outswing. Looks to chop to deep point, ends up playing a little early and hitting into the covers

got him, that's an excellent delivery. Looked like the wobble-seam/offcutter release. On the fuller side of a length, and it nips back in from just outside off. Mayank was shuffling across premeditatedly, looking to target the leg side. Ends up playing all across this one as it nips past his inside edge, striking his front pad right in front. Fifth wicket for Umesh in the powerplay this season
full, slanting away from off stump initially before tailing back in. Looks to drive into the covers and gets a thick inside-edge into his back pad
fullish, slanting across into a wide-ish channel, inviting the cover drive. Dhawan leaves it alone
steps out and the length inswinger cramps him slightly as he looks to make room to flay the ball through the covers. Ends up playing it to mid-off
full on off stump, driven to mid-off
very full, a bit of late swing towards leg stump, and Dhawan nearly overbalances while flicking to deep square leg
nice shot. Full, slanting away and offering width, and Rajapaksa gets a nice stride forward and deliberately scoops his drive over extra-cover
steps out, gets fairly close to the pitch of this ball that's straightening towards off stump. Whips it away to deep square leg

back of a length, angling across to finish just outside off. Not much width, and Rajapaksa lets it come on and opens his bat face to just beat Venkatesh Iyer sprinting and diving to his right at backward point. Third man is also in the circle and it just keeps running away to the boundary
back of a length, straightens his line to tuck Rajapaksa up at the hip. Worked away to deep square leg
shot. Jumps down the track and gets to the pitch of this off-stumpish ball, while making himself a bit of room, to launch it back over the bowler's head, effortlessly
shortish on leg stump, tucked gently into the square leg region
back of a length on leg stump. Not short enough for the short-arm pull, and he gets a bottom edge onto his thigh pad and it rolls away behind square on the leg side
length ball angling across to off stump, and Rajapaksa swats it away, hitting across the line, and gets a thick inside edge that bisects short fine leg and deep square leg
steps out, attempting to make room, possibly targeting the off side at first, but this ball is just in the right place to flat-bat gloriously over mid-on. This is terrific intent and ball-striking

shot! This was full, angling across to off stump, and it looked a little too full to get the elevation you might need to hit it for six, but Rajapaksa brings his wrists into play and just whips it over the long-on boundary. Stunning

sensational. Absolutely sensational. Mavi bowls a slower ball outside off, and Rajapaksa sees it early, steps across and sinks onto his back knee, and slog-sweeps it high over the forward square leg boundary

got him, but what an innings this has been. Pure T20. Digs in a back-of-a-length ball that's angling into off stump or thereabouts. Slightly cramped for room as he tries to back away and hit over extra-cover, and he ends up spooning a simple catch to mid-off
length ball on off stump, presses forward and plays a checked drive to mid-off
fired in full, angling down leg, and Dhawan misses the attempted fine sweep
fullish, angling into middle and leg, steps forward and clips to deep backward square leg. Deep midwicket was the other boundary fielder
nicely timed. Full, just outside off, and he leans forward and eases an effortless drive between extra-cover and mid-off
shortish, angling into off stump. Skids on and hurries Dhawan on the pull. Bottom-edged back towards the bowler
in the effort to cramp Dhawan for room, he fires another full ball down the leg side, past the attempted sweep
length ball angled into the pads, clipped to deep backward square leg
wrong'un, turning in from just back of a length to finish around off stump, goes back and tucks it to the left of short fine leg. A bit of bounce there too
appeal for lbw as Dhawan misses the sweep, but it was clearly angling down leg
fullish, and it nips back in towards middle stump. Pulls his front pad out of the way and drives watchfully to mid-on
shot. Jumps down the pitch, moving to the leg side to create room. Southee tries to follow him, but can't cramp him enough. Full follow-through and he clears the long-on boundary
offcutter, doesn't bounce as much as Livingstone expects, maybe, as he tries to whip into the leg side off the back foot. Hits his thigh pad and rolls away into the short third man region
