valiant attempt by DK to catch that but it just eludes him. Dhawan went for the sweep, got a top edge that went to backward short leg. DK sprinted there and dived full lenth forward, but just got the tip of the glove to it. Not a chance, he created a half-chance out of nothing
sweeps again, connects better this time, single to short fine leg
back of a length, punched to cover
making room, he follows him, and the cut only finds point
length ball going across him, punched to point
fuller on the stumps, tucked to midwicket
slightly short, swivels and pulls to fine leg

great job by Shahbaz at fine leg, but it's still a boundary. Dhawan whips that fine and it's travelling fast, Shahbaz raced across the turf and slid to stop it, did well to get to it at all, but there was little chance of stopping it
length ball outside off, steered to third man
top edge but lands safe. Short ball outside off, went for the pull, climbed onto him more than he expected, and the ball balloons up over the bowler and into a vacant mid-off area

he's smacked a short ball straight to square leg. Hasaranga strikes with the first ball of the season, although Mayank will be filthy with himself for not getting a boundary off that long hop. Googly, but dragged short, he rocked back and smacked it but Shahbaz at square leg dives to his right and pulls off a great catch
goes back and clips it off his pad through midwicket
length ball on leg stump, nudged to midwicket's left
googly beats him. Good length, he's left with feet static against his countryman, ends up feeling for it as he tries to steer it
normal legbreak, he's pinned to the crease by the trajectory which is flat, and the length which is good. Defends
slightly legside, clips it through midwicket off the back foot
down the track, he bowls it into him, ends up defending to cover
too full and itn ohim, clipped off his toes to deep square leg
he's hoicked that over deep square leg. Seemed to be tucked up while playing the pull, did it with a short-arm jab almost, and got it not off the middle, but it still carries over
tapped softly towards square leg for a single
yorker into him from around the wicket, but he's deep in his crease and flicks it off his toes through midwicket
steered to point
full on leg stump. Skips down the ground and clatters it back towards Dhawan, who had to take evasive action. Goes to long off
they've faced each other plenty of times in the nets! Hasaranga goes for the legbreak. Full on leg stump, and he comes down the ground before depositing a six over deep midwicket
full on middle stump. Gets low and sweeps it super hard and this has been drilled through deep square leg for four more!
full on middle. Googly turning across. Mistimed drive to long on
full ball on middle and leg. Swept to fine leg for one
full outside leg stump. Googly turning into him from outside the stumps. Wants to fend, but it hits the pad
full on middle and leg, but Dhawan walks across to the off side, opening his leg side, and flicks it nonchalantly to get six over fine leg
more innovation. Length ball on middle and leg. But Dhawan walks across, getting inside the ball's line, and paddles one from near his chest to fine leg
flayed and gets this drive to find the point boundary. Ball angling across Rajapaksa and he sliced that drive to play it behind square instead of in front of it
back of a length, on middle. Rajapaksa is slow to play the pull. Through to the keeper on the pounce

dropped? fell short? good stop? What happened there! Full and wide, and he sliced the drive. Ball went high towards deep point, and Harshal tried to get under it. Can't take the catch, but recovers well to stop the four with the ball dribbling towards the rope
audacious! Back of a length, aiming for his hips, and whipped over a deep backward square leg for half a dozen
around the stumps. Slower ball, good length on off. Dhawan comes down the track and tries to go leg side. Enough time to come back for two

soft dismissal and #PurplePatel - a nickname he got from last season - has struck. Slower ball, quite full, and Dhawan is through the drive a touch too early. Straight to cover, who takes it at knee height
slower ball yorker attempted. Ends up as a dipping full toss. Tapped towards cover point for one
around the stumps. Fullish on off stump. Flicked off his pads towards the big gap at deep square leg for a couple
back of a length outside off. Angling further away as he can't get bat on ball on this slower ball. Umpire calls a wide, and also says one for the over for height
well deceived. Cutter, full, outside leg stump. Rajapaksa comes down the track to go inside out, but the ball goes between bat and body through to the keeper
good length outside off. Another change of pace. Rajapaksa can't cut it square. Through to the keeper
good length just outside off. Turning into him. Liam rocks back and punches to long off
full on leg stump. Turning towards middle. Tries to fend off the back foot, but takes the outside edge and goes past off stump to short third man
m-a-s-s-i-v-e! Full on off stump. Livingstone runs down the track and golf-swings a six over the bowler's head, and maybe even out of the ground!

full and wide. Turning further away as he offers no shot. Keeper dives to his right but can't stop it completely. Hits his glove and the ball rolls away to short third. They pinch an extra run to add salt to the wounds
Hasaranga will not enjoy this! Tosses it up on leg stump. Bhanuka does a jig down the ground, and hammers it against the turn over deep midwicket. Strike-rate of 200+
full outside leg. Swept to deep backward square leg, where the ball is picked up by the sweeper fielder
oops, that will change the forecaster as Siraj gets Rajapaksa. Length ball outside off, he goes for the cut, but can't get it over the infielder. Gobbled up by the man on the circle line

heartbreaking start for the 2022 U-19 World Cup final's player of the match! Out for a first ball duck. Gets a full toss on leg stump. Bawa is surprised as he tries the flick. Misses the shot, hits the pad, and the umpire raises his finger. Don't bother reviewing that, young man. You'll have your day to shine on another occasion
back of a length on middle. SRK tries to pull. Ball goes down the leg side though, and that's a wide
full on leg stump. Siraj's plan is to cramp Shahrukh from freeing his arms. But this goes down the leg side again as he misses the flick
good length on off. Punched to the vacant mid on region for one
tries for the yorker, ends up near his toes. Wants to flick it square, but hits the boot en route to the keeper
knuckleball, full, but too wide outside off stump
back of a length outside off. Worked from near his chest to midwicket for one
end of a nine-ball over as Shahrukh tries to play a straight drive, but an inside edge takes it to short fine leg
Akash Deep is back. Starts off with a full ball outside off stump. Driven to long off, but timing is not 100%
short and wide. Slapped in front of square, past the diving cover fielder. Man in the deep cleans up as LL comes back for the second
briLLiant from Liam Livingstone! Akash goes in the slot on off, and he uses the bottom hand so well to club a six over the bowler's head. Strong wrists
top shot, top fielding by Rawat! Clubbed by Livingstone in front of square on the off side. Rawat runs to his right from deep cover and gets low to parry the ball back

another stunning effort from Rawat as Deep gets the dangerous Livingstone. Full ball, wide outside off. Livingstone tried to flay it over the off side. Wanted to play it over cover point, but gets it to deep extra cover instead. Rawat - usually a keeper - runs in, and then dives forward to take a low catch. Did well to ensure the ball didn't pop out once the elbows his the floor
full toss, wider outside off. Bunted towards cover, but straight to the fielder there
good length outside off. Googly turning in. Cut a bit uncomfortably
full on off. Big stride forward and blocked away
full just outside off. Shahrukh is careful to not throw his wicket away to Hasaranga. Defended back, rather tentatively
good length outside off. Googly turning in as he hops backwards while trying to cut. To point
there's the release shot! Full outside off stump. Bit more room for him to free his arms as Hasaranga offers a l'il bit of extra width. Smacked over his head
full on off stump. Defended back to the bowler
full slow ball around off stump. Tapped towards cover and off they go for one
wide yorker, and Shahrukh offers no shot. Way outside the tram-lines so he'll have to reload
full toss outside off. Shahrukh could've swatted it away #BaseballStyle but can't connect at all. On the bounce to the keeper
full and wide outside off. Gets low and drills a drive to deep extra cover
took a great catch few overs ago, drops the easier catch this time and Smith gets a second life. Good length outside off, and clubbed to deep extra cover. Rawat is under it, but the ball pops out!

full toss outside off stump. Bunted towards cover and Smith is off for a single. Shahrukh says 'no' and Smith has to turn. Siraj throws a gentle one to Harshal and Harshal himself is quite slow to whip the bails off. Smith successfully dives back before Harshal does the deed
full and wide outside off. Smacked to the left of long off for two more
flayed! Siraj gives length outside off. Smith backs away, allowing him to free his arms. Smacked over deep point for six
full and wide outside off stump. Slower ball
gets one away! Fast ball on middle, but Smith shuffles and scurries it past short fine leg for four!

Smith is punishing Siraj-Harshal for that missed run out and the RCB camp in the stands has gone ultra silent. Slower ball, back of a length outside off. Smith waits for it before swatting a six over deep extra cover
back of a length outside off. Flat-batted down the ground to long on for one
full on middle and leg. Tries to swipe across the line, but misses. Hits the pad and rolls away as they pinch a run.

the extra ball is punished and Siraj finishes on 2-59. Back of a length outside off, and Smith stays on the back foot before smacking a straight six by hitting a shot from over his head! Jo Wilfried Tsonga - the hardest overhead smasher of the tennis ball - would be proud of how Smith executed that!
full just outside off stump. Wants to work it leg side but outside edge takes it to deep point. Big gap there allows them to come back for two
trying the wide yorker, but Shahrukh is happy to let it go.
short ball, the quicker ball. Shahrukh swivels to pull but can't get any connection
up and over! Tries the cutter to take pace off. Shahrukh expected that. Didn't commit early, and lofted that slot delivery over Harshal's head for six
full toss outside off stump. Tries to play an off-side shot but can't connect
yorker length, full pace. Dug out back to Harshal
fuller on off, gently driven to mid-off
back ofa  length, Rohit stays back and punches to midwicket's left. They think about a single but there isn't one there
and he strays on the pads, Rohit flicks off the thigh pad to the vacant fine leg region and gets runs on the board with a boundary
a bit too full, on the front foot to clip it, but can't beat midwicket in the circle
short and wide outside off, Rohit eases into the cut, but can't beat point

over the top and clears wide long-off. Rohit launched into a full ball outside off with a full-blooded lofted drive, didn't time it perfectly but hit it hard enough to carry over the ropes. A safe shot anyway because no fielder there
bangs it in short of a length and rises to Ishan's mid-riff, he fends it down awkawrdly towards mid-on
short on off, Rohit went to pull but this came onto him slower, perhaps held in the pitch a bit. Got the toe-end of the bat and the ball trickled back down the pitch
beaten outside off. Good left-armer's angle going across Rohit from back of a length, who looks to steer it to third man but can't connect
full outside off, eases into the extra cover drive, to the left of the fielder in the circle. He's got enough time to run to his left and field it
imperious. Full outside off, he goes down on one knee and unfurls a regal cover drive that screams along the turf to the boundary
length outside off, punched to point
full on off, bit of shape into the right-hander, clipped to wide mid-on
back of a length dug into the pitch, tapped down to the bowler's left
length ball on leg stump, tucked to midwicket's left in the circle
back of a length outside off, gently steered to third man
down the track, Shardul saw hiim coming and shortened the length and kept it at him to deny room, Ishan ends up bunting it back towards the bowler

he's chopped it over third man. Short ball outside off, and he climbs into that - given the room to free his arms and not pacy enough to trouble him while doing so. Hits it hard enough that it sails over the boundary
slightly short, Rohit rocks back and whips it to deep midwicket
lays into a sweep that travels along the ground through midwicket, got it off the toe-end only. In the gap though, so they get two
quicker on off, jabbed to cover
shorter outside off, was looking to come forward, transfers weight back and strokes it to cover
leading edge but it goes for four. He was early into the attempted flick, uses his wrists to whip it, gets a leading edge that clears the bowler and runs into the straight boundary
length outside off, punched to mid-off from the back foot
and inauspicious start by him but you can't do much against Rohit's timing. Given room outside off and he steers a cut expertly to beat short third man
he's looking to put the young man under early pressure. Slightly short of a length and he goes for the pull, has a big swat at it but no timing and can't beat midwicket in the circle
boom. Initiation by fire for Nagarkoti. Strays down legside with a short ball, Rohit swivels and unleashes one of his famous pulls on it, sends it soaring over fine leg
short and wide outside off again, too wide for Rohit to touch. Wide.
good length coming into him, defended
delicately done. Room outside off again and he late cuts it fine, but there's a third man in place and he's fine enough to cut it off

and now Ishan gets in on the action. Short and wide again, going away from the left-hander this time, he climbs into a fierce cut that he doesn't bother to keep down, flies over point and into the boundary
good bowling, back of a length going across him and surprised him with the bounce, Rohit had to drop his wrists after he was shaping to cut it
keeps it on a good length going across him, this one is closer to off stump and not as short as the first ball, has Rohit feeling for the ball outside off. Beaten
keeps it on off on a good length, Rohit defends with a slightly limp bat and the ball trickles down near boot
almost picked out short fine leg. Rohit moved across, looking to improvise after three dots, was looking to paddle it. that's actually a drop. It went straight to Shardul.
Rohit steps out and decimates the ball to the extra cover boundary. Absolutely dismissive batting, almost asserting who the boss is after three dot balls and a drop. Stepped out and thrashed it
length ball outside off, steered to third man
length ball outside off, punched to long-off
flattish on middle and leg, on the front foot to work it through square leg
down the track, pulled the length, he ends up defending
little more air, Rohit clears his front leg and drills it to long-off, but the man cuts it off to his right
good length outside off, Ishan beaten in length had to end up getting hands to hit after having taken a stride out. Defended into the offside
excellent start from Kuldeep. Keeps this on the stumps and quicker, Ishan defends
darted into him, works it forward of square. Mix up between the batters with Rohit wanting two initially then sending Ishan back, but a mis-field means they are not in danger
excellent from Mandeep at deep mdiwicket. Kishan danced down and belted this to deep mdiwicket, Mandeep ran to his left and jumped to pat the ball in
gets down to paddle it fine, short fine leg in place so just one
fuller outside off, on the front foot to drive to long-off

shot. He cut that from so close to the stumps, and stayed not only perfectly balanced but also got perfect timing and placement on it. Not much wrong with the ball, just Rohit being too good on that occasion.
pulls the length shorter, and I think Rohit was expecting that, went down to slog sweep but gets it off the bottom edge to run to short fine leg for a single
went for the reverse sweep, doesn't really connect, maybe just a thin glove. Went through Pant's legs for runs

he's picked out deep midwicket. Kuldeep took the pace off, Rohit had to create his own power in trying to pull this short of length ball. Didn't get it right off the middle, and Rovman Powell gleefully takes it. Important strike for Kuldeep.
given some air outside off, on the front foot to drive to cover

he went airborne at that, but only got fingertips to it. Beaten him in flight an the leading edge flies to Kuldeep's left. He makes a goalkeeper like dive for it but can't get to it. Harsh to call it a drop.
on the front foot to work it through square
comprehensively beaten by the wrong un. Anmolpreet had no clue about that, nicely flighted, spun from leg to off and the batter was left standing and poking
full toss, smacked to long-on
makes room and goes inside out over cover, bit of a leading edge on that but not entirely out of control
too short outside off, and Kishan rocks back to cut it fiercely through point to find a much-needed boundary for Mumbai after a period of lull
flatter and quicker, goes back and punches to long-on
good work by the man at deep midwicket. Anmolpreet danced down the track and flicked it nicely through midwicket, but the fielder there dived to his left and stopped it.
shorter, goes back and cuts through point
goes to sweep this full delivery outside off. Single to fine leg
skip down early, as Kuldeep goes pretty full on middle and off. Whipped to deep midwicket
Good running. Fullish ball on middle, and turning into him. He clips toward midwicket after a step back in the crease

lofts that down the ground, and finds long-off! Kuldeep strikes again. Tosses this ball up, and bowls full and outside off. Lalit Yadav at long-off has to run in a few steps before grabbing the ball. Anmolpreet goes aerial as he presents the full face of the bat, but ends up skying that right into the breadbasket of the man in the deep. Kuldeep right into the action here
shortish ball on middle, and goes on with the arm. He clears his front leg, and pulls to fine leg to get off the mark
fuller ball on middle. He closes the bat face to flick toward midwicket, as the bowler gives the chase
good length ball on middle and leg. He clips this deep square leg from deep in the crease
bowls short on leg, and that is pulled commandingly to fine leg, where the man runs to his left and slides to cut that off
continues bowling short, but this is on middle and off. Pulled away to deep midwicket
this is a lot fuller on middle. He is down the pitch to whip that lowish full toss. There is a a misfield at long-on, who runs to his left, and that allows another run. The fielder there slipped
full ball on middle and off, and tucked toward cover
tossed up ball on middle, and it is a full toss too. Dragged to long-on
bowls a yorker length ball a little wide of off. Tilak has a jam at that, but is beaten
slashes that back of a length ball outside off, but finds point. The sound off the bat was pleasing, but it didn't find the gap

crunches a pull wide of long-on! Short of a length ball just outside off, as it angles away after pitching on middle and off. Tilak has a full and free swing of the arms to dispatch that near deep midwicket

gorgeously lofted over the bowler's head! Presents the full face of the bat to this overpitched ball on off, which is bowled with a scrambled seam. Tilak hangs back in the crease, and gently sends that over mid-off
back of a length ball on middle, and this is a tighter length. A hint of movement away after pitching, as it is clipped toward midwicket from deep in the crease

drags that for four to deep extra cover! Three boundaries in the over now. The ball was too full and a touch wide of off, as Kishan went down on his knees to drag that rapidly between mid-off and cover
loopy ball and pretty full leg. Pushed to long-on after getting his front leg out of the way
pulls his length back a touch to go full on off. He closes the bat face to clip to short fine leg
makes room, and slog-sweeps to deep midwicket on the bounce. Full ball on leg, and sends that aerially
short of a length ball on middle and leg, and pulled to deep midwicket. Good stop diving to his right there
fullish ball outside leg, as he follows the batter, who makes room to go outside leg. Clipped to short fine leg

crashed down the ground! It was a full toss on middle and leg, as Kishan gave himself room again and thrashed that to just beat long-on to his right. Four more, as Mumbai keep pressing the accelerator
swung away over short fine leg! Pitches it on a good length and wide of off, as he goes across off to send that whipping away for four more

taken at third man! Tilak's fun is over, though that was a useful cameo. Backed away early to go outside leg, as Khaleel banged the ball in short and outside off. There was some extra bounce available on that occasion, as Tilak was ready to upper cut that already. But he found Shaw, who was placed a few steps into the fence. He went low, and tumbled to complete the take
sharp short ball there! Pitches it on a short of a length on middle, as Pollard sways out of the way
short of a good length, and just outside off. Pollard dabs that down from deep in the crease. Good use of the short deliveries from Khaleel
more short stuff from Khaleel. Again bowls short, but this is outside off. Pollard drags that pull to deep midwicket

good delivery there. A slower ball on a short of a length on middle, and he gets that to angle into the batter, as Kishan has to swat and sway out after trying to have a poke at that. Beaten in the end
swings that across the line to deep midwicket. Tossed up full and outside off, as that comes off the inside half of his bat
turns away after pitching on a shortish length outside off. Cut away to deep point
much fuller ball on middle. He clips that to deep square leg after closing the bat face
again there is turn away from the left-hander. A touch fuller and just outside off, and that is swung away to long-on

brilliant catch at square leg! Seifert flies across to his left and clings on to the ball wonderfully well. That is the kind of catch you need to send Pollard back early. It was a short of a length ball on middle, with a hint of turn into the batter. Pollard saw that early, with his eyes lit up seeing the scoring opportunity. He cracked a pull, but that was well anticipated by the man placed on the edge of the circle. Kuldeep turning the screws here
full ball on middle, and that is flicked aerially to deep midwicket, as Kuldeep finishes with a match-defining 3 for 18
short of a length ball on middle, and coming on with the angle. Clipped to fine leg

bashed disdainly over deep midwicket! That is Kishan's fifty too. Looked like he used all his power in that shot. Fuller ball on off, and almost in the slot. He swung that away forcefully, as that went high and far into the stands
yorker length ball on off, and quicker too. Jammed to deep point
shortish again on middle, as that is pushed to long-on from deep in the crease
swatted away wide of long-off! Maybe like a left-handed Dhoni? That was short and wide of off, as he went across off early, and sent that ramming into the fence
too full on middle, and dragged to long-on

that was a might swing. Now this reminds me of Pant. That was a dipping full toss wide of off, as he went swinging and lost his balance to fall on his back. The ball raced off his top edge to short third man. Good stop diving to his right by Shaw

yorker length delivery, and Thakur goes up in a leg before appeal. Pant doesn't go for a review. That was again dipping, and was a very accurate yorker, but the impact was just outside off, as Kishan swung to the on side and missed. They sneaked a leg bye in time though
pulls his high full toss on middle and off for a single to fine leg. Looked like an above-waist no-ball for a moment, but that is fine
pretty full ball just outside off - nearly a yorker - and dragged to long-off. Good over so far by Thakur
swats that short ball wide of off, and goes over cover. Long-off chases that to his left to keep that to two

that is a commanding shot! Flat-bats that for six over the bowler's head. Thakur bowls short and outside off, as David sends that effortlessly for six. Fantastic timing and placement, that went pretty far too
sends that to deep square leg! Slower ball, and right in the slot on off stump. Kishan takes a step back in the crease, and hoicks that across the line over the umpire's head

great fielding by Seifert at deep square leg! After taking that catch, he now leaps while running to his right, and pats the ball back from his left hand after it bounced high on pitching inside the rope. There was a boundary check, but it seems fine. Another ball close to the slot and outside off, as Kishan swung to deep square leg again
launched over the bowler's head! Kishan racing away now. This is a touch fuller, and just outside off, with a hint of movement into him. He tears into that to send that down the ground
pretty full and outside off. Drilled to long-off from deep in the crease
swing and a miss! The ball is full and wide of off, as David has a go at that away from his body. There is not foot movement to get to the pitch of the ball, and he is beaten

slices to deep backward point! Khaleel comes back well in the second half of the over. This was like the last ball - full and close to the hitting range, but wide of off. David went to loft that over the off side, but ended up opening the bat face and sending that right into the hands of the fielder there
loses his bottom hand to this wide yorker outside off, and sends that to long-off away from his body
wide delivery. Again goes for the wide yorker, but this lands pretty far from the batter, who has a slash at that but doesn't connect
takes a slight step across, and sends that milessss into the air! Six over long-off. The ball was full and a touch wide of off, as Sams swung with freedom there
and they manage a run to bring Kishan back on strike. Shortish in length and outside off, as Sams went to pull, but got that off the bottom off the bat to the keeper behind
a helicopter four! Finds the gap between long-on and deep square leg. The ball was pretty full on middle, but Kishan went deep in the crease to send that crashing
a full toss, and four more! This time Thakur bowls cross seam, as the ball is a low full on off. Kishan clears his front leg, and swings away to deep square leg
yorker on off, and that is a very good ball to finish. Jammed back to rush for a quick single. Mumbai finish with 177
fuller and going across him, Shaw aims an airy drive at it, and doesn't connect.
dug in short and rising up to above his chest, shuffled a bit and defended to the bowler's right
strays legside and is picked off the thigh pad to long leg
too far down legside and he'll have to rebowl that
crisp as the first tea on an early morning. Full on off, takes a step forward and punches a cover drive that rolls royces its way to the cover boundary
follows up the elegant with the brutal. Too short, swivles and pulls ferociously to the deep square leg boundary
strays down leg again, under pressure from Seifert's strokeplay, and it's another wide. Swung a bit, but the line was down leg to start with
length ball on the stumps, tucked to fine leg
on the front foot to a fuller length ball outside off, drives it to the midwicket fielder in the circle off the inside half
good length coming into him, nudged to mid-on

stunner. Not of the Stone Cold variety, of the pulse-racing one. Full ball on the stumps, stays still and shows the full face of the bat in lofting the straight drive over the bowler's head. Bounces just in front of the boundary. He was so supremely balanced when playing it
length ball into him, pushed back towards the bowler, beats him, but the mid-on and mid-off in the circle are there to prevent thoughts of a single

class from Seifert. Similar to the previous boundary this over, but this time he does it over cover. Confident stride out, read the slower ball, and shows the full face of the bat in driving over the in-field and into the boundary
length ball strays legside, flicked to fine leg
fuller, driven to mid-on

goes over the top again, but this time it's not as well timed. Was looking to be more aggresive with this, lifting over cover. Tymal Mills in pursuit, slides and stops it just inside the boundary line so that keeps them to three.
length ball on off, pushed back to the bowler
thumped. Too short, rocks back and slugs it across the line, sends it over the deep midwicket boundary
slows it up, fuller outside off, reaches for it and punches to point
good length on off, pushed to point, Pollard is swooping in and lets loose at the non-striker's stumps and hits direct. Seifert well safe though, he had been turned back after taking two steps
tossed up on the stumps, front foot forward to defend
dropped by the keeper. Top-spinner bounces more than he expected as he was shaping to cut, and gets a thick top edge that pings into sub keeper Juyal's thigh pad almost before he can react

googly bowls him through the gate! Superb bowling by MAsh, as he'll doubtless be called. Perfectly looped up, Seifert drawn forward into a punch, and the ball fizzes through the gap to knock the stumps over. Seifert was going so well, this is a crucial strike.
leg-spinner on off, carefully punched towards cover, on the back foot
he's smacked a full toss straight to mid-on. Invitingly tossed up, it was there to be smashed, he doesn't time it well, perhaps trying to hit too hard, and it's straight down Tilak Varma's throat.
fuller, on the stumps, comes on the front foot and works it through midwicket
back of a length sliding down leg, wide first up
and the short ball gets him. Banged in short outside off and rises higher than he expected, Pant has a big slash at it, gets a top edge that loops straight to third man.
just short of deep point. He just sort of hung his bat out to another short one outside off, and the upper cut pings off the bat without much control, lands short of the fielder
this time the short ball is nailed by the batter. Too far down leg this time, so Shaw able to be inside the line and swing this over fine leg
fuller outside off, driven to mid-off
back of a length outside off, punched to deep point
fuller outside off, gets his bat down low to steer it to short third man
fuller, on the front foot to drive to mid-on
flicks this to deep square leg
fuller outside off, driven from the crease off the back foot, but David at cover dives to his right and fields it.
slightly shorter and quicker on off, steered to short third man
fuller outside off, fetches the drag-sweep to mid-on

inside edge runs past the stumps. Victory for the bowler but it'll go as four runs against him and to the batter. Shaw was aiming a big drive at that, got an edge that ran down past leg stump and past the keeper.
starst with a full toss that dips on him, swatted to deep square leg
wider outside off, slashes hard at it, gets a top edge that Anmolpreet can't stop cleanly while sliding at the deep point boundary. Leg touching boundary rope as he slid to stop it

back of a length outside off, looks to upper cut it, but the ball instead goes off the bottom edge and beats short third man too. Second boundary behind the wicket for Shaw when he's not been in control at all.
fuller and homing into off, gently turned through midwicket. The fielder is deep on the big boundary so they hustle two
pace off, length ball outside off, stroked past point
back of a length slower ball outside off, looks to cut, the ball goes under bat. Keeper can't quite stop it cleanly, moving to his right
good length on the stumps, on the front foot to defend
overpitched and Shaw's quick hands send this racing through point. There's cover in the deep though
length ball on off, spinning away, carves it to point
another leggie, on middle stump, stays legside of the ball and punches to mid-off
another back of length leggie on off, he stays back and punches between cover and point
brilliant work by David at long-on. Shaw down the track to a flat ball, drills it straight back. David runs to his left, dives full length and parries it to Pollard, who's running in from long-off.
full on the stumps, driven to mid-off
homing in on off stump, nudged to third man
beaten on the oustide edge. Full ball shaping away from him, Shaw looks to drive with leaden feet and is beaten.
full ball, pace off at just 109 kph, he waits for it and flicks it off his toes to deep midwicket
tried to slip in a quick one but wtrays too far down leg, so it's a wide
back of a length on leg stump, nudged off his pads through square leg.
short on leg stump, swivels inside the line and pulls to the fine leg boundary
slides down leg to start a  new spell
on leg stump again, he whips a pull from a knee-high ball, can't quite get hold of it, fine leg fields

top edge taken by the keeper. It swirled and swirled high in the air but Kishan ran to his left and held it with composure. India's 2016 U19 captain holds on to the catch of the 2018 U19 captain. Good ball by Thampi, hurried onto Shaw a bit as he was late on the pull, got a top edge from it.
sharp bouncer to start, dug in short and rises appreciably, Rovman has to sway out of the way as the ball goes past his grille

pulled straight to deep square leg. Another short ball, not as quick as the last one, Powell lays into the pull, but can't connect cleanly. The ball goes straight down the throat of the fielder. Delhi wobbling properly now.
another short ball, another pull. Not quite nailed, more wristy than forearm driven, plops well short of deep midwicket
length ball outsid eoff, and that's been cut beautifully through backward point for a much-needed boundary
that goes just over cover! On a good around fifth stump, as Thakur punches that using his wrists to beat cover and also mid-off running to his left
back of a length again, but this is on middle and off, while almost cramping him for room. Tapped to the on side
creams that pull! This ball is shorter in length on off, as Thakur cracks that pull powerfully to long leg, and beats deep square leg to his right
leading edge just short of third man, who takes it on the bounce! A fuller delivery on middle and off, as Thakur closes the bat face early to flick but is not in control
back of a length on fifth stump, and angles in. Taps that to point, and they set off for a rapid run. The throw flies over the stumps at the keeper's end

that will hurt Mumbai and Bumrah! That was like a soft blow from Thakur. Just presents the full face of the bat to that fuller ball on off which is near the slot, and lofts that effortlessly over the bowler's head. Pollard at long-on runs and dives to his left, but the ball slides below him
a low full on middle, as the ball is tossed up. He slog-sweeps to fine leg, who takes it on the bounce
good length ball on off, with a hint of turn away. Clipped to long-on from deep in the crease
off the inside edge on to his pad, as he comes forward to push at this fuller ball on off
turns away sharply after pitching on a short of a length outside off. Punches to Rohit at cover
the googly now. Shortish and outside off, and turning in, as he dabs back
this one is again short and just outside off, as it is slashed to deep point with his front leg out of the way

slower delivery, and nearly chipped back to the bowler. That was bowled full and on leg, as the batter backed away to push it back to the bowler, who couldn't quite get hold of the ball since it was wide to his left
good length ball on middle, and tapped toward extra cover
change of pace again, and that is well bowled. On a shortish length on middle, and he gets the ball to bounce over the stumps after Lalit misses his attempted pull
this on a hard length on middle and off, and angling in. Cramps him for room as Lalit backs away, and he ends up nudging it to point
whips that slower, and falls in between long-on and deep midwicket. On a fuller length and around the hitting zone, as Thakur lofts that using his bottom hand
that was a very impressive clip! A touch fuller on middle and off, and angling into him. Thakur picks it off its length, and simply flicks it away to deep square leg to keep Delhi going
starts with a slower ball. On a full length on middle, as it is clipped toward midwicket. They wanted a second, but settled for a single in the end

gets a top edge, and finds Rohit at extra cover! Perhaps the end of Capitals' dream today. Thakur went for the pull, but the ball was never that short to play it. It was on a good length outside off, as Thakur was into his shot early. The ball took off from the outer half of the top edge, and went right where Rohit sat
pretty full ball on fifth stump, and angling in. Pushed to point on the bounce
full length ball on off, and pushed to cover. There was a throw from Rohit at the keeper's end, but it missed the stumps as he scampered to his right
slower ball. Lalit was almost ready to send that away to the on side, before realising it didn't have the pace. On a fullish length on off, and tucked to long-on for a hurried two
rams that over deep square leg! That was pulled stylishly by Lalit. On a good length on middle and off, as he swivelled while pulling that away in a full flow of the bat
slower ball, as expected. Axar clips that full delivery on off to deep square leg, and they manage two quick runs
goes to dab that back of a length ball just outside off, but is beaten by the bounce. The ball goes into the keeper's gloves after travelling over his bat
pulls that shortish ball outside off to long-on on the bounce. Just three runs in the over so far
a pretty full ball on off, and that is dragged to cover after making room. Rohit there dives to his left to keep that to one
slower ball again. On a full length and just outside off. Pushed to long-on

slices that over extra cover! The bat turns in his hands as he tries to loft that dipping full toss on off, and the ball comfortably sails over the man placed inside the circle. Is Lalit keeping Capitals alive here?
Axar sends him over long-on first ball! This is going deep now. On a good length on middle, and angling away, as Axar gets his front leg out of the way to dispatch that far
good length ball outside off, and clipped to deep midwicket from deep in the crease

four more, this time to third man! This was on a back of a length, and wide enough outside off for him to crash that between short third man and point. That was played late, and after allowing the ball to come into him
finally gets it right. Bumrah bowls pretty full on off, and close to what would have been a yorker. Drilled to long-off
follows the batter, who makes room to go outside leg. Bowls it on a yorker length outside leg, as Axar still manages to clip that to deep midwicket. Two runs gobbled again. Good running
this is full and straighter on middle and off. Axar flicks to fine leg after almost falling over on his head. Capitals take 15 off Bumrah

dropped by David at long-on! That was a sitter. The ball popped out of his hands there. Oh my! It was a dipping full toss on middle and off, as Axar swung it away. And after that, the throw at the bowler's end arrived wide, otherwise there could have been a run-out
looks to clip this back of a length ball on middle, but the ball hits his pad instead
goes for a yorker, but the ball lands just outside leg. Lalit has a heave, but misses. Wide called
excellent ball. Nails that yorker on middle, as Lalit is cramped for room, having to jam the bat down for a single to long-on
he holds the pose after lofting that! Thampi went from wide of the crease, but bowled right in the slot on off. Axar gently lifted his bat to go over the bowler's head. No one had a chance
slog sweeps that low full toss on middle for a single to deep midwicket. Against Thampi went wide of the crease to bowl this
another wide. This is again pretty full and outside leg, and remains out of Lalit's reach to have a flick

what a bonus for Capitals! It was a targetted yorker on leg, as the ball pitched just short of Lalit's front pad. He went for the flick, but the ball took his pad on its way behind the wicket. Kishan dived to his left, but didn't get a hand

that is smashed wayyy over deep square leg! The fifty stand is up too. It was a slower ball all right, but that was on a short of a length on off, and Axar had enough time on this slow pitch to ram that away
better length now. That was angling in off a pretty full length on off, as Axar clipped to deep midwicket with the movement into him

six over long-on! Has Lalit come out of syllabus for Mumbai, or is Lalit really well prepared? On a good length on off, and again change of pace. Lalit got his front leg out of the way, and heaved that over the fence confidently. Six more
driven wide of long-off! This is slipping away from Mumbai now. On a fuller length and just outside off, and he beats extra cover as well as long-off to his left
on a fullish length on middle and leg. Clipped to long-on

four more, and this is nearly done! These two are having fun. A dipping full toss - and guess what, another change of pace ball from Sams - on middle and off, and Axar slog sweeps that over deep square leg
yorker on middle, and angling in. Jams his bat down, and manages a single to fine leg, as the ball takes the inside half of the bat

Bumrah's bad day continues, and Axar wraps that up! Capitals find new heroes in an opening win this season. On a near yorker length but pitches wide outside leg, and all Axar has to do is clip that off his pads over short fine leg
starts with a zippy back of length delivery that thuds into Gaikwad's thigh pad as he hops back to defend. But hey, Umesh has overstepped and we'll have a free-hit immediately.
beaten as he has a wild swing at this full delivery that's moving away
slips this back of a length delivery down leg, good take by Sheldon Jackson moving to his left
terrific delivery. Bolt upright seam to land it on a length, gets it to jag back in to beat Gaikwad's inside edge. Hits him high on the right thigh and rolls to the keeper.
edged and taken at slip! Uncharacteristic from Gaikwad as he throws his bat at this short and wide delivery, the edge flies and Nitish Rana pouches an excellent catch with his palms facing upwards.
full but this one nips back in to beat the pad down leg. Wide called
ah, so lovely! Lures Uthappa into a drive as he bowls a banana swinger away, beaten.
zippy length ball on middle, Uthappa is solid in defence this time
gently taps it with soft hands, wants a single but Conway isn't keen. This went towards a short cover point fielder, Rahane and Shreyas Iyer swooped in quickly
slants a short of length delivery across the left-hander, tapped to the off side
has a slash at this length ball moving away, beaten. Conway was a tad off balance as he looked to thrash that up and over
shapes to cut again, gets a thick bottom edge to third man, Conway is off the mark
first boundary and it comes off a neat little glance down leg. Wayward from Mavi. Short of length and nipping back into middle and leg, Uthappa had the angle to work it neatly off his hip
floats it full outside off, Uthappa pushes this to mid-off
pushed back on the up to the bowler who half-stops it. Uthappa is a few steps down but Conway isn't keen on it, the right call in the end.
goes a touch full on middle, the ball nibbles back in a hint and Conway tucks it to the leg side for a quick single
flicked over deep midwicket for six! Cracking hit from Uthappa. Shuffles across and picks this leg-side length ball angling down. What timing.
length ball outside off, punched to Billings at point
floats this a touch full outside off, punched straight to cover, Venkatesh Iyer with the stop
opens the bat face to steer this down to third man
stands tall and defends to point. Eight off the over
excellent running. Soft hands, gentle nudge into the off side and off they went for a single.
steps out to make room but Mavi follows him by hitting the hard lengths, bunted to point
whips this length ball on leg stump to deep square
adventurous from Uthappa and he's picked this up over the keeper's head for six. Walks across the stumps, gets inside the line and helps this along very fine. The ball literally flew.
this time he flicks it straight to Umesh at short fine. A metre on either side of him and it was four. Mavi lucky to get away with that
picks him up and pulls him fine to beat Umesh at short fine leg this time. Mavi errs in length again, all Uthappa needed to do was use his pace and deflect it fine which he did.

chipped straight to mid-on. Conway's debut isn't a memorable one. Was looking very itchy to go for the big hits. Tried to step out and go over the top but this one lobbed off a thickish inside edge, an absolute dolly to mid-on. Umesh has a second.
walks across and bunts this length ball to point
squared up by the length as Umesh bowls that nagging line and length again, squirted to the off side behind square
terrific stop at backward point by Rahane. This was nicely steered by Rayudu as he got on top of the bounce. Two runs saved
on the pads, flicked to mid-on as they complete a single
stands tall and punches to point
shortish on middle, punched to long-on
another shortish delivery on middle, bunted down the ground for a single
full and drifting into middle, squirted off a thickish inside edge to mid-on
lands it on that right length, just around fourth stump, Rayudu is well forward as he defends
has that flicked the leg stump? Yes, but the bails don't light up. Rayudu attempts an ugly heave and gets the thinnest of inside-edges for four.
this length ball fizzes back in to hit the pad as Rayudu looks to nudge it square.
shortish and spinning in, pulled to deep square
wayward. Slipping down, Rayudu tickles this past short fine leg
cuts hard, in the air and it just eludes a diving Rana at backward point. Has to be classified as a drop. . He got a hand on it as he put in a full-length dive to his right
rocks back and cuts to point
shortish on middle and leg, punched to long-on
peach! Beats him with one that cuts away. It's a carromball. Rayudu was playing for the one that comes in.
steps out and works this with the spin to long-on
rocks back to pull but ends up getting a thick inside edge onto the pad and rolls to the off side.
he has flat-batted that over extra cover! Enough width for Rayudu to open his shoulders as he muscled that away.
gets well forward and defends this back down the pitch
steps out to have an agricultural heave, off a thick inside edge to deep square

lightning quick work from Jackson and Uthappa is gone! The kind of stumping MS Dhoni would be proud of. This one spins back in from middle and leg to beat Uthappa's attempted nurdle. He's off balance in the process as Jackson does the rest. Terrific stuff.
lunges forward and works it down to long-on to get off the mark immediately
pushed to long-off
length ball that breaks away from middle, squirted to the off side. Rayudu squared up again
gently worked to the leg side as they jog the single

what is happening! Rayudu left high and dry. Chennai are imploding or what? This is bowled full from around the wicket, Jadeja works this wide of Shreyas Iyer at short midwicket, at least he thinks he has and takes a couple of steps down the pitch, by which time Rayudu is halfway down. Unfortunately for him, Jadeja stops so he has nowhere to go except to the pavilion.
driven with the spin to long-off
keeps coming back in with the arm from around the wicket, Dube works it with the angle to midwicket
tucked nicely down to Russell at fine leg, Jadeja strolls back for the second
gets well forward and taps it towards point for a quick single
bowled full on off from around the wicket, gets well forward and defends
hint of width outside off, cut away to deep point, Dube off the mark
turn from length around middle, Jadeja is right back in defence
misunderstanding with the running again, Jadeja wants the single as he pushes wide of cover, Dube says no
nicely glided down to third man

another run out opportunity! Jadeja calls, then stops. A direct hit from Narine from midwicket at the bowler's end and Dube was gone. There was never a run there. Eventually they get a run off the overthrow.
steered down to third man

have they got him this time? Narine fires a direct hit from midwicket. Dube looks to be in trouble. Again a hint od hesitation in the running. Luckily for CSK, Dube appears to have made the crease. Not out.
they didn't get him off the run out but have him caught next ball. Russell bowls a heavy ball, Dube is set with a premeditated pull but gets it high off the bat and Narine takes a dolly at midwicket.
welcomed with a ripper of a short ball. Dhoni sways out of the way but this zips past his nose. Ah, lovely to see. Bounce and proper carry
cracks this cut to deep point
lunges forward and squeezes this full delivery to point
beaten on the inside edge by one that drifts in and skids on. Dhoni wasn't sure which way that was turning
squirted off a thick inside edge to square leg
whips this full toss down to wide long-on
breaks back in sharply off a length to hit Dhoni on the pad as he tries to work it to the leg side. Dhoni struggling to pick Varun
beaten as he tries to cut up and over point. Done in by the zip and bounce
nearly chipped back! Was in the air, Russell put his hand out to grab it on the followthrough but didn't get a finger.
zippy length ball outside off, Dhoni lets it pass
beaten as he tries to take him on with the pull. Wasn't far from Dhoni's gloves. Done in by the pace
tucks this off his hip to long leg
tight line - length around middle and leg - Jadeja is cramped for room as he defends to the leg side
looks to punch that away but the ball wobbles back in off the deck, rolls off the inside edge to mid-on
floats it full on the stumps from wide of the crease, Dhoni defends back
driven through point, a misfield inside the ring allows him to take two
hits the hard length again on off from wide of the crease, Dhoni is squared up as he defends back
punched on the up to sweeper cover
nearly chopped on! Jadeja looking to use the pace to steer it behind point but didn't have the room to work with.
length outside off, pushed to point
nearly chipped to short midwicket! Just bounces wide of Rana as he slides around.
shortish on off, he makes room to slap it to deep point

good ball again! The carromball that has the ball move away appreciably to beat Dhoni's forward push. Dhoni was forward a long way and had to stretch back to make it in time even as Jackson whipped the bails off in a jiffy.
shortish outside off, Dhoni slaps it to deep cover
works it down to long-on for a single
pushed to deep point
this is a cracker of a delivery! Umesh beats Dhoni fair and square with some zip off the deck
punched wide of mid-off, and unfortunately for KKR it'll be a boundary because Varun CV has dived over the ball. Very poor effort. First boundary in 49 deliveries
he's hammered this pull in front of square, straight to deep midwicket
tucked off his hip to fine leg
back deep inside the crease as Dhoni works this incoming length delivery to the man running in from deep midwicket
that skids past Dhoni's outside edge as he plays down the wrong line
hint of width, punched to deep cover point
gently bunts this wide of point as they complete a single
beaten by the zip! Dhoni goes back to ease it behind square on the off side but Narine bowls a deceptive carrom ball that breaks away off a length
taps gently behind point as they scamper a run this time
this one keeps coming back in with the arm to hit Jadeja on the pad as he lunges to work it into the leg side
finally that fierce Dhoni hit! Hint of width and he scythes that back cut behind point. Third man had no chance.
slower length ball outside off, whips this to deep square
chopped down to deep point
that's some magical wrist work! Dhoni uses the angle - incoming length ball - to gently wrist this to the backward square leg boundary. Used Russell's pace very nicely
length ball on off, defended
off the edge and beats short third for four! Yorker length, Dhoni looks to squeeze this behind point as he opens the bat face but the ball flies off the edge.
beaten as he has a big swing at this slower delivery angling away. Jadeja was looking to hit this over deep midwicket
swung away but not in control as he hit this full toss high on the bat, down to long-on
drilled down to long-on. Didn't get the elevation.
dug in short but this is bowled outside leg and way over the head, wide called
not in control of the pull as he looks to hit this slower ball dug into the pitch, down to deep midwicket
shovelled over cover! Mavi misses his yorker by not much, Dhoni's strong bottom hands comes to the fore as he drills this over the infield. Raced away
flies off the top-edge for six! Dhoni has a swung at this mighty high full toss that slips off Mavi's hands, flies into the stands at fine leg. Free-hit coming up too
slower delivery, dragged his length back outside off, Dhoni picked it off the hand and had a big swing at it but missed it. Shrieks in frustration as he missed out
right into the blockhole, dug out to long-on
full toss on middle and leg, whipped into the gap at deep square leg for a couple as Venky Iyer cuts that off
helped along to the deep backward square leg boundary! Slower ball dug into the pitch, Dhoni swivelled back, held his shape and gave it a whack as it came along
that's a bullet hit! Stunning bottom-handed whip. Russell went Yorker-length, missed it by a bit and got clobbered. Long-on had no chance. Dhoni special
hit hard to long-off, Dhoni gets to a fifty off 38 balls.
Deshpande hits a heavy length outside off, Rahane searches for a cut and chops it to second slip on the bounce
just short of a good length and outside off, doesn't bounce as much as Rahane expected it to. He pulls and does not connect
back of a length and largely holds its line outside off, jabbed away to point off the  back foot
short and sliding down the leg side, Rahane flicks it in the air....does not carry to Dube diving forward from long leg
overpitched and outside off, Deshpande floats it up. Rahane leans into it and caresses a drive between cover and mid-off
on a length and angling in towards off stump, Rahane presses forward and pats it to extra-cover

just short of a good length and outside off, Venkatesh stands up tall and punches it past the right of point. Tushar slides to his left in the outfield and cuts it off to two. Excellent work in the deep from Tushar
dug in short on middle and leg, fended back to the bowler
shortish and outside off, forced into the off side off the back foot
Milne keeps it short and just a shade outside off, Venkatesh leans back and punches it out to point
back of a length and just a shade outside off, skewed towards cover
Milne runs in hard, hits the deck harder, stabbed into the covers
just short of a good length and outside off, Rahane leans back and punches with an open face to backward point
on a length and holds its line outside off, Rahane props forward and guides it to extra-cover
back of a length and slanting in towards off stump, Rahane rides the bounce and helps it away to long leg
back of a length and on the hips, tucked away to Milne's right at deep square leg
punched into the cover boundary. Tushar goes too full, Venkatesh leans into it and crashes it away through the off side
good length and attacking the stumps, pushed into the covers
back of a length and zips back in at 137ks, Rahane aims a leg-side flick and wears it on the thigh pad
on a length and hits the back thigh as Rahane swipes to the leg side and does not put bat on ball
just short of a good length and veers back in to cramp Rahane. He aims a late-cut and instead chops it behind to Dhoni
pitched up and outside off, Rahane shows the full face of the bat, eases forward and drives it on the up over Milne's head
better length from Milne. Digs it shorter and outside off. Rahane swings for the hills and misses

pulled into the top tier beyond square leg. Short and angling into the body, from over the wicket, Rahane gets into a strong position, controls the pull and sends this hip-high ball soaring over the leg side
back of a length on middle and leg, squeezed away to square leg
back of a length and outside off, Venkatesh stands up tall and crunnnnnnches it between mid-off and extra-cover
short and straying into the hips, flicked away to fine leg
split-finger slower ball from Tushar? Grips and breaks away past the bat. Dies on its way to Dhoni
another pitched-up delivery. Floated up outside off, Rahane plants his front leg and pumps it over mid-off
back of a length and just a shade outside off, run away behind point for a single
short and darted into middle and leg, Santner starts with a loose ball, which is swatted off the hips to the midwicet fence
back of a length and skids on outside off, forced off the back foot to long-off
fired into off stump, Iyer pokes it to mid-off. A misfield from Milne allows an extra run
Venkatesh steps out, Santner bowls into the pitch and keeps him to a single down the ground
shorter and skids on outside off, Rahane jumps back and slashes it to point
pushed through on middle and leg, 93ks, played back to Santner
on-pace back of a length delivery angling across off, hauled away to midwicket
edged and taken. DJ Bravo breaks into a celebratory jig.. New moves from Bravo. Much fuller but Bravo hides it away from Venkatesh's swinging arc. Venkatesh slashes and can only nick it off to Dhoni
on-pace bouncer outside off, Rana ducks under it
much fuller and sliding across off, Rana blocks it to cover off the front foot
nice and full, wobbling away outside off, nearly scratched the outside edge
short, wide, flayed away to sweeper cover off the back foot
too full and wide, poor ball from Dube first up. Rana leans into it and bashes it through the line as the ball pings the cover boundary
back of a length and angling across off, Rana chops between point and cover, haring across for a single
shorter and outside off, flapped towards midwicket for one
shortish and attached with width outside off, Rana leans back and cuts it away to the left of backward point
slower ball floats through outside off, away from the reach of the batter. The ball rolls past Dhoni into the boundary
another slower ball - full and wide of off. Rana throws bat at ball and slices it in the air, but it drops in front of DJ Bravo at deep third man
pushed through outside off, full, Rana drops down to one knee and slog-sweeps it powerfully over midwicket
fired wide of off, Santner asks Rana to reach out, which he does. Slapped to deep point
tossed up on middle and leg, driven between wide long-on and deep midwicket
back of a length and darted outside off, chopped off the back foot to deep point
stump-to-stump line, bunted down to long-off
shortish and on off stump, another chopped single to deep point
back of a length and angling across off, tip and run to short third man
another loose ball, this time from Bravo. Too full and veering into the pads, picked away fine of long leg
back of a length and outside off, Rahane opens the bat-face and directs it down to deep third man
slower one from Bravo, grips, chopped away to Dhoni
dug in short and angling across off, Rana ducks under it

DJ Bravo brings out his new jig once again. Rana flaps it to Rayudu at short fine leg. Dug in short, chest-high short ball, slower variation, cramps Rana on the pull. He gets inside the line but can't control it and finds Rayudu
pushed through on middle, knocked into the leg side
down the track and belted away past the left of Jadeja to long-off
patted to cover
flat and quick outside off, Rahane rolls out a reverse-sweep and gets it past the right of Milne at short third man
speared into the pads, shovelled away to long leg
Jadeja tosses it up outside off, Iyer pushes it back to him
full and angling into middle and leg, glanced away behind square on the leg side
back of a length and holds its line outside off, tapped through cover-point region
Rahane ventures down the track. Santner drags his length back and shifts his line wider of off. Sliced in the air, but well wide of short third man
Santner strikes to get Rahane. Darted on a back of a length and angling into Rahane. He flicks it straight to Jadeja at midwicket. Soft dismissal
chipped away through square leg
sliding on outside off, Iyer reaches out and scythes it away to the left of Milne at sweeper cover
pushed through on middle and leg, Billings stretches out and sweeps to fine leg
on a length and outside off, punched down to long-off
slider from Jadeja, Billings drives and inside-edges it onto the pad
forced back to Jadeja
darted on a back of a length and outside off, carved away to sweeper cover
Jadeja draws the outside edge but it runs away past the right of Dhoni to short third man
swept from outside off to deep square leg. Uthappa runs around and keeps it to two
darted into the pitch, inside-edged onto the pad
Santner bowls into the pitch, punched down to long-on
tucked around the corner for one
Billings searches for a reverse-sweep and deflects the ball towards point. Not given out lbw. Jadeja calls for a review of the on-field not-out decision. Replays indicated that Billings had gloved it
on a length on middle, played back to Santner
reverse-swept from a middle-stump line to short third man
Billings ventures another reverse-sweep, this time he gets it finer of Milne at short third man
low full-toss around leg stump, reverse-swatted to sweeper on the off side
back of a length, Iyer drags an inside edge behind square on the leg side
Billings goes for a more conventional sweep, does not get enough bat on ball. Tickled away to square leg
tucked off the hips to long leg
fullish and floated into middle and leg, bunted down to long-on
there's the big dipper from Bravo. This low-full toss is hauled away into the leg side
on-pace short ball, wide of off, Billings cracks it away through the off side. Milne tears across to his left from sweeper, slides to cut it off to a double
on a length and outside off, 100.1ks slower ball. Billings jumps across off, delays the sweep, and then hits it over square leg
yorker, jammed out between deep midwicket and wide long-on
back of a length and angling into a solid punch down to long-on
down the track and drilled back to Jadeja
down the track and muscled over midwicket for six. Darted into the stumps, Billings charges out of the crease and holds nothing back
another dart from Jadeja, Billings take another trip down the pitch and hits it down to long-on
shortish and spins away slightly outside off, chopped away to the right of short third man
short and wide of off, slapped away to extra-cover, where Rayudu, I think, fumbles. Nevertheless, it's a dot
dipping low full-toss, on off, pushed back to Bravo
back of a length on middle, chipped down to long-on
DJ Bravo draws level with Malinga on this list. Billings holes out to Tushar at deep midwicket. Slower ball, hides it away from Billings. Tugged away to the outfielder
lifter outside off, flapped behind to Dhoni
speared into the blockhole, jammed wide of mid-off
slower ball, floated full and dips at off stump, forced down to long-on. End of a fine shift from Bravo: 4-0-20-3
middle-stump yorker, squirted out to mid-off
fullish and outside off, sliced to the right of deep third man. Rayudu takes a tumble and lands rather awkwardly, jamming his knee into the turf. Tommy Simsek is out to tend to Rayudu
hoicked away to the midwicket boundary. Shreyas Iyer closes the game out on his KKR debut
